1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ gI gu b+h+ya sa mA sAr+d+han 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi sa b+hA ba ni d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba
1b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): zab gsal gnyis med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ bdag 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku// dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyi
2a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyal// rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing // rtag sogs rgyu 'dras khams kun 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): rab bkang nas// ji srid bar du don mdzad rgyun mi 'chad// khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' dre dang ni// 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa// snying gi'i 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye// tshes bdag khros pas kyang ni miganon pa// mi shigs thig 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): le gang yin rtogs par mos// blo dang ldan pa rnams kyi pad+ma kha 'byed pa// rmongs pa sreg byed snying 
2a7(rgyud 'grel): bya rgya chu rgyun rgya rlu tu bya chu rgya 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i mun pa sel mdzad pa// yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad// bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal snga rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan gsang 'dus mtsho chen las// bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum// sman pa'i zhabs kyis rnyed pa'o// de rnyed dpe mkhyud spangs byas te// 'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi// dngos grub 'byung phyir gter 'dra ba// phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i brgyud rim gyis// dpal dang ldan pa'i mnyam 'dus sgrub pa'i thabs// dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brod cing // dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya// de la
2b4(rgyud 'grel): kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas pa grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du khas blangs nas de'i lam la zhugs te/ dka' thub dang smyung ba dang / brtul zhugs la sogs 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing / 'di snyam du bdag gi chu'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang / de rnams kyis stong pa'i dngos po na yod pa nyid de/ de tsa bzhig brtags pas mngon du 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): byed kyang / dngos po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te grol ba dang rgyang ring du 'gyur ro// ji skad du/ stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas// kun las 'das pa nges mi shes// dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jig 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): pas// stong pa nyid ni shes par bya// zhes 'byung bas so// yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang / dam pa ma yin pas de'i lam la zhugs te/ bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): mched dang / khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing / sdom pa'i snod la brten te/ zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma med pa'i 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed do// 'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste/ de yang ji skad du/ rtsa ba'i rnam shes log gyur nas// lhag bcas 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma med 'gyur ba'i// rnam grol 'bras bu thob 'gyur yang mngo ni du rgyu ba myed pa yi// ma rig bag chags dang 'brel phyir// rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtshos// de la thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir// dpal 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan go cha'i 'od zer dang // phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas// de yi ro myang zlog mdzad de// yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad// ces gsang ba'i rim pa che ba las gsungs so// yang kha cig ni dge ba'i bshes
3a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang / de rnams kyis brgyad rims 'khyud pas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol du phyin pa bcu skal pa mi nyung bar bsags nas/ sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed cing rims kyis sa 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu mngon du mthar thug par byed do// de'i sprul pa'i sbyor pos dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang / gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang / lhums nas bltams pa/ 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang / sa ba zhes pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa ston pa dang / de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed pa bstan pa'i phyir/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du ched du long sa spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan te/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya snang nas/ snyoms par 'jug 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tsho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba/ sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid/ sngon dang byis kyi sbyor ba mngon du byas te/ bdud btul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do// don de lta bu'i snod 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): dkon par gzigs nas// skabs mdzad de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul so sor mthong bar mdzad do// bla ma chen po'i zhal snga nas ji skad du/ ci'i phyir shAkya thub pa yis// grangs med bar du tshogs bsags kyang // 'di 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): don ma gtogs ni rany+dzar// ci yang ma yin ting 'dzin gnas// de che ba de gshegs kun gyis kyang // thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i// zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): te// nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar// de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su// skad cig gis ni yang dag rtogs// byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas// dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste// sems can 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): gzung par bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di// bal ba ldan pa 'ga' zhig la// zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan// brgyad de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o zhes 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o// gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni/ de'i tshe bla dang bcas par 'gyur ro// de bas na 'bras 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): bu sku gsum ni gcig kho na ste de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o// ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad byang chub pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// gzhal 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes thob pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin zhes 'byung bas so// sngags kyi spyod pa la mos pa de dag kyang bzhir shes par bya'o// kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbral sogs pa dang / bdag gi de kho na nyid la 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong bar byas nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su byong 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ tshogs gnyis bsags nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do// yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing / nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang / phyi rol gyi ye shes sems 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas/ mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phar thob par 'dod do// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzud pa'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa yin 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig re re la yang snod dang / bcud las dang / 'bras bur bcas par sbyong bar byed cing / rnal 'byor dang phyag rgya la brten nas tshe 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba la som nyi med pas bla
4a6(rgyud 'grel): na med pa'o// de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ ji lta bu zhe na/ chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dag/ 'dus phyir snod yangs dam pa'o// rmongs pa'i mun nag sel bas na// sgrol ma'i 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni 'di yin no// rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul bas// 'thad pa'i srab skyobs mchog yin no// rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu// 'gugs phyir lcags kyu dam pa'o// rnal 'byor mchog tu nges pa yi// / 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): dam sdom can gyi tshong 'dus so// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las// sgrol byed gru ni chen po'o// mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gis// steng du phyin byed them skas so// rnam rtog las byung nyon mongs kyi 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi// 'khor lo skyong phyir rgyal po'o// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos// nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang // de 'dra'i tshul len rgyud 'di ni// kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni
4b3(rgyud 'grel): don rnams de ru gtan la phab// 'di don sgom byed rnal 'byor pa// ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba bas// dga' dang rtsod pa med pa dang // srung ba dang ni dran pa dang // bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o// de lta/ 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gzhung de la rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag dang / gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rna bar bshad pas/ gang zag gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni bsdus 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o// ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste/ de'i phyis 'byung ba'i don rje 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): btsun rnams kyis snod du rung bar byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya'o// de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes// byang 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ldan sbyin pa la sogs brgyan// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin// dbang bskur snang ba thob pas rim 'di bya/ gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs// gang rung 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas su stegs bu gru bzhi pa// tsan dan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan// rdo rje skyil mo krung 'dug bsam gtan bya// dang po tho rangs nyi dbus su// stong sogs kyis dag mthing ga'i hUM/ 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): mas za la dmags// rnal sags ma pa// 'ad ba byasags pa sa dang / dun ma sa/ # 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal// gang zhig thog med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la// rtog pas rnam par bsgos pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams// thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang // gsum/ 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): du dmigs pa gsal te bshad par bgyi// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyi yang dge ba dang // ma lus bdag gis de dag yi rang nas// bla med yang dag byang 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): chub phyir bsngo'o// spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste// mtha' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po// rtag tu bdag gi yid dang dbyer med pa// bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa kun las nges par// 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): grol ba yi// dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshogs rten// dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po// chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi// bcing ba ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi// dpal ldan snying rje mchog 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rab drangs pa// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab gnas pa'i// 'dul ba'i dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis// sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom
5a7(rgyud 'grel): ste// mi 'phrogs pa yis brgyan pa'i sems kyis kyang // byang chub tu ni sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sras dang ldan pa'i dge bar gshegs pa yi// thun mod lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu// rdzogs sang
5a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni// da ltar 'dir ni bdag gis bsten par bya// sdug bsngal la gnas sems can rnams// snying rjes yang ni dmigs byas te// byang chub sems ni dpag med pa// rin chen 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bsam par bya// rang bzhin med byer snang pa nyid// rgyu med pas namatshan ma med// rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas// sman med nyid du nges pa'o// oM Sh+TAr+yat+ta d+hA badz+ra sa b+hA ba n+d+ha 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po gsum// gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan ma// dgyes mdzad yas mar sbrengs pa yi// mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya// stong las nyi dkyil hU~M nag las// 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zer 'phros phyi rol bcad// 'og dang phyogs mtshams steng spros pas// sa gzhi ra ba bla rer bskyed// bruM 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag/ pad nyir khro bo 'khor lor bsgom// de dbus hUM mdzad rtag pa// 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs// gnas gyur de las chos 'byung bskyed// gru gsum dkar po gyen la gnas// sna tshogs 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// mkha' yi dkyil du pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/ 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus zla steng bru las skyes// 'khor lo bu mo chen las byung ba// rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las// gyur pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom// gru bzhi la sogs yon tan ldan// sna tshogs par+b+ba 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu dgu'i steng // nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang // zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed// de nyid gsum gnas sems babs pas// bde gshegs rnams kyis de la gzigs// rang gi khams// 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): su shes rab thabs// dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur// dbu rtsel byon ye shes sems// 'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur// 'du shing 'phro ba'i sbyor ba las// gcig tu gyur pa bsam 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de las hUM dkar las byung ba// rdo rje rtse lnga me shel gzugs// phyogs kun 'od zer 'gro bsams na// hUM bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya// oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM// de las 'phros pa bde gshegs 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): / kyis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas// slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje las// btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal bya// oM ya thA sarba ta thA tasta thA a haM/ sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur// gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ 'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po// kun tu bzang po bsgom par bya// sku dang dbus zhal zla nor 'dra// g.yas nag g.yon ni dmar po la// rin 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i// phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khrud// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// mkhyen byed mtshan ma dbu rgyan la// mi bskyod pa yis brgyan 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom// de nas 'dod chags chen po yis// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gzigs gyur nas// sbyor ba'i sgra yis rang lus la// rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya// de ni spyan mo la sogs dang // 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi bdag/ rnam pa dgu ni spro byas nas// rang gi shes rab nyid la thim// shes rab de yi pad dkyil du// bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// gzigs 'gyur 'gro ba ma 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa// snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya// rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyi// nam mkha'i khyab pa'i bde gshegs rnams// zla ba lta bur zhu byas pas// de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya// de yi stobs 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis de dag rnams// bde dang yid bde thob pa dang // tha mal phung sogs bshig pa'i phyir// zla ba lta bur zhu ba'o// de la mig la sogs pa rnams// k+Shi dzi khe ge skaM saM gyur// de bzhin gzugs/ 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams// dza hUM baM ho khaM raM gyur// sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ laM me paM te du ni gyur// gzugs sogs phung po'i bdag nyid rnams// bruM A dzi khi hUM du gyur// de las mtshan 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): ma de yis mtshan// de rnams sa snying la sogs par// khams kun 'dus par byas nas su// dris shing rtogs phul mi smra 'dug/ de ni pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas// phyi rol phyung nas bstod nas ni// 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis so// rang rang khams su 'phros par bsam// de nas par ma'i sems can rnams// skar ma lhung zhing zhal zhugs nas// rdo rjer phyung nas pad+mar gnas// shes rab 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): chags pas de zhu byed// de yi 'od zer dmar 'phros pas// yab yum byang chub sems su zhu// de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs// glu yis bskal nas thim par byed// sems can khams na gnas kyi
6b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa bdag la skyabs su gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen gnyen
6b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te bdag 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi/ 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): phan yon che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): la dgyes par mdzod// glu 'di yin dor byas nas// zhub pur sum tshogs bral ba// zla nyar gyur te yi ge hA// rdo rje sngon po kun zad gdengs// des mtshan bshes gnyen zhu 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// sku dang zhal dbus mthing ga'i mdog/ g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar po la// dam pa dang po'i mtshan mar ldan// dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams// stong pa nyid du bsam byas te/ myus 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa zhen spang phyir// chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha/ sa snying rdo rje na mkha' dang // dbang phyug sgrib sel kun bzang rnams// kI la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs par dgod par bya// de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la// hUM A~MHoM las skyes pa yis// lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs bskyed// de rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'o// gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis// ma lus rdo rje gsum mchod nas// byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab// dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyod gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsin+da badz+ra swa b+hA ba badz+ra At+ma kau ha/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs gnas su// rdo rje gsung dang 'dra ba 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): wA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// der bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod// phyogs bcur 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya badz+ra swA b+hA ba At+ma koH/ 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' sa bon gyi// 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i mgon po bskul// de yi 'od zer las byung ba'i// spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// bdud rtsi lnga yi chus gang ba'i// bum pas dbang
7b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur bkra shis sgra// rnga dung dril sogs rol mo sgra// dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chang ldan bya// de bzhin zla ba gnyis la sogs// 'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma gtogs pa// thams cad sngon bzhin bshes gnyen 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // gzugs kyi khyad par shes byas nas// byin gyis brlab cing mig la sogs// sa snying sogs bkod rdo rje gsum// gnas gsum mtshan la dbu rgyan la// rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan pa'o// 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): mgo snying lte ba gsang rkang par// oM hAM sma AHhA rnams sam// cha shas ngo bo nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas lnga yis dgang bar bya// hU~M las rdo rje chu skyes ni// rtse lnga 'dab brgyad bsam par bya// oM 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): as nor bu ge sar bskyed// phaT kyis gnyis kyis lam 'gog pa'o// mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan bsams nas// bde mchog myong bar bya ba'i phyir// rang gi shes rab la zhugs nas// dbang po
7b8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sbyar rjes chags byas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa// sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to// thugs da ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus// sangs rgyas 'khor lo mkha' 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa// zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer byung // pad gnas zla ba lta bu'i gzugs// de las sa bon hUM bcu dgu// mi bskyod pa yi 'khor lo mchog/ gsal bar bsams nas
8a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba kun// phan phyir rims kyis dbyung bar bya// badz+ra d+h+r-ika gis rab bskal la// gong ma lta bu'i mi bskyod pa// sangs rgyas mdzad pa byas nas su// 'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bsam// 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): dza na dzi ka gis rnam snang 'byung // dkar nag dmar po phyag drug pa// 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad// 'dus nas shar gyi zla bar bsam// rat+na d+h+r-ika gis rin chen dbyung // ser nag dkar po 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa// rin chen ral gri 'khor lo par// 'dus nas lho yi nyi mar bsam// A ro lig gis 'od dpag med// dmar nag dkar po phyag drug pa// pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor// slar 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus nub kyi nyi mar bsam// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika gis don yod grub// ljang nag dkar po phyag drug pa// ral gri 'khor lo ra ni chen pa da// 'dus nas byang gi nyi mar bsam// dang po rang gi rig ma 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrung // rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang // rin chen sna tshogs dbu rgyan can// gdan ltar 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mo ha ra tis spyan ma dbyung // skra yi rdo rje dang 'dra ba// 'khor lo ral
8a7(rgyud 'grel): gri rin chen pa da// slar 'dus shar lhor zla bar bsam// dwe Sha ra ti sa mA ma k+Shi// thugs kyi rdo rje dang 'dra ba// ut+pa la ra la gri rin chen pad// 'dus nas lce nub zla bar bsam// rA ga ra ti sa gos 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo// gsung gi rdo rje dang 'dra ba// pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor// 'dres nas nub byang zla bar bsam// badz+ra ra tes sgrol ma dbyung // ngan chen dbang phyug dang 'dra ba// ut+pal 'khor lo rin 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): chen pad// slar 'dus byang shar zla bar bsam// oM AHhUM gis lha mo drug/ go rim bzhin du dbyung bar bya// gzugs kyi rdo rje rnam snang 'dra// me long ral gri rin chen pad// skra yi rdo rje mi 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod 'dra// pi bang ral gri rin chen pad// dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'dra// dung dang ral gri rin chen par// ro yi rdo rje mtha' yas 'dra// snod dang ral gri rin chen 'khor// reg gi rdo rje don yod 'dra/ 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): gos dang 'khor lo rin chen pad// tshe dbyings rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra// chos 'byung ral gri rin chen pad// me mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi dang // shar sgo g.yas g.yon zla ster bsam// ya mAn+ta krita 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): shin rje gshed// mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa// tho ba ral gri rin chen pad// shar sgor khro dkyil nyi dbus dgod// pradz+nyA na ta krita shes mthar byed// snang mdzad lta bu phyag drug pa// dbyug pa ral 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): ze rin chen pad/ lho skong nyo dbus nyi 'od 'bar/ pad+mAn ta kri tarta mgrin ni// mtha' yas lta bu phyag drug pa// pad+ma rin chen ral gri 'khor// nub sgor nyi dkyil khro dkyil bsam// big+h+nAn taM kri ta bdud 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'khyil// mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa// rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad// byang sgor nyi dbus khro dkyil bsam// de rnams rgod dang gdangs pa dang // mche ba gtsigs nas bzhad byed pa// dbu skra 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser gyen du brdzes// stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa// gtum pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa yi// dang pos rig ma 'khyud pa dang // me yi 'od kyi 'khor lo nang // gtum po rab 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): tu bsam pa'o// de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas su// sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis// gshin rje gshed bskul 'khor lo dgug/ de dang 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs// bskrad nas thim byas khro bo thim// bde bas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdun du dmigs la mchod par bya// dung gi chu yis 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor dang // kun das kha bkab chu nye reg/ mchod yon snod kyis mchod yon dang // mtha' sogs dbye bas zhabs bsil lo// de bzhin khro bo gzhan bskul bas// 'od zer 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni gzhug pa dang // bcing dang rje su dgyes bskyed pa// chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab// mos pas mig la sogs pa rnams// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod// 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur bas// rigs kyis dbang bskur bzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas bzhi po mi bskyod pa// lha mo rang rang bdag pos brgyan// rnam snang mi bskyod snang mtha' yas// 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod sgo srungs mtshan pa'o// sa bon 'od kyis lha mo bkug/ zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjes phyung // pad nang laM maM paM taM dang // dzaHhUM baM ho khe raM gyur// de yi 'od kyis bcu po dgug/ rang rab 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon la zhugs pas// nus dang ldan par rab byas nas// shes rab ba spu'i bu gar spro// 'od rtse gzugs rdo rje sogs ni// rang rang mtshan mas rnam mdzes pa'i// dri med rgyan gyis brgyan
9a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku// sgyu ma lta bur spro bar bya// de bzhin phyi yi bdug pa sogs// 'od rtse las spronam mkha' khams// bkang ste bdag dang 'khor lo la// mchod pa bya ste mchod pa dang // mchod
9a8(rgyud 'grel): ba pa dang mam de gnas gsum// bral ma la zang zhes bya'i phyir// tha dad las ni thal byanas// sngags kyis byed kyis brlab par bya// a sa rba ta thA ga ta pUng badz+ras b+hA ba ya keH/ 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas brag ca'i sgra lta bur// sgra yul thams cad rab bsams nas// rdo rje dril bu ba de dbyangs kyis// rang yid lha yi bstod pa bsgom// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje su la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// dag pa rdo rje gdon mi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma ban d+har bdud rtsi lnga// zla ba nyi mar yi ge lnga// bsams nas 'od zer spro bya'o// rtag sogs bkug nas 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gzhug/ bzhu zhing bskol bas rlangs las hU~M// de byung rdo rje zhu byas nas// phreng ba'i rgyun tu dbab par bsam// oM gyis bsil bar byas nas su// lha rnams phyag tu spro byas la// lce hUM 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung rdo rje bkod// snying zla'i 'khor lo tshim par bya// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs 'od kyis// thub pa'i dbang pos kun rtog spangs// 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid byas nas// sa bon la ni thim par bya// thugs ka'i mtshan ma nang gnas pa// nyi ma'i dbus kyi yi ge hUM// 'od zer rnam pa lnga ldan pa'i// tsa na'i 'bru tsam thig ler 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de yi 'od kyis gnas la sogs// rdo rje mchog gsum gsal byas nas// bzhag ste thig le lta bu ru// rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bya// de ma thag tu ting 'dzin gsum// 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa rab tu bsam byas nas// de yi gsum pa las spro zhing // thig le yan chad gsal bar bya// bzhag pa ba spu las spro zhing // dkyil 'khor rten la sogs pa nas// khams kun bkang nas 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' la bsdu// de ring yang ni spro bsdu bya// yang ni sa bon 'od kyis ni// bde gshegs bkug gzhug zhu gyur nas// rdo rje lam nas phyung nas su// ze'u 'bru bum pa'i nang du dbab// de las rdo rje 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): mthing ga che// nas chad lte bar rin po che// yungs kar chad tsam dbus su yang // rtan bcas teng 'dzin gsum po bsgom// rdo rje rtswa lnga lcags kyu yis// b+hu ste sna rtser gnas par bya// rdo rje nang mamathu 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): sel rlung // phyung ste gnas bya rnam pa gzhan// 'di yi ting 'dzin gsum pa las// spro bsnga gong ma bzhin du bya// de la bzung bas stobs ldan na// brtan pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur// de skyes sprul pa 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan rnams// yang nas yang du spro bsdu bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las// gsang 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas brjod spro byed pa// rim pa 'am ni cig car bya// oM sogs re re brjod skad cig/ sku rdo rje la sogs 'khor la// spros pas na mkha'i khams bkang nas// yan lag bcu gnyis gsum ldan 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): mos// oM sogs re re brjod skad cig/ ma bskul gnyis dang gong ma ltar// dang pos phyung ste nam mkha' la// bkod nas gnyis pa gong ma ltar// mchod pa'i lha mo spro byas nas// 'khyud pa'i bde bas 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): thub dbang rnams// bde chen dbang du gyur byas la// gsum pas nang du thim par bya// rdo rje dang ni gsal ba dang // lam byung chos kyi 'khor lo las// steng du g.yas g.yon gnyi ga las// drag dang 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): dal bar shes par bya// 'byung ba hUM ste 'jug pa oM// gnas pa AHste de nyid bzung // ye shes sa bon ngo bo ste// bzhi rnams gcig tu brtsi bar bya// nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las// bzhi bsdus 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya phrag dgu nyid do// de ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rims// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// pra myur rnams kyis ngal ba bsal// spyan sogs glu yis bskul byas nas// sngon bzhin 'khor lo mchod bya ste// 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi gzengs ni bstod bya ste// nyams chung spyi bor mtho gang tshad// zla steng oM gyis brlan pa yi// bdud rtsi cho ga bzhin phob pas// rdo rje gsum sogs tshim par bya// baM las byung ba'i bum pa bza 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): zla gam byed kyi kha bcad pa// thigs pa yid sbyin rin po ches// brgyan pa rkan gyi dbus su bsgom// 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// oM ni lce yi rtse la bsam// de gzer rim pas dbab byas pas/ 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): nus dang ldan pas bkres bsgom gzhom// bkres bsgom la sogs nyon mongs la// rnal 'byor de ni kun brtsams nas// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): cung zad ngal sos yul gzhan 'gro// gong ma'i cho gas brtan bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum sngags ma zhen par// gsang sngags bzlas brjod yang bya'o// ldang bar 'dod na sngags pa yis// mchod/ 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// oM AHhUM nyid brjod byas la// de nyid gsum la 'khor lo bsdu// las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yi// rig 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lta ba ma thob pa'i// sems can thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir// smon lam 'di ni mngon du bya// dpal dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod mgon// rnal 'byor gyis thob dge ba gang // 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen ye shes rang byung nas// sems can kun mkhyen par 'god shog/ gang zhig 'di mthor 'dod pa'am// gang zhig zhu bar 'dod pa des// thugs kyi dbang phyug grangs med pa// mgon / 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): po de ni mthong bar shog/ na mkha' mtha' klas phyogs bcu ru// sems can kun gyi don spyod la// ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug la// bdag gis kyang ni spyod par shog/ ji srid thog ma med pa
11a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par// de srid sems can phan pa nyid// sangs rgyas spyod pa bdag spyod shog/ ji srid sangs rgyas sna tshogs rnams// 'jig rten bshes gnyen mya ngan 'das// / 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi bstan pa'i don du ni// bskal pa'i bskal par byed par shog/ rdo rje 'chang sogs gzugs kyis ni// bdag gis phyogs bcur sprul gyur cig/ sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams// 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): de tshe bdag gis 'dul gyur cig/ ting 'dzin las ni langs nas ni// lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas// spyod yul sems tsam shes byas la// rang gi lha yi gzugs su dmigs// yang na spyod 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): yul de dag nyid// rang rang dag pas gnas pa'o// so so rang rig chos nyid pas// rnam snang mdzad la sogs par snang // yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// rang yid dga' bur byed pa'i phyir// 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): dbugs rtog spangs nas rab bsgoms na// gsang ba chen po mchod pa'o// rang gi kha zas za dus su// snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms la// bdud rtsi sha yi sbyor ba yis// gong ma lta bur 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyaspyang byas te// de nyid gsum ni bzlas byas te// lce dang dbu rgyan mchog bsgoms la// lha rnams ma lus tshim pa yi// bsam pas nang gi sbyin sreg bya// phyi rol sbyin sreg dpag pa tsam// ye shes me ni 'bar byed 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): pas// phung sogs blun pa'i bud shing bsregs// bla na med par bshad pa'o// ji skad gsungs pa'i sdom par ldan// ji ltar myong bar mnyam par spyod// blo dang ldan pas dam med pa// dus rig byas la gsang 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// snying rjer gnas pas las gnyis byed// 'gro ba'i don dang sangs rgyas mnyes// lus ngag tha mal khyad par can// phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid do// chos can gcig la ldog pa ni// sna tshogs rnam par snang ba yin// sdug 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bde ba grol 'byung ba// las kyi khyad par mang gyur yin// de phyir dge dang mi dge'i las// lus la sogs pa'i rtog las byung // kun rtog thams cad las grol ba// nag po'i lus su ga la 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa bskang 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): don du// don yod rdo rje sbyor bsgoms te// thugs dka'i zla bar khe bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya// gzugs sogs nam mkha' bzhin dag nas// rang bzhin 'od gsal sems bskyed de// bskul ba mngon du 'gro ba yi// 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur byas pas dag par bya// bla ma brnyas pa'i skyon byung na// yon tan ldan pa'i ston mo dbul// sdigs bshags la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// sdom pa bzung bas bskang bar bya// phyi yi khrus kyi cho ga la// rang gi rnam 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dmigs byas nas// dbang bskur gong ma bzhin bsgoms nas// mtha' ru bdag po bzhag pa'o// de ltar nyin phyed dus dang ni// phyi 'phred du yang bsgom par bya// nam phyer dus su sa bon nas// bzlas pa'i bar du bskyed par 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// gshegs su gsol 'dod sngags pa yis// mchod pa bstod pa bdud rtsi myang // byas nas mtha' ru mu bzhag pa'i// yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol// de bzhin yi ge gsum brjod pas// ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): lo la// phyi rol 'khor lo bcug byas te// shes rab snying rje ldan pas nyal// ldang ba'i dus na lA mo yi// dbyangs kyis bskal bsam langs nas su// sngon bzhin dus bzhir ting 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gsum// rtse gcig pa yis thams cad bsgom// brel ba bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus dang po ni ting 'dzin gsum// ma lus par ni bsgom byas la// yan lag rnams ni sngon bzhin
12a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de las gzhan pa'i dus dag tu// blo bur rang gi lha bzhengs la// thugs las 'khor lo spro byas la// dbang bskur ba ni sngon bzhin blang // mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// thig le 'am 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): yang na phra mo 'am// sngags kyi bzlas brjod yang byas nas// 'khor lo bsdu ba sngon bzhin brtsam// de ltar zhugs pa rnam pa gnyis// rang gi lam gyis mi mthun phyogs// bzlog pas brtan pa'i 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnyed pas// las dang po yi rnal 'byor ro// de yis pa la dmigs pa yis// man ngag thob pas ye shes che// 'bebs thob rang dang gzhan mthong na// cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa'o// 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): dus 'dir mig dang lus sogs rnams// byin brlabs dbang bskur rab byas nas// mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la// bzlas brjod sbyor ba brtsam pa'o// sngon bzhin du ni bsdu byas nas// sdom
12a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bskyed sogs snga ma bzhin// rgyun du gom bslabs bcu dang gcig/ mthu can stobs rtogs des dmigs pa'o// de yis gsung la dmigs pa yis// rlung gi rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// bdag 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor mthong // ye shes dbang du gyur pa'o// de la nyin mtshan rgyun du'am// yi ge gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin// kun tu spyod las chos thams cad// dbyer med gong bzhin 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen byed do// 'di yis phyag rgya chen po yi// bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gsum mthong nas// brtul zhugs la sogs rim 'di yis// sems dmigs rdo rje 'tsho ba thob// 'di las gzhan 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu bzhi yi// bsnyen pa'i cho ga 'di bzhin te// rang rang lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'og nas 'byung ba'i don brtson bya// de yan chad ni mngon du bsnyen pa bya baM'i d+h+r-i ga rgyas par bshad zin to// / 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): da ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na// dang por zhugs dang dang po pa// thams cad kun gyi slob dpon no// cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa// nus dang ldan 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i slob dpon no// ye shes dbang du gyur pa ni// sbyor ba rnyed pa'i slob dpon no// de rnams ci rigs mnyes byas nas// de yis dkyil 'khor brtsab pa'o// gang dag gi don du zhe na// dad ldan gtong 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bong brtson 'grus ldan// snod rang thog la mi lbu ba// 'dir dngas grub thab 'ad pas// gnyis sam gsum gyi bar dgas// sku gzugs zis dang lder so dang // klags pas rdo rjel sogs dang / 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten la sogs gnas pa'i phyir// gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus// gang dag sdig pa'i las dbang gis// mngon du'am rmi lam dag tu ni// lha 'khrugs pa yi mtshan ma mthong // gnyis sam 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bar du zhus// mos mang brtan la dad pa can// gzhan la pan dga' mthong nas ni// ma zhus kyang ni de bos la// phan 'dod phyir ni dkyil 'khor bsam// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bum pa'i dbang gis 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyor bas// sa brgyad pa ru yang dag gnas// gang dag gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// dgra pa dang ni bcu par byed// shes rab ye shes dbang gis ni// rdo rje lta bur rab gnas pas// 'bras bu 'byung bar 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): nus mthu ldan// dang po ba'i bar shes par bya// rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la// thal bar brlag kyang 'bras bu med// sngags dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg bzhin// lus nyon mongs pa kho nar 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): zad// de bas ji srid gnas pa'i bar// mchod pa'i rten du rung bya dang // 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin de dag/ byin gyis brlab phyir brtsam pa'o// mngon bsags sdig pa dpag med rnams// skad cig gis ni zad byed 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): pa// dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur ba// de yis rab tu byed pas nas// ye shes kyis kyang 'debs pa yi// cho ga zab mos sdig pa zad// mtshan ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byung zhing // gong gi yon tan 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par mdzad// thabs ji ltar zhe na/ bdag nyid chen po de la gong du smos pas zhu ba gsol ba dang / khyod kyis spro bya rnams tshigs sam// dri bar bya'o// des kyang kha cig ni tshogs/ kha cig ni 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshogs zhes gsol nas// 'jab bzlas pa bya'o// 'phral du dben par 'dug nas ni// lha'i 'khor lo bsgom byas la// tshogs 'phel bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir// sngags kyi bzlas brjod 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa yin// de nyid gsum par yi ge gzhug/ yang na dbyung ba bar du gzhug/ sgrub pa de'am phreng sngags sam// rig pa dang bcas bzla bar bya// du ma rab tu bzla ba 'am// 'khor bdag 'bum ste/ 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): rang lha'i 'bum// gzhan dag khri phrag bzlas byas nas// bsam mam dngos su bka' thob bri// gsum pa bsrungs nas 'dzab bya ba// cho ga bzhin te rang gis sam// sbyor ba dag gi dag byas 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): nas// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba tsam// lha khang grong ngam skyed tshal gyi// byang shar mtshams ni ji lta bar// shar dang byang du dma' ba yi// mkhas pas sa ni btsal bar bya// der ni bcas nas sa bskor/ 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): te// lhag 'gyur yang ni rdzing 'dra ba// chus bkang mi g.yo g.yas su 'khyil// ma rungs 'khyil ba'i phur bus gzhom// der ni sa bdag phyogs sbyor ba// phyogs su bskyed nas sngon bzhin du// gtor 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ma byin rlabs dbul byas nas// sa gsol byas nas gshegs su gsol// ting 'dzin rim pa gsum pos ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor sogs sta gon gnas// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang // gtor 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yon dang phyi mchod 'bul// sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas// gsol ba btab ste nam mkha' la// khur bu brko ba'i ched du yang // byin gyis brlab phyir dgod par bya// las kyi rdo rje slob ma yis// lto 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bye brtags nas 'dzer gyis klog/ mgrin pa lte ba pus mo tsam// dngos grub rim pas brko bar bya// tho bas bong ba dag bkrugs nas// zhib mor brtags nas btsags nas su// shis pa'i phyir 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dge ba'i phyir// rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug/ de stengs gtsang gzhan las kyang // stegs bu khru gang spangs brtsigs nas// dam tshig lnga yis rab byugs te// steng rgyan sogs pas mdzes par 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ram// yang na bgegs dgra'i rnal 'byor gyis// dbang bskur blangs pas bgegs kyi tshogs// bskrad pas nang nyid dag par bya// oM b+hu khaM gi sngags kyis ni// mkha' la 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): ri rab bskyed par bya// hUM laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag/ sa gzhir byas nas brtan par bya// oM me de ni badz+ri b+hA ba ban+d+ha hUM// sngon bzhin srung ba'i 'khor lo nas// rjes chags mtha' yis sbyor dang po// dkyil 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyung ste mnyes mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog bdag nyid// 'khor lo gong dang 'og las byed// las kyi rgyal mchog sbyor bdag nyid// de yi dbang phyug mgon po ni// ting 'dzin gsum 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog gyur yin// dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// thams cad dang ni bdag mnyam mo// rang bzhin gyis ni bdag dag go/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid nga rgyal bskyed// 'khor los dbus su 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi// rtag sogs las kyi rdo rje yis// mchod gnas dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag med pa yi chos// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// kun du bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byur// ye shes spyod yul rnam sbyor ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// mi bskyod rdo rje khros byas nas// ma dang Ta las rang gi mig/ nyi zlar bskyed nas mig 'bras tAM// 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las spros sprul par bya// rkang mthil haM las rdo rje bskyed// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril// 'gying bag mche gtsigs hA brjod cing // phyogs kun 'bar bar blta bar bya// g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): zlum po dang // saM ga bzhi ste mi bskyod pa'i// rnal 'byor gyos ni phyogs bzhi ru// dang por rab tu brtsam pa'o// khro bo re res drug drug tu// phyogs bcu rnams su brtsams byas pas// 'khor lo bgegs
14a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rnams ni// bskrad par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// rus sbal stabs dang rdo rje gar dang sgra// lcags kyu thabs dang ting 'dzin thabs dang mtha' yas thabs// gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas// shar gyi phyogs su rnal 'byor pas bya'o// rdo rje gdengs pa dang ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang // ral gri thabs dang phub kyi tshul dag dang // rdo rje skyil krung rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs// shes rab 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed kyi ni lho phyogs tsam// rdo rje 'joms tshul dang ni rdo rje ro langs dang // rdo rje thabs dang mdung gi thabs ngag dang // pad+ma'i 'dag stangs gsus po che yi thabs// rta mgrin gyis ni nub kyi phyogs su 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// rkang pa ya gcig stangs dang rdo rje tho ba dang // 'khor lo'i thabs dang sems dpa' skyil krung dang // sprin sgra dang ni gzhu yi thabs dang ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byang phyogs nas brtsam mo// seng ge
14b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang rdo rje gdu'u dang // ba dan thabs dang thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs// bzang po'i 'dug stangs pur bu brdung ba yi// shar lha'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal pos brtsam// seng ge glal dang bud ma/ 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul thabs// zhags pa'i thabs dang mchod sbyin pa yi thabs// cog pu'i 'dug stangs dang ni ra ba'i thabs// lho nub mtshams nas dbyug pa sngon pos brtsam// rdo rje sgrog dang stobs po che gdengs dang / 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i stabs dang mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs// rtse bo'i thabs dang mtshams bcings pa yi thabs// nub byang mtshams dang stobs po ches brtsam mo// bung ba 'phur stangs zhal bzhir byin brlabs dang // btun 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): shing thabs dang mda' 'phangs pa yi thabs// dpa' bo 'dug stangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan stangs// byang shar mtshams nas mi g.yo mgon pos brtsam// rdo rje gsor ba dang ni rdo rje mche ba dang // be con thabs 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): dang thag pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs// phyir 'gyed pa dang phyogs bcing ba yi thabs// steng gi phyogs nas 'khor lo sgyur bas brtsam// rdo rje sgeg pa dang ni rdo rje gad mo dang // mi 'jigs pa yi thabs dang phyag 'tshal 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi thabs// pur bus gnas lngar gdab dang mtshon cha lnga yi thabs// 'og gi phyogs nas gnod mdzes gyis brtsam mo// de rnams kyis ni bgegs kyi tshogs// ru dra'i bi bo sha na
15a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // tshangs pa'i srin po gza' phur bu// gtso bo drug cu rtsa bzhi sprod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo/ 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyor bas// gal te gang gis bdag bka' 'goms// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// 'dod gsum bskyed lus bshig byed de// 'jig par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// bgegs bsal
15a4(rgyud 'grel): bya phyir phur bu yang // stod ni khro bo smad zur gsum// bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams nas su// dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): paM phaT// hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ de las 'od zer 'khrugs shing 'bar// phyogs bcu bdud bcom slar 'dus nas// mtshams dang ra ba 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): gur bcing pas// dkyil 'khor sa ni srung ba'o// sa gnon phyag rgyas sa la mnan// sa yi lha mo bton gyur nas// me tog sogs pas mchod nas ni// skran phyir gsol ba gdab par bya// skyob pa sangs
15a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dad pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang por gsol// skyob pa shAkya seng+ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa// de ltar bdag gis 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): bdud bcom nas// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de skad gsol nas zhal gyis bzhes// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni gtsang gtor sogs// byas nas de ru nyal bar bya// mtshan 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis pa'i cha dang por// 'i ma sogs kyisas bskalal// me tog se la ma la sogs pabs// can na mchag/ sags pa \u0f7f// dgyid de 'dzin gsumams// yangan lag par mos pa 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): yis// rten dang bcas pa dam tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor rab tu dgod par bya// de nas bdag nyid spro bskyed la// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// byin brlabs mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): myang bas mnyes par bya// bum pa nag nog med pa la// mchu 'phyang zhabs ni brtan pa dang // rdo rgyas chus byug nyi shu gcig/ yang na drug tu sta gon bya// mgur pa dar gyi cod pan mtshan// a mra 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kha rgyan can// spos bsregs dri zhim chu yis bkang // rang rang sngags kyis bzlas pa'o// 'bru lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga// 'khor lo dri chu yon snod bsdu// mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// rnam rgyal bum pa bdag pos bzlas// rdo rje pad+mas btsir nas su// me tog dkar po de ru gtor// bdag gi slob ma thams cad la// dbang bskur mdzod cig gsol ba gdab// bdud rtsi 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil bzlas bum pa la// ku sha'i bam por bcas pa yis// bdag gi slob ma thams cad la// bgegs bzlog gsol zhes snyan gsan dbab// de rnams byin gyis brlab byas la// thun gsum
15b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma phul nas kyang // mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// so so'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya// 'khor lo sngon bzhin mchod byas la// lag par pog por thogs nas su// pus mo 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): btsugs nas thal sbyar bas// dkyil 'khor sogs la snyan gsan dbab// bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje yi// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po/ 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): bri bar 'dod pa ste// slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed la mchod pa'i don du ni// de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la// byin rlabs gnang bar mdzad par rigs// dgongs 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): shing bdag la sangs rgyas dang // 'gro ba'i 'khor lo don byed rnams// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gang zhig gzhan yang sngags kyi lha// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po byed 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): chub ston pa rnams// sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba'i// gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can rnams// che ge bdag ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems 'byung ba// ji ltar nyer spyod nus pa yis// / 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro dag don du bri bar bya// slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni// thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// snyan gsan lan gsum 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol nas// mchod pa la sogs rab sbyar nas// mtshams la sogs pa bcings nas ni// phyi rol byung nas slob ma bzung // shes rab chen po dga' chen po// nga rgyal med cing drin lan 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): shes// rigs ldan yon tan dad pa che// gzugs mdog gzhon pas brgyan pa'o// gsang sngags kyi ni grub pa mchog/ 'dod pa rab tu ldan 'gyur na// dman pa'i rigs dang byad ngan dang // yon// / 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): tan med kyang gzung bar bya// slob dang yid ches dang ldan dang // theg chen dga' ba'i bdag nyid dang // dkyil 'khor mthong dang sngags 'grub 'dod// tshogs 'phel phyir ni 'khor lor bzung // 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): snod ldan 'khor ni bzhi po dang // 'di dang pha rol bsod nams 'dod// snod dang snod min rab bsgrags la// bdag nyid rang gi nang du 'gro// ting 'dzin rdo rje chu skyes kyis// sbyangs pa'i slob mas
16b1(rgyud 'grel): khang pa'i sgor// thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni// tshig 'dis lan gsum gsol ba gdab// ston chen khyod la bdag dga' bo// bstan po byang chub chen po'i lam// mgon po chen po bdag 'dod de// 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol// bdag la byang chub sems kyang gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // skyabs su 'gro ba bdag la stsol// thar chen khang pa brtsegs pa ru// mgon
16b3(rgyud 'grel): po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// de ltar brjod pas bla ma yi// slob ma gcig ni gtser byas nas// de sogs rnams la tshig 'di yis// gzhug phyir brod pa bskyed par bya// bu tshur shog 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): cig theg chen gyi// tshig sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// tshul chen khyed kyis bsten par gyis// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba// sku gsum thugs kyi 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can// gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyi don bsgoms yin// ci phyir dpag med sngags rnal 'byor// shAkya seng+ge sogs rab kyis// drag po chen po bdud kyi tshogs// 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): dpung chen de dag gzhom byas nas// 'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs nas su// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis// de ltar 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): bgyi zhes der 'dug nas// bla mas tshig gis byang chub sems// ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya// bskyed pa yin na 'phel bar bya// sdig pa bshags pa rjes yi rang // sngo dang gsol ba
16b8(rgyud 'grel): skyabs 'gro dang // byang chub sems bskyed lam bsten dang // smon lam gdab pa sngon 'gro bya// 'khyil bzlas bsrungs nas gnas gsum du// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma las// oM hUM A 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): bkab zlas la// rdorje la tsung dris chus byug/ smra bang po rtog mdun du zlos// mang za 'a rda'i snying gadra// las kun byed pa'i sngags bzlas nas// mchad pa'i don tu sbyin par 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): byA// a bat+pA dpa A t+pa war// me ga rje mang sorang bcu gas// drang ba dz+razham gyis byugs pa// dngas grub bltas byer sbyin par bya// hacang de min thung ba min// ku sha ldan po 'tha 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): zos// rmi lam ma 'azhugs pab shis m+b+hir// nyag ma gnyis ni sbyid par bya// sum sngam bdud pa gsum thus pa// 'brel ba'i sngags bzlas pa yig ga yen// ma yi dbang po g.yas 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrung ba cu m+b+hir bad ba \u0f7f// zhes sa m+b+halang zung rnam na ste// byed rnags gtsang bar bya ba dang // dgag nas pa snang byer sten// ma 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): sarbarnam pa snye sa bo ka lA a pa na ya d+h+waM// b+hair me lag dbang dkyil 'ja la// b+hi nas mgan pa bdag la gsungs// dkyil 'khor lnga me de nyid dang // zlab dpon gyi ni zin las dang // ma 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): bran gyi dmatshig dang // gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa rnams// rtag tu dbang gi slob dpon bgyid// sems can ku den byed dpyir stsol// de nas bla mas thun mang sdom// byin nas slob ma mdo yis kyang // 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): rig dbang thob phyir lan gsum du// bka' stsal deni byung bya'o// kun mkhyen gang du 'jig rten du// bde bar 'byung ba me 'byung baM// u dr-i wa ra'i me tog bzhin// gal te brgyal ma re 'ga' 'byung // 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): bas thob dka' 'byung ba ni// gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'did// ci byed dpag zad thams can don// bla na med pa byed nus pa// sa yang bzhal bdu ma yi// sngon du byas pa'i sdig pa gang // de na 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): zad par 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong bas so// gang gzhud mtha' yas grags pa yi// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas nas// bla med go 'phang byin pa ni// sngags bzlas pa las skye ba'o// 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo thos gtan du mi g.yob// sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi// ngan 'gro de dag gis gcod do// de ring dpag med rnyed pa ni// bdag chen khyed rnams kyis thab sa// 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): sras bcos rgyal bkun gyis kyang // bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams can// thams cad yongs su bzung gnas pa'i// skye bar gyur pa bdag chen gyis// de pyir khyed kyis bdag chen la// bde ba skye bar 'ong 'a 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ dpal ldan mchog gi theg pa 'di// chen por 'byung ba theg chen po// gang gis khyed chag 'gro 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'ong 'gyur la// zhal babang khyed ni de ring 'ongs// sang ni 'dus 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor chen// mthong dka' nga yi thugs rje yis// khyed kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o// kye bu dag nyon cig do nub ni// sin+ta kal stabs bzhin du nyol// khyod kyis rmi lam dge me dge/ 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba zo rangs bdag la spros// de ltar bgyi zhes rab gsol nas// de dag zhal bcug 'khyil pa yi// sngags bzlas dri chu byugs nas su// bsrung ba byas te gnas par bya// lhag par mos pas 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dmigs// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas te// bsdu zhing ye shes 'khor la ni// kha sbyar dbus su mkha' la bzhag/ tho rangs langs nas shar bltas te// so shing 'chos nas steng du bsgrub 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): b.lang ko tsam maN+Dal la// zhi ba la sogs grub par lta// sbyin dang srung ba la sogs la// 'khyil pa'i sngags ni mchog nyid las// mthong ba'i rmi lam mi dge bas// rang ngam des bzlas gzhom 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mtshan mo gsum pa'i cha dang por// skud pa rtag pa la sogs 'dra// de yi sa bon las byung ba// nyi shu rtsa lngar mos pa'o// mi bskyod rdo rje mig gnyis kyang // dza la nyi zlar bskyed 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): des mtshan// rdzi ma'i rlab rlab lcags kyu yi// mkha' yi 'khor lo las dgug bya// oM AHrnam par snang mdzad che// rang gi 'khor lo la mchod phyir// khyod kyi skud pa bdag la stsol// dip+ta dreSh+Ta badz+ra/ 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): a gu sha dza hUM// de ltar mi bskyod par byas pas// rang rang skud pa rang la thim// so so gnas pa'i skud pa kun// chos nyid sngags kyis bsgril bar bya// sarba d+harma s+pha ra Na a nu pra baiSh+Ta sarba d+harma at+yan 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ta u ru pra biSh+Ta~M d+harma// dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ring thung dang // sgo ye ni shu chas sbom pra// tsan dan mchog sogs dri zhim gyis// blugs nas gser dngul snod du bsrung // yi ge gsum gyi bar bsams 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): la// khrus byas rang lha'i ngargyal gyis// de nas skud pa bsdogs byas nas// 'khor lo thag ni gdab par bya// bdag nyid mi bskyod shar bltas nas// slob ma snang mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil// lte bar khu tshur g.yon 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas// nam mkha'i thig ni ma lus gdab// nam mkha' la gnas de bzhin gshegs// sems can don byed dus bab pas// gnas 'dir byon pa'i dus byed du// thig gi sgra yis bskul bar bya// oM badz+ra 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ gnod sbyin gshin rje brgya byin kla// phyogs su kha bltas phyogs bzhir gdab// me mtshams bder bral mtshams gnas nas// grwa yi thig ni rab tu gdab// de nas tshangs 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): thig logs gcig tu// sum char byas la mtha' gnyis dor// dang po che bzhir rab byas la// de yi dang po che gnyis so// de yi gnyis pa gnyis byas la// re re yang ni gnyis gnyis so// gsum 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang pos cha chung gnyis// de nas yang ni cha chung gcig/ de nas cha chung gnyis dor nas// cha chen gcig ni dor byas nas// cha chung gcig ni bcad pa'o// yang ni gnyis dor gcig bcad do// gnyis 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): dor gcig bcad de steng du// cha chung gnyis ni dor bar bya// de nas cha chen gsum ni bcad// de steng cha chung gsum dor nas// yang ni cha chung gsum dor bya// lhag ma cha chung gcig lus pa'o// de nas 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): thig skud nyis 'gyur byas// tsan dan phur bus dbus su gzugs// yang ni nang gi ra ba dang // phyi rol ra ba kun bskor bya// cha chen lnga ni rab bskor na// nang gi rdo rje ra ba ste// lha yi gnas la cha 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): chung lnga// byas pa'i byed gnyis ka bar 'gyur// b+hi yi 'khor lo cha brgyad la// cha gcig sgo yi dbus bya'o// de tshad lha yi snam bu ste// de byed 'khor sa chung ngug/ de yi tshe dkyi 'khyeras// dra ba drab byed 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // phreng ba shal 'phyang ba'i snam bu dang // de bzhin 'gram pa gshog pa'o// logs kyi phyi ro la ya phubs te// de ltar ka ba la yang ngo // de phyed rin chen pha gu dang // tshon sna lnga yis mnyam mo// 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'khor lo ka sogs dang // rdo rje ra ba'ang de bzhin no// ya phubs steng du cha chen gsum// tA ra Na yi sa ru 'gyur// cha chung drug la pad+ma dang // rdo rje ra ba bskor bar bya// cha chen gcig ni 'od dkyil 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor// bskor nas gcig ni nye 'khor las// ltas ngan gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur// thig skud chad na slob dpon 'che// lhag tshad byung na 'bras sogs 'byung // phyogs 'phrul slob ma spro bar 'gyur// 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): grubazhi sgo bzhi rta babs pazhi// rgyan cing dar sham me tog dang // 'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// brgyan pa'i 'khor lo mthong bar bya// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo yi zur kun chal yang // zla ba 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rdo rje dgod// gam pa'i sogs rab rgyad pa// rdzas bya' mang ma ri dgas gnyis// 'phan sogs kyis d+han tra // / ji ltar mdzes shing klubs par bya// sems can rnams 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bas ma dbang gis// 'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bas// bcom ldan 'das kyi cud 'dir// kun bcugags cad du gsungs// de la chubacu gnyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i rdo rngam 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzungs dang yan tan gyi rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / chos 'chan pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje zlu maM dang / sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rdo rjeg ma dang / thugs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rna rdza bdug pa 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rdo rje me tog ma dang / 'gro ba gzhan dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje mar me dang / rdul khrims la sogs pa'i rdo rje drachab ma dang / sbyin pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje kyob ma dang / snyan par 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsol ka ma dang / don mthun pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje pho nya ma dang / don spyod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'bebs pa ma ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// // de bzhin du 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): sa'i dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' dang / thams cad 'gugs nus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje rgyal pa dang / de bzhin 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje chags pa dang / gzi brjid bstod cing dga' ba'i yon tan rdo rje legs pa dang / chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin chen dang / 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjed gzhan las 'phags pa'i yon tan rdo rje gzi brjid dang / ra ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje dpal rab dang / 'dzum pas lung ston pa'i yon tan rdo rje bzhad pa dang / chos 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs shing so sor rtog pa'i yon tan rdo rje chos rab dang / sgrib pa yongs su gcod pa'i yon tan rdo rje rnon po dang / sku gsung thugs zad mi shes pa'i kun la khyab pa'i yon tan rdo rje rgyu dang / gsu 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): gi chos rab tu sgrogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje smra ba dang / sems can smin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje las rab dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje srung ba dang / gdul dka 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje gsum bsdus shing dbyer med pa'i yon tan rdo rje sdud pa ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o// // gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khwa nyi shu gsungs 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ de rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams sdud cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin po che'i rigs sdud cing dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlob pa'i rang bzhin yo// 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): tan rin chen rdo rje ma dang / pad+ma'i rigs sdud cing chos kyi phyag rgya byed gyis rlob pa'i yon tan chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rigs sdud cing las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan las kyi rdo rje ma ste/ 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): dernams rnam par dag pa'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ de rnams bcu rnam par dag pa ste/ sa bcu ni ye shes lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro// ji skad du gsang ba'i thig le nor bu'i rgyud phye ma las/ 'di 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// lam rnams dag ste ram pa bzhin// bcu ga nyi sa bcu drug nyi zu ru// ye shes la ni ye shes gnas// thos dang bsam pa bo ni// kyo ba la sogs rang bzhin no// 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): rab brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin// thar chags sdug pa la sogs so// drod la sogs pa dang por sbyor// sgeg mo la sogs ngo bo'o// lhag ma nyi shu gnyis gnyis kyang // sa re du ni rnam dag pas/ 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rten du yang dag 'tsham// stegs bu 'di yang 'khor lo yi// rten du yang dag gyur pas na// rnam par dag pa mngon du bya'o zhes so// mdor na za ba gsal gnyis med las// / 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i khyad par 'byung bas na// rigs dang tshad sogs nges med pas// khru gang nas brtsams stong phrag brgya// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'byung khungs nas 'byung dang // sA lu btags
20a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phye ma la// snga ma'i rim bzhin 'khor los dbab// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod de// gser sogs snod du bdug par bsre// gsal bar bsams nas gsang sngags 'dis// mngon/ 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas pa rab tu bya// badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs nas su// chos dbyings kyis ni 'di nyid dag/ sems can dbyings ni rab sgrol mdzad// rgyal ba'i mchog ni mi 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod mgon// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// skyon kun las ni grol bar mos// bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbang ldan mtshams nas phyi rol nas// ri mo lnga ni bri ba'o// dkar po 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ser po dmar po dang // ljang gu nag po nang du'o// g.yas su bskor cing chad med pas// rdul mtshon ri mo bri ba'o// sbom por bris na nad 'byung ste// phra bas nor zad 'khyog 'thab 'byung / 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi// de bas phyogs kun mnyam par 'gyur// g.yas skor tshul du mi 'debs na// tshon la pur bus gdab par bya// rdo rje rtse mo gnyis dkar mo// gzhan ni ser por 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// pad+ma rAg 'dra ba gzhan// ma ra gta lta bu ste// dbus mnag por shes byas nas// tshon gyi rim pa de ltar ro// shar gyi phyogs su dkar po che// lho ser nub dmar byang ljang gu// dbus ma'i 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): cha phyogs rabs bskor// in+d+ran+ti la'i kha dog go// de dus rlung dang sbrul sogs sprul// bgegs dgra'i phyag rgya dran byas nas// snang ba'i dgra yi sngags rgyal 'di// brjod pas de dag sel bar bya// 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): nam sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To Ta ka Ta b+hai re ba ya a si mu sa la bar shu pA sha hasta ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi ShA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha daH/ 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarbaM big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka/ ma hA ga na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra ya hUM phaT// / de ltar rdul tshon btab gyur nas// pad+ma'i gdan la nyi maM dang // zla ba rab tu 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): bkod byas nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa'o// dbus sau rdotsa rtsa lnga pa// in+d+ra nI la li kha dge 'dra// shang du lde brgyad 'ja jal na// zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang // lho dro rin chen zur dgu pa// margad lta 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i 'od zer ldan// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dmar po 'od zer dang ldan pa// byang du ral zi rin chen yu// sngon po 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// me mtshams spyan ni sngon po'o// bden bral mtshams su 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bri// rlung mtshams pad+ma sdong bur bcas// dbang ldan ut+pal ldang ser can// phyi rol me mtshams la sogs dang // shar sgo g.yas g.yon gru gnyis la// me long pi wang dung dang snod// gos dang 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'byung gnas bri// tho ba 'bar ba shar sgo bri// rdo rje dbyug pa lho sgor bri// pad+ma nub kyi sgo ru zi// rdo rje kha bye byang du bri// shes rab thabs su rab ldan pas// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag ste bya// 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnams// 'phro ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya// de nas lha rnams gnas bya'i phyir// sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mA ma kI ru byin gyis brlab/ 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): / gnyis sbyor rjes su chags bskyed nas// sangs rgyas rang gi nang du gzhug/ cho ga gsum gyis bsgrub byas nas// bzhi pas gnyis su med par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i sgra yis ni// sangs 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug/ bskrad nas srung bya sngon bzhin du// mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya// mchod stod bdud rtsi myang byas nas// shes rab mthar byed kyis gzhug dang // bcings 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): te dga' byas nyer sgrub dang // sgrub pa dbang bskur gyis mtshan pa'o// sngon bzhin mchod pa yang byas te// de bzhin bstod dang bdud rtsi myang // gsal bar bsgoms nas bzlas brjod dang // reg
21a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pas mnyes bya'o// de bzhin gyi yi dri la sogs// sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas// rang gi sa bon las sprul te// 'khor lo yang dag mchod pa'o// 'di ni yang dag bdug paste/ 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dang ni sbyar ba'i dri// bdag gi 'bul ba 'di bzhes la// bdag la bka' drin spu la du gsol// badz+ra d+hU be pu dza s+pha ra Na// sna tshogs me tog yid 'ong ba// rab tu yid 'ong 'bar ba yi// 
21a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag me tog 'di// bdag la rtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra puSh+pe pU dze s+pha ra Na// ting 'dzin mar me dge ba 'di// sreg byed ngan 'gro 'jigs las skyog/ lha yi sman ni thob byed pa// 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na// ga bur la sogs byug pa ni// dri zhim la sogs me tog rgyan// hUM dbyangs snyan par rol 'byung 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol// badz+re gan+d+he pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs bza' ba yid 'ong ba// bza' dang bcas dang ldag dang bzhig/ yid 'ong gdung ba sil ba 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra nai bi t+ye pA dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs btung ba yid 'ong ba// 'bru yi chang dang bcos pa'i chang // myos byed bdud rtsi dpa' bo 'di// bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol// badz+ra su ra pA dza s+pha ra Na/ rin chen ri 'am
21b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho ri chen rnams// bzhad dang sgeg dga' rol dang bde ba dang // dpag bsam shing dang na bza' shing rnams kun// 'khor lo bla mar bcas la dbul bar bya// bo d+hi rat+na a laM ka ra/ ha sa la se ra ti kri ha so khyA a nut+ta 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): ra/ a nut+ta ra bo d+haM laM ka ra bsta// pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes dbul lo// srungs nas phyi rol byung nas kyang // phyogs skyong rang rang rnal 'byor nas// sdig med sha khrag chu zan gyi// gtor ma bul 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): nas nang du 'gro/ 'di ni gzhan du bshad pas deng shes par bya'o// gos dang rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// rdo rje hUM mdzad bdag bsgyur la// dkyil 'khor bskor ba yang byas te// phyag 'am la me tog sngon po dar// 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag pos bcing bsams mgo ru bcings// de yi gong 'og cho ga rnams// rnam par dag par 'gyur bas na// dag pa'i dag pa rnam dag pa'o// de nas lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir// thob la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i// sbyin
21b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg gnas su song nas kyang // sbyor ba ldan pas mnyes par bya// 'di'i cho ga yang gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mchod pa yang byas te// shis pa'i phyir na bkra shis glu// 'khor lo bskor
21b7(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag nyid kyis// phebardob pa yi gar gyis kyang // hUM hUM 'khor ba don byed sku 'dzin pa// gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchod// mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig/ te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM// khyod kyi zhabs 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma la// lha dang mi yis 'dud pa'i mchog/ sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs dag/ mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig/ te na hAM te na hUM te na te ta hA/ dngos po rnam grol rnam par bsnyen// gsang ba'i gsang ba
22a1(rgyud 'grel): / 'dzin pa khyod// bdud rtsi mtha' med gsol ba khyod// khyod kyi dgongs pa pad rgyas yin// te na d+hu te na hU~M ten te te hUM// rtsom spangs sems can don mdzad pa// rgyu med gzugs la phyag 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// te na hUM te na d+h+r-i te na te te hUM// dung dang ku mu da yi gzugs// rgya mtsho dngas ma zla gzugs 'dra// te na hUM te na hA te na te te hUM// rol pa gnyis med rnal 'byor mdzad// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): te na hAM te na hAM te na te te hUM// sgra 'bral las kyi 'gro ba bzung // rkyen gyis ma byas gzugs can yin// te na hAM te na hAM te ne te te hUM// de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim// bdag nyid zhugs byas lha yis kyang // / 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): chu nas bka' stsal bar gyi dbang // bskur bsams 'khor lo de la ni// slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang ba las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa yi// de bzhin nyid ni lan gsum brjod// 
22a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i sems// rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin// mi bskyod rdo rje der grub shog/ mchog chen dngos grub thams cad dang // dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lha// 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs// dam pa'i yi ge grub par shog/ skyon med rtag pa la sogs pa// 'dod chags kun la rje su chags// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// de nyid bcom ldan pa dag la grub// 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): gtan tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod ma nas grol de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub po// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yis// 
22a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snying gtso bdag la ni// rdo rje sngags chen grub par shog/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// sems can kun gyi de bzhin pa// dam tshig mchog gis 'dod pa'i mchog/ bden pa gang
22b1(rgyud 'grel): gis ye shes kyi// shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po khyod kyi bden pa des// bdag gi 'dod pa yongs su skongs// gzugs brnyan dang ni mnyam pa'i chos// dag cing dang brnyog med pa// gzung
22b2(rgyud 'grel): med brjod du med pa yang // rgyu dang rkyen la kun tu byung // de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni// de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob pa ni// sdig med pas ni blta bar bgyi// thun mong sdom pa dang 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa// bsnyen sgrub gsum gyis bsgrubs nas su// yol bas bar du bcad pa la// 'khyil bzlas chu yis gtor bar bya// dmar po sham gyis gdang g.yogs nas// dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri// 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bskal ldan bdag yin zhes// 'jug pa po yis smra bar bya// de nas me tog snyem bkang nas// 'khor los bzhes shes gter nas ni// gteng sems bskyed nas bla ma la// yon ni rab tu dbul bar 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): bya// yul mkhar khyim dang glang po rta// bran dang bran mo chung ma drug/ bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang // gang gis rang gi lus 'di yang // deng nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi// ci'i phyir na dbul byan// slob dpon du ni 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): nyer gnas phyir// rdo rje chen pos nyer gnas phyir// sems can thams cad skyob don du// bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi// hUM gi snying gar rdo rje bsgom// oM badz+ra yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi// su ra ta stA si d+hi badz+ra 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): ya thA su khaM// brjod pas byang chub sems bskyed la// lus kyi 'khor lo bskul bar bya// de rir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
22b8(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen 'di// dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// dad par mi byed pa yang mi rung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'am// a khaM bi ra hUM/ 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ drangs nas 'jug pa'i sgor gnas te// snga ma'i sdom pa brtan par bya// de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rigs la rab tu chud do// de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bskyed par bya'o// ye shes des khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du ma smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro// snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas// gal te tshul 'di 'das na ni// snying 'gas 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal de ltar 'byung // badz+ra satwa hUM/ pad+ma'i ban d+har bdud rtsi lnga// yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la// rdo rje yi ni de yi khar// mi ldog phyir ni blud par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam las 'das 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i// bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung zhig/ badz+ra u da ka tha// de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas// sems g.yo dogs phyir bstan pa yi// dam bcas 'di ni bla ma yis// 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya// de ring phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ra yin gyis// ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyis bya dgos so// khyod kyis bdag pa brnyas par mi rung ste// brnyas na yang ba ma spangs 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): pas shi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar ma 'gro zhig/ de nas slob ma de yis kyang // brtan nas rang nyid dag bya'i phyir// gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog/ spros shig ces ni bla mas smras// de bzhin gshegs pa 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis// byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag cag la dbab du gsolo// de yi snying ga ru ni hUM// laM byung dbang chen dbus su bsam// mgrin par a ni baM byung ba'i// chu yi dkyil 'khor 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bsam// spyi bor te ni dkar po che// yaM byung rlung dbus bsams nas ni// skul byed d+hi ni rkang mthil gnyis// rlung gi bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab// oM A be sha ya staM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsA la ya tsA la ya/ hUM a 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): hadz+nye/ rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas// 'jigs rung gar gyis smin rings bskyod// mig bzad so gtsigs bzhad byed pas// slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya// lce la thig le'i yi ge AH/ bsams nas bzlos shig dge mi
23b3(rgyud 'grel): dge/ 'bru hi badz+ra zhes brjod nas// dbab pa brtan par bya'o// pra ti badz+ra ho brjod la// me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug/ de yis bcings par rab bsams la// blangs nas mgo ru bcing bar bya// 'di ni stobs
23b4(rgyud 'grel): chen sems dpa' bas// 'di yi ma 'dres so sor zung // phyag mtshan nye ba 'am mi nye ba// re'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o// yang na rang gi skal pa yis// gdong phye me tog de la gtor// mig gnyis o 'bar
23b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas ni// gdong phye las kyi kha dog bstan// de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// nan tan byas te khyod mig phye// bla na med pa'i rdo rje mig/ thams cad la ni mig phye 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gtso bo gnas brtsams nas// 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan pa 'am// yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las// gtso bo'o bar du bstan bya'o// slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag bzhugs so// 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de skad lan gsum brjod par bya// bum pa rnams chu gcig
23b8(rgyud 'grel): tu bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rab bskyed la// zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru// 'khor lo sgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya// rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la// rin chen 'byung ldan gyur byas te// dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas/ 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): cad pan dang ldan dbang bskur bya// narnga rtsem dbu lnga pa// 'ad dpag med bskams yangs gyur te// byin nas snying gar da bzung ba// rderje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya// dril bu dan yang grub pa ru// 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas yongs gyur byed nas ni// rdo rje dril bu la 'khru tshul// bdag por dbang ni bskur ba bya// spyi gtsug lhag pa rab bcug ste// sme bar phyag reg ming gi dbang // tshi ge rdo rje zhes bos nas// khyad par gzhan 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): yang mthong bar bya// gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste// de yi gtso bo me bskyed mgon// ches rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pas// chas kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul// kun gyi gtso ba yin pa'i phyir// ming gang dpal gyi sgra 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya// go ba nyid du bsgrag pa'i phyir// dang po kye 'byor mtha' yi bar// hUM bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas// 'chang ba'i rdo rje lan gsum gsor// brtul zhugs 'di ni dang po ru// rnal 'byar pa yis blang bar bya// 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas// rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste// lag pa rdo rje brtul bzhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta si d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi de nyid bshad par bya// sden mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i gtso bar gtso// a las byung ba'i dril bu ni// lag g.yon byin nas phyogs 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dkrol// brtul zhugs 'di yang dang po ru// de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs chen 'khrol bar 'dod// rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste// rgyal ba byang chub
24a8(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu 'dod// de nyid bshad par bya ba ni// 'di ni chos kyis dkrol bya s+t+wa~M// srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag byer// rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed// rang bzhin dag pas sems can kun// dam pa'i srid pa byed pa po// 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang // ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das// mngon byed 'das pa mchog 'di yis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs te// snying po bsnyen pa la sogs grags// 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'dod gzugs sogs rnams kyis// sngags ni dbugs su rtogs nas bzla// rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi// ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas// bdag dang gzhan
24b3(rgyud 'grel): yang mnyes par bya// dka' thub dam bcas de dag gis// bsten par byas kyang 'grub pa med// mi snang mngon shes mkha' 'gro med// sku gsung thugs las grub skyes so// de bas sangs rgyas sems can 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur// bde sdug gnyis med bdag nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten te// chags chen yi/ 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): shes don sbyor na// de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub// sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste// gang gzhan dman pa yang skye 'dod// de yang sku gsung thugs bsgoms nas// sngags bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o// thun mong 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yin sdom par ldan// sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas// rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir// de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar bgyi ba bzhin// bdag kyang 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// na mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol// 'jug pa'i sgo ru khru do bar// pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad la// sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri// seng ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug/ de nyid ting 'dzin 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan par// byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas sogs spro rnas dgug cing // na mkha'i khams kun dga' bar bya// de yis rnga dril sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan 'phan sogs pheg rdob/ 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): cing // bum pa gtso sogs gzung byas nas// sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyi phyag byas pa// gsang gsum gnas 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin pa yin// de skad lan gsum brjod nas su// dge ba'i phyir dang gis pa'i phyir// bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste// bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya// dpal 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba// 'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral// bcom ldan pad rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni de khyod zhi byed shog/ de yi bstan pa'i dri med mchog rab ni// 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa// cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed// bkra shis gnyis kyi deng 'dir khyed la shog/ dam pa'i chos ldan thos gang bkra shis shing // dge 'dun lha dang lha mis
25a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod 'os pa// ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi// bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog/ de nas de dag thams cad kun// ye shes ngo bor zhugs bsams pas// dbu rgyan ye shes 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bskyed// bskor byas slob dpon gnas par bya// sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi myang ba yang byas nas// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya// sangs rgyas ma rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir//
