25a7(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi ru ni rab tu bstan// dran pa nye bzhag shar gyi sgo// yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nub kyi sgo// dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo// bsam gtan bzhi ni tAr Na// ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer/ 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): brgyad// gzungs rnams dang gnas lha mo'o// bsam pa bskod byer lha tshogs can// gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogs so// byang chub yan lag dra ba sogs// rnam par thar brgyad ka ba brgyad// 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum// byin log rnam dag yon tan lnga// dri med stobs sogs mchod pa lnga// bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang // tshogs rdzogs ser po ye shes gter// 'gro ba rnams dang dbyer 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): ming kyang // de mnyes thos mgos byag// sna tshogs pad+ma brdud dra ni// sdong za na sa pa'o// mi dge'adas rdzab sa pa dkyang // dag pa'i mu gug so mdzad pa// nyi ma'i gdan ni bdunanams 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): so// tshan sangs chab bsil byed dang // mngag san na gsum ze'i phreng// theb bajug/ sa dang ldan pas/ ya thag mardzum ga / 'jab la sogs dus bcug tus// bang dus sgron bdun napa 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pas// zangs nings par bsan pa'o// na mangs thams ca las nam byeng // nan la mam 'ang du brtags pa yin// skang sa lan 'drus pa'i phyir// dkyil 'kho zhes su bshad pa yin/ 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa zhe sdang thugs// chos dbyings nam dag mi bskyod pa// gzugs phrang gti mug bye dang sku// me long rnam dag rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid// nga rgyal rnam dag rin 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung // 'du shes phung po 'dod chags gsum// so sor rtog pa sdang mtha' yas// 'du byed phung po nan tan dang // phrag dog rnam dag don yod grug/ sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni// snying rjen 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): byed spyan ma'o// byams dang mtshan med smon lam dang // chu khams srung byed mA ma kI// dga' dang smon med stobs dang ni// me khams rgyas byed na bza' dkar// btang snyoms ye shes rang bzhin gsal 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): rlung khams sgrol byed sgron ma'o// sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje// tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje// bzod pa rnam dag dri rdo rje// brtson 'grus rnam dgar rdo rje// bsam gtan rnam dag reg rdo rje/ 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rnam dag chos rdo rje// phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyi'i// dbyung sngags ting 'dzin gsungs pa'o// mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir// de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs// 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyung sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas// sa snying la sogs phyir mi dgod// 'jigs sogs shes bya'i phung po'i bdud// dad dag gshin rje gshed 'gugs pa// nyon mongs de bdud mthar 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin lha// brtson dag 'jug byed shes mthar byed// skye sgrib 'a che bdag log par lta// dran dag 'ching byed rta mgrin no// las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha// ting 'dzin mgu mdzad bdud rtsi 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grel// chas dang langs spyod sprul pa dang // jo bo nyid de rnam bzhin// thugs sogs ni rje yogs sems// phyag rgya ba'i zhes bgad pa yin// rnam par rtag pa dang bral byed// gting dpag dka' 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): bas zab mo ste// phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba// rang gzhan smin byed gsal ba po// zab mo dang ni yang dag gsal// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de// mtha' gnyis skyon ni rab bkab pas// dus thams 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): cad du dbyer med do// de bzhin slob ma dbang bskur dang // dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sgrub pa'i thabs ni rab bstan pas// gang zag gnyis su shes par bya// gzugs brnyan glegs pa la 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// yod na khyod kyis rab gnas mdzod// de ni ji srid bar du ni// sems can don du 'gyur ba'o// de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang // bka' stsal pa yis dbang bskur nas// bskyed pa'i 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): rim pa kun bstan te// dka' lung g.yar gyi blang ba'o// bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o// lo 'am yang na zla ba ru// rlig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas// lus dang zang zeng thabs dang bcas// spyod pa mchog 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): gis bla ma bkur// rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa// rjes su mthun pa dbul bya ste// bla ma dgyes par byed pa'i ched// bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba// rgyan ldan dam sdom dbang bcas pa// lus rgyas mdzes 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dbul byas na// bla ma'i g.yon du bu mo bzhag/ rgyal po mu stegs chom rkun gyis// gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mchog gi bris byugs pang sogs gdan// bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyis klubs// 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs spras// gong gi 'khor ram yang na swa// tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis// dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas// me tog snyem bkang gsol ba gdab// kun mkhyen ye shes phung 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sags// pus gzugs pa la sbya mthe dpa' bas// gas pa na gi sa pa// yang dag zungs nas bsrung bar bya// ji ltar dbang bsrung sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas la sogs tho pa 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// byang chub spyod pa gzhan gyi ni// 'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med// de bas dam tshig pus srungs shig/ rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig/ sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste// de las gzhan yang dam 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig srungs// dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom// gzhan gyi bud med spyad pa dang // ma byin par yang blangs byas nas// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin// de ni 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du srungs// de ltar bya'o zhes gsol nas// yang ni me tog phreng ba gtor// thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba yi// dbang nod phyir ni gsol ba gdab// rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa// tshigs bcad lnga 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): yis lan gsum du// zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni// mdzes pas chas ldan gyis bya'o// de nas bla ma yon tan mtsho// mchog gi mchog gis de gsan nas// zhal ni mdangs dang ldan byas nas// snying 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): rjed la bskyed par bya// gzugs sogs bran sum tshogs ldan pa'i// lha mo da ni byin rlabs nas// thub pa'i dbang po zhus byas zhus// rdo rje nang du gnas par bya// mthe bo srin las 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): gis bkab nas// slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar// spro ba'i sngags kyis phab nas su// gnyigs 'di ni brjod par bya// a ho a ho su kha ho// gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gi// dbang bskur byas 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): nas mgrin pa ru// de nyid myong bar byas nas su// de nas 'di yis bsngags pa'o// de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi// dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste// thams cad sngags ni grub 'gyur te// las mchog 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par can yang 'grub// zla ba zab rab byung ba// lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal pa// 'og nas 'byung bzhin sbyin par bya// rdo rje bzlas pas phyi nang tshogs// sgyu ma rmig sgra la sogs pa'i// 'dod don 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan mdog dang dbyibs// bsam mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sra// bsgom pa la gnas de sgom gzhug/ gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o// de bzhin gong ma'i rim po yis// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig pa che// 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): btsal te bla ma dgal yon// rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya// sngon bzhin gsol btab sdom pa blangs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): ban// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rungs 'gyur// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' ye// lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// mdor na sems cad 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// bsam gtan rngarje bskul bar bya// de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam chos rab tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi thi// glegs pa ma klag par mi bya zhing // mchod rten dag gi las maH/ 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya// yang ni me tog gtor byas nas// mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i// tshigs 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas// shes rab ye shes yang dag blang // de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang // dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas// bde chen za ma tog gi ni// lha mos sngags pa rab tu brjod// 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag mdun du gnas pa'i lag/ g.yas g.yon 'og dang steng bzhag nas// byin gyis brlab pa'i lha mo 'di// sngags 'di yi ni sbyin par bya// yid 'ong gzungs ma 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod du/ 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): gang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa yis// dam pa'i bde ba khyod kyis myong // de nas rab mnyam bzhag pa yis// dal ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyis// rdo rje skyil krung nang du sems// rin chen dkyil 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): du rtogs par bya// rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan// dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel ba// yol bas bcad de bde myong la// sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas them// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha/ gti mug rang bzhin gti mug sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyan gyi dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang dang bzhin zhe sdang sbyor// zhe 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): sdang dga' ma dang ldan par// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur na// 'dod chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na// rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// shes 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes so// de nas bla mas g.yon pa yi// phyag ni slob pa'i spyi bor bzhag/ de bzhin gshegs kun dbang byas la// rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya// de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog/ chos kun gnyis su med pa la// gnyis kyis rnam par mtshon pa yin// de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru// khyed kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i brtul zhugs blan med// thun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na// mchog gi dngos grub de la med// de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang grags// sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas// gsal zhing rab dga' mtha/ 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i// man ngag tuni nyid brtag/ blam de bzhin gshegs gyung nas// snying ga khwa chung chos gos g.yon// g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag r+b+ha bya// bdag rnyid bzhengs nas lung ston bya// oM kye la bdag gis 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): lung 'di bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sred pa'i ngan 'gro thar byas nas// yang dag srid pa grub pa'i phyir// sarbas stengs 'og tu// kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba// rang 'byung rang zhing grub 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ sngags pa gang la lung 'di stan// de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso// bla na med pa'i byang chub la// bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin// lung bstan pa'o// ji ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis// slob 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): mas yon tan brjod par mos// dam tshig gsum gyis dbugs phyung nas// 'di yis sngags pa brjod pa'o// dam mchog gsang chen dkyil 'khor la// rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na// khyod ni 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa kun las grol// de ring shin tu kho nar gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyen chad shib yod med de// mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis cang // rol zhing 'jigs par gal 'gyur// 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das// srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir// yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog/ srid pa bstan du dngos grub po// dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di// rig ma rtag tu bsrung bar
28b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs// byang chub sems ni spang mi bya// gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes// de ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): med// dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya// ma rig pa dang gti mug gis// de ni bor bar mi bya'o// rang bdag yongs su spangs pa dang // dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya// ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung na// 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'di las 'byung // rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang spang bar byar mi rung // bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam phyir// rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// de ni sangs rgyas kun ma 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// slob dpon la ni smod byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad sprad pa yin// des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob// rims dang 'or dang drag dang nad// mkha' 'gros gtses dang bzung ba dang // bgegs dang tshogs/ 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag drag po yis// bsad nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// mchog gi dge ba mngon 'gyur ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon bla chen la// nam yang brnyas par byang mi rung // gus 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): pas bla ma'i yon du ni// rjes su 'azad pas dpral bar bya// des ni rim ngan la sogs pa// phyi nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// sangs rgyas kun dang de mnyam phyir// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur// de byin bsod nams tshogs yin pas// tshogs las byang chub 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur// ci phyir shin tu 'dir gnas pas// khyed kyi tshe 'di 'bras bur bcas// dam tshig lha dang mnyam pa ru// gnas par the tshom med pa'o// rdo rje dang bcas sangs rgyas 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur bas// rgyal po chen po khams gsum na// rgyal po gtso bo bstan par 'gyur// de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas// gnyal yas khang mchog tu chud phyir// 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar// khyab bdag gis ni the tshom med// rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje de dag kun mdzod cig/ zad med rang gi dam tshig bde// bde bar sems bskyed la bsnyen cing // 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): myur bar 'gro ba'i bde chu ru// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yi// mnyam pa re ru gyur nas su// khyod rnams de la 'gro bar shog/ dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te// bla ma'i zhabs kyi 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gyis// sogs pa'i tshig gis thams cad kun// snang ba'i dbang ni blang bar bya// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// sems can rang bzhin du 'gro bgyis// de lta de ltar sems can don// 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags la sogs dag par bya// nyin re yi ni mtshams gsum la// ting 'dzin gsum gyi sgor ldan ni// bsgrubs nas sgrub pa thun mong dang // cig shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya// mi snang sto ba ni// 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): chung ngu la// mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la// rigs 'dzin dag ni stong gsum la// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro kun gtso// zhi brgyas pa sogs las gang // de las gzhan nam gang 'dod pa// dkyil 'khor kun tu 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): chags sbyor na// bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par 'ong // rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis// 'dod chags de nyid don bsams te// sems can thams cad phan byed pa'i// byang chub 'dod chags las skye 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// de bas byang chub 'ad sngags pas// mugasu dbugs ni bsgoms byas te// cho ga bzhin du las byed na// de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun// dga' ba'i sems 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis thams cad dbul// gang zhig 'phongs pas yid mi bde// dad pa'i mchog ldan de yin no// bka' bul ba'i dbang ngo // dad pa mchog tu gus ldan pas// bla ma'i zhabs ni skye bor blang // ji lta rje btsun bka' stsam 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar// de ltar bya zhes spyan sngar gsol// bkra shis smon lam dang ldan par// yang dag gnas par gyur cig brjod// snod rung byas pa'i slob ma la// bla ma shin tu dgyes pas na// de dag kun las gsang ba dang // 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi// bsgrags min mna' yis btab byas nas// som nyi med par bshad par bya// 'byor ldan slob ma kun tshogs nas// sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas// bla ma slob ma sbyor bar 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan// mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams// slob mas g.yon pa'i mthe bong ni// tha ma'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang // gung mo yis ni bzung byas nas// sdig pa rnams ni zhi bar bya// de bzhin de rus bdag dang // 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong rgyal po la sogs pa// zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni// yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o// bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang // bsam dang bsgom dang dngos grub bsgrub// zan 'jig rten las 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): grub dang // khyod kyis grogs ni mdzod cig ces// gsol ba btab nas gshegs su gsol// sngon bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang // glu gar sil snyan la sogs dang // bza' dang btung ba'i mchog 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis// bdag gzhan 'khor lo mnyes par bya// de nas pog snod lag thogs te// dril bu gsil nas pus mo btsugs// ye shes 'khor lo thams cad kun// sngags 'dis gshegs su/ 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): / gsol ba'o// oM sems can kun don mdza nas su// dngas grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsal// yang ni 'gyod par mdzod cig sa// 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin a dang AHdang hA// brjod pas ting 'dzin 'khor lo rnams// rdo rje gsum laM bsdu byas nas// de yang nam mkha' lta bur mos// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM A d+ha nut+pan+na twA ta oM a 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM sA hA zhes brjod pas// gzugs brnyan stong pa nyid dmigs la// snod gtsang ma ru bsngos nas su// 'dod pa la ni nyung shas sprin// lhag ma chu yi skye ba sogs// phan phyir gdugs dang 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan dang // 'phan sogs sil snyan rab ldan pa// dge 'dun tshogs kyis btegs nas su// chu bo chen por blugs par bya// rdo rje rtse mo sa ri mo dbye// bum pa bla re la sogs pa// 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): spyad rung bla mas blang bya ste// lhag ma gong bzhin dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'di ru gzugs brnyan dang // glegs bam la sogs rab gnas kyi// cho ga bya ba gzhan du bshad// mkhas pa rnams 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis der shes bya// 'di ni dang po rnal 'byor pa'i// dkyil 'khor cho ga dang por gsungs// gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa// cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya// cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas// 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs pa'i tsho gas bri bar gsungs// khams gsum skye bos smon 'jug phyir// rnam pa gzhan du mi bya'o// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben pa 'am// mchod rten 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' ra ba sogs// dgon pa'i gnas su spyad bya'o// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma// de bzhin bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u// cho rigs btsun zhing drang por skyes// rma sogs spangs dang bzhin 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing // so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba// skra gnag mig dkyus ring ba dang // rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che// bzung nas dbab par rab tu rtag/ de la gong du spros pa dang // snod rung sogs 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhus nas su// de rnams don du tshogs bskyed phyir// rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa bya// de bzhin sa btsal la sogs nas// sbran pa'i cho ga'i bar byas nas// lha dang bum pa sems can 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// sta gon du ni gnas par bya// thig skud rdul tshon byin brlabs nas// gong gsungs sdo ni khrus byas te// gos dang rgyan gyis rab klubs te// ri sga la sogs kyis bdug bya// de yi gnas 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum snga ma bzhin// dbang chen chu dang rlung dkyil 'khor// yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs la// rkang mthil gnyis su skul byed pa// rlung gis sbar bas sdig pa bsreg/ ye shes yang dag 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): dbab pa'i phyir// rigs gsum bdag nyid rdo rje dril// 'jigs rung gar dang bcas pa yis// de yi snying ga phye byas nas// chu dang mar bzhin ro gcig gyur// gzi byid la sogs ldan gyur na// 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): babs pa'i rtags kyis shes par bya// sman dang rnam par snang mdzad zhugs// khru gar tsam 'am khru do'am// khru lnga tsam 'am brgyad tsam du// 'jigs shing skrag tshul 'phar bar 'gyur// sdang ba 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas gos dkar zhugs// phreng ba'i sngags dang dbyung ba'i sngags// de bzhin snying po rigs pa sogs// ma brlabs par yang brjod par 'gyur// mi bskyod mA ma kI babam pas/ 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang pa 'ongs dus dag gi/ ji ltar byung 'byung dngos po rnams// skad cig gis ni yang dag ston// de nas sngags kyis brtan par bya// de gnyis bla ma slob ma'i tshul// thig 'debs 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni tshon 'gyed dang // phyag rgya 'am sku sogs 'god par byed// de nas mdun du 'dug byas nas// ji ltar bgyi zhes bka' nod byed// mchod pa sna tshogs rab byas la// ye shes 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): lha ni gshegs su gsol// gnod gnyis zas dang skom rnams dang // yon gyis mnyes par byas nas su// grangs lhag rung bar bya ba ste// rang gi gnas su btang bya'o// de nas 'khor lo gnas 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): bas ma dang // mchod dang zhugs dang dbang bskur ba// bsdu ba dang po rnal 'byor bzhin// cho ga rgyas par bya ba'o// 'di'am gong du slob ma 'am// gzhan don rab tu bya ba'i phyir// bri ba'i gsung 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga ni// gzhan du bshad pas der shes bya// 'di ni cung zad dbang gyur pa'i// bre ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni// tshul 'di dang ni mtshungs zhes bya// ye shes dbang 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur rnal 'byor pas// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog/ rdzogs pa'i bsam gtan gyis bsgrub bya// bla ma'i man ngag rab thob cing // sbyor shes de 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): dag lhur len pa// rtags shes dang po pha rol phyin// yul la zhen pa dang bral ba'o// bdag nyid chen po nyag gcig des// de 'dra'i sa bcu mgon po che// rang gi nus pa dang phrad pa// mnyes bya de yis 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag blang // me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// phyi rol nang du bcas sngon song // thal sbyar pus mo gcugs nas ni// bla chen de la gsol ba gdab// 'jig rten sgron mchog rnal 'byor kun la 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): 'phags// khyod ni skyon rnams dag pa'i pha rol phyin// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can kun sgrol ba// ded dpon chen po khyed la skyabs su mchi// bdag cag thabs bral 'khor bar 'khyams 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur te// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pas dmus long gyur// sdug bsngal gyis gzir yang dag don ma rnyed// bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis skyab du gsol// de skad gsol nas de yi tshe// bla ma bdag nyid 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po des// snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin pa'o// bu tshur shog cig bsam gtan gyi// 'khor lo chen po nga yis bstan// khyod kyis kyang ni mnyam zhog la// nga ya bkod 
31b3(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bar gyis// de skad gsol nas bsam gtan gyi// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di yis bsgom// lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba ni// skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas 'khor lo sbyar ba yis/ 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan 'khor lo rab rdzogs bya// ye shes 'khar lo bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun mngon sum zhugs// gang gsungs mchod pa'i cho ga ni// bsam gtan ldan pas mnyes par bya// 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid brjod pas 'khor lo bskul// zhugs sogs gong bzhin rab byas te// ye shes dbab pa sngon 'gro ba'i// mthong ba'i yul bzhin rnam par gnas// ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la// gnyis med 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gzhug par bya// de nas byin gyis brlabs brjod la// sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir// me tog 'dod par bya ba ste// sku 'am dbus su nub 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la babs na// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad// lte ba'i dbus su rab babs na// thun mong dngos grub brgad 'grub 
31b8(rgyud 'grel): po// sku smad cha ni gar babs kyang // zhe sogs dngos grub 'byung ba'o// ring zhing thal bas dngos grub kyang // da du nga rgyang ring 'gyur ba'o// phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin// sgrub pas ji bzhin 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): dus thob bo// ye shes babs pa'i mthu nyid kyis// dman mchog gsum dang rang gi las// ji skad bshad bzhin gyis rab thob// de las gzhan pa ji snyed pa// bla ma'i ye shes stobs 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// sbyar ba yis ni rnyed pa'o// de nas mkha' dbyings thams cad kun// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo khro ba tshogs// chu sogs rkyen bzung gang bar bsam// de dag 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis bum pa dang // gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang // brtul zhugs lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang // bka' stsal pa rnams rim bzhin dbang // de yis de yi byang chub ni// sku gsung thugs kyi 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub che// sems can thams cad phan 'dod pas// ngo mtshar chen po rab tu grub// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// mchod dang dbang bskur de bzhin du// byas nas gzhan la 'ga' 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): yi don// bsgrub phyir lung 'di bsgo ba'o// nga yis khyed ni dkyil 'khor du// bcug zin dbang bskur yang zin gyis// khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las// 'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces// gnang 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bsten la sogs pa la// 'jug par gang yin 'gyur ba ste// de yis kyang ni khyad shes bya// bsam gtan 'khor los phyung phyir ro// gnyis pa de ru 'jug mi nus// mthong ba'i yul la mngon zhen 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing // blo gros ngan zhing sbyor ba spangs// dad ldan snod rung de mthong nas// don rnams yal bar mi 'dor phyir// snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// ngag sogs chog sngon 'gro ba'i// phyi yi bya ba 
32a8(rgyud 'grel): bsten bya ste// ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// dbang bskur yang dag brtsam bya ste// gnyis med man ngag gis sbyang bya// de bzhin sku sogs 'khor lo la// 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga sngon bzhin rgyas bya ste// kun khyab chos kyi dbyings ye shes// thams cad de ru rnam dag pas// bde gshegs gnas su mi bskyod dgod// gzhan gyi gnas su gzhan bgod de// gnyis shes rdo rje 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon la sogs// khyad par gzhan yang rtogs pa bya// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma sogs// gong dang 'og gi cho ga rnams// sems kyi 'ba' zhig gtso bor gsungs// dman pa las ni mchog mi 'gyur// 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid glang po yan lta bu// gzugs la sogs la 'phan byed pas// ngan 'gro ga yang sar lhung bar 'gyur// de nyid rab tu rtogs byas la// dran pa'i thag pa dam po yis// dmigs pa'i ka ba la 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): btags te// 'dod bzhin pa yi yul spyod pas// ji lta bzhin du 'dus par bya// ji skad du/ sems can kun gyi sems gang ni// brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod// mnyam par bzhag na ting 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin te// de bstan pa las rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba las// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// zhe'o// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi bya ba bstan te drang srong ltar// dang po rab tu 'bring ba'o// khang skas yan lag dang po bzhin// sdeng byin ma yin dgos med min// de yi rten gyis de bzung ste// de nyid 'ba' zhig rtog par 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): bya// de bas sems la khyad par 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// de yi zhing khams yongs dag pa// sems nyid 'ba' zhig las 'byung ste// mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du// mi mthun ltar yang snang ba ste// de bas sems nyid rtogs par bya// rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad zin te// / dan nangs grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chag bshad par byar// da la sgrub pa pa gang zag ra// brtul zhugs sngal pa sngags ldan pa// ma brtan lnga yi brgyal bral/ 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): chung zad la shes dbang gyur pa// thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya// rlu dang ma chung bcas pa rnams// myur 'drar sems can dbyer med rtags// thun mang cug shes dngas grub kyi// grub pa ye shes dbang 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'o// de yi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas// shin tu dben pa'i ro dgon dang // rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang // rlung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dung byi khrod la sogs par yang // bsam gtan bsdus 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di bsgom mo// dgon pa chen po la sa phyogs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa dag tra ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub// lam gyi bzhi mad shing gcig 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): drung // mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// rab tu rnam par dben pa 'am// ri bo nags 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab chu ngogs su// ting 'dzin byas nas ting 'dzin 'thob// rdo rje 'gugs gnas mig sman dang // ka pA la ru bsgom par bya// yid du 'ong dang shis pa'i gnas// sgrub pa po yis rab nges 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bya// rjes su mthun pa'i shis pa'i zas// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // chu dang shel dang sman dang dri// phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyis// lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags// glang chen sha yis// 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes bsgrub// rta yi sha yis mi snang bsgrub// 'gugs pa ba lang sha yis bsgrub// khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub// nus pa yi sa ni dgug par bya// med na bsam pas rnam par/ 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// 'dod khams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi// 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur// gtso bo gze chen stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong bas bskul ba ma byas kyang // 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni
33b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba dam pa byang chub ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rmongs pa'i man ngag sems 'da'o// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang // dam tshig 'di yis rnam par 'grub// grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni// shin tu 'bebs pa thob pa yis// gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te// bsod nams tshogs 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag rdzogs// spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya// bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi// khyad par gang yin rtogs par mdzad// rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas// so so'i mtshan pa shes par bya// 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan dag gi bzlas pa yis// dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du// 'dod pas rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni// rmi lam du ni shes par bya// 5// rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): tha dad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyud dag pa 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang / rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang drag po la sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang / rme la ma na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag la mchod par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba 'am/ rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba dang / rmi lam na rdo rje
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'am spyan ma la sogs pa 'am/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btud cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mngon dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
34a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang / de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gtad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis nam mkha' la gdugs dkar po bteg cing / seng ge'i khri la bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na gdol pa'i bu mo 'am/ khyi 'am/ rta rgod ma sogs pa 'am/ snyoms par 'jug pa de dag phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o// gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mod tshal yid du 'or ba mthong ba dang / rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang mgur chu dang / nu 'bur dang / zur phud la sogs pas brgyan pa 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni// thun mong gis grub pa'i mtshan ma'o// rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin las// dzam+b+ha gser 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// de bas de dag thams cad kun// cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya// sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni// sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis// de dag rab 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): tra rtogs byas nas// sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang // ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// dben par gtsang gtor byas nas su// dgegs bslad sa la gsol ba gdab// cig shos la yang gsol 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya// sngon gyi rim pa shes byas la// sa steng rgyan dang ldan pa dang // dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du// dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyar bya// rdo rjes khyad par byas pa 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): yi// sa 'dzin lta bur byin rlabs la// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas// de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya// sngon bzhin rtag sogs gsol btab nas// byin rlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o// / 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): brang zas btab nas sa snang ste// nab gcigs gan gnas par bya// lharnams gnas par byas nas sa// khrod bskyed mtshad pa sa chags bsam// dgongs par byabye gong ma bzhin// 'tshar logs pa 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya// lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni// rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya// yod na bcu dgu nges pa'o// skud pa tshon rtsi 'dus byas la// sngon bzhin 'bebs pa'i tshe 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): ga bya// de yis thig dang tshon btab nas// zhal sogs ldan pa'i phyag rgya dgod// gzhan la ma thos sems can rnams// gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad// gnas rnams stong pa mi mdzes pas// 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): dad chung srid pas de ma sngags// mi rnams kyis ni phye ma yis// zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyur// yan lag ma rdzogs byin mi rlob// de bas lha yis mdzes pa sngags// rang gi phyag rgya'am 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis su// lha rnams rab tu gnas byas nas// byin brlab mngon du mchod pa sogs// brtsams te 'byung gtor khyad par du// rnam rgyal sbyor bas skyon bsal nas// tshim par bya phyir lha 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// ji srid rdzas kyi thabs rnams su// sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes bya'o// slob ma zhugs pa'i rim pa bzhin// bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya// sdig bshags me tog 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dor ba'i bar// byas nas lha rnams kyis gnang ba'i// sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs dang // lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsa la thob// de yis bsgrub pa 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhe na// dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis// thun mong cig shos bgegs
35a4(rgyud 'grel): bsal nas// spyi gzugs gyur nas rtag pa las// byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom// lnga dang bzhi pas mchog dang po// rab bskyed skye rim bzhi spangs nas// dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas// 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni cho ga bzhin du zhu// rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi// mA ma kI la sogs gyur nas// bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur// phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhus// de las rtag pa mngon bzhin bskyed// 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi thugs kar zla ba la// oM las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan// bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgya// gnas nos 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di bsgom par bya// oM AHoM dzi na dzika hUM// brjod pas oM las 'od zer tshogs// dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te// ba spu bu ga nas spros pa'i// 'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang byas nas// sangs rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas// rang gi ba spu bu gar bzung // brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas// yang nas yang du dus bzhir bsgom// / 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas// nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// 'byung po rnams la gtor byin nas// yang ni sbyor ba der zhen bya// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas// rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag/ zla ba phyed na 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): nges pa ru// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dri ba'i// sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje bskul po gsum du gnas// thams 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): cad sngon bzhin rab byas te// 'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru// A las pad+ma A yis mtshan// bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o// oM AHA ro lig hUM/ de yis sngon bzhin 'od dpag 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): med// spros te bkugs nas rang la btsud// bstan byas sngon bzhin rab bsgrubs nas// zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje chos ni bsten byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i 'od 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): thob ste// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bskyed de// thugs kar hUM las rdo rje la// hUM gi mtshan pa rab bsams la// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM AHhUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM// sangs rgyas mi bskyod chags rnams kyang // btsud nas chags par byas nas su// mngon bzhin nye mtshan mthong bsgrubs nas// zla phyed 'grub par the tshom med// ye shes lnga ldan bsten nin// 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba// ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// thams cad sngon bzhi ni rab gnas te// mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas// thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru/ 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): oM bsams bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM d+harma d+hA dz+nyA na rastu hUM// mi bskyod tshogs bkug sngon bzhin du// zhugs nas chags byas nye ba mthong // gtor ma btang nas rab bsgrubs nas// zla phyed mi bskyod 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba thob// mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang // gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ldan 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin bskyed// thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i// oM bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o// de dang 'dra bar bsrub par bya// oM AHoM sa man+ta dz+nyA na ras+t+ra hUM/ de yis rin chen 'byung ldan tshogs// spras 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bkug nas rab tu bcud// brtan byas gong bzhin rab bsgrubs na// zla ba phyed na rab tu 'grub// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'od dang 'dra// da ni byang chub bdag med dang // ye shes gas 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su 'gyur// 'od dpag med pa bsgom byas la// de yi thugs kar pad+ma la// gnas pa'i a naM bzlas byas pas// dpag med 'dra ba bsgrub par bya// oM A a~M pra ta bek+Sha Nadz+nyA nar sU hUM/ dza 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa'i tshogs spros pas// bkug nas brtan byas chags byas nas// gong ma bzhin du rab bsgrubs nas// zlab byed na 'grub par nges// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// dpag med pa yi 'od 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi// bag chen lam gyi mchog tu 'gyur// sngon bzhin don yod grub bsgoms la// thugs kar ral gri yu ba la// zla ba'i dbus su oM bsams la// sngags 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o// oM A oM bi ta a nusta dz+nyA na rastu hUM// de yis don yod grub pa'i tshogs// spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la// gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas nas// zla ba phyed na 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): de dag 'grub// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba 'ong // de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can don kun 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin snang mdzad bsgoms byas te// 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bkras brjod byab 'o// oM a oM Adad dz+nyAn badz+ra s+'u t+ma// sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas nas// zla byed de dang 'dra bar 'thub// thams cad sngam bzhin byas te// snang mdad mgo mthen 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka ru// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la// zla ba'i dbus nas oM gsum gnas// oM AHoM oM oM tri ka ka ra ya sU hUM/ de yis rdo rje gsum gyi tshogs// bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan par// byas nas nye 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan ma mthong // gong bzhin byas na bla phyed 'grub// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// sangs rgyas sdang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog/ de ni byang chub ye shes dang // sku gsung ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// de yi rim
36b4(rgyud 'grel): pas me bstod sogs// rang rang ngo bas rab bsgrubs nas// dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// de bzhin de ltar de gnyis sa ma// gcig la 'am gsum du goms byas nas// rgyal 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sras po mos pa yis// nyung ngam lhag par gnas par 'gyur// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin// bsgreng nas chos dbyings byin brlabs nas// lag pa g.yas par 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskyed// 'khor lo gser sogs dngos byas la// oM bskyed lte bar rtag pa yi// 'khor lo chen po rab bsgoms te// sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o// oM AHdzi na dzi ka tsakra ar+tha sid+d+hi trA swA hA/ 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zar kyis bkug tag dkyil 'khong // bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas// drod dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dang // nam mtha' lani 'phang bar 'thur// de yi steng du sam bsams nas// lag kyis 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): spyarnams bzla// 'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la// phyag byas zla ba phyed nas 'grub// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bsgoms la// rdo rje dngos byas hUM bskyed de// rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgom// sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+rika badz+ra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs kyi spyi dang bsdu// brtan par byas la chags byas nas// dz+nyA de bzhin rab tu bsgrib 'gyur na// zla ba byed na 'grub par nges// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran dzaM snyed yad pa yis// de sri 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): na bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// sngon bzhin rgyas par rin chen 'byung // bsgoms nas swa bskyed rin chen 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos// Nan rigs kyi lnga bskams la// sngags kyi gazlas brjod byaba'o// oM sa rad+ha d+h+r-i ka ra dAt+na ya r+tha sid+g+ha swAhA/ don ta ni rigs kyi lharnams can// sgra gang bsgrubs bstan byas nas// nye ba'i mtshan 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong sngon bzhin bsgoms// zla ba phyed 'grub the tshom med// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang ba gsum la bsten 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): bkur byed// de bzhin dpag med tshe bsgoms la// gser sogs pad+ma a las skyes// lte bar gsung rigs lha bsgoms la// bzlas brjod rab tu bya ba'o// oM AHA ro lig ka ma la ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas// bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom// mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma gtang // zla ba phyed na de 'grub 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la// sangs 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dzag par byed// don yod grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom// ral gri dngos byas ha las bskyed// las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom// sngags kyi bzlas pa 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa'o// oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+ri ka kharga ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA// las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro// bsdu zhing bcug nas chags byas na// de mtshan mthong nas sngon bzhin bsgrub// bla phyed kyis ni nges par 'grub// khams 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing // tshangs la sogs pas phyag byas kyang // stong gsum ni ni mchog tu dpa'// mi mchog gsar ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba// de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// // 'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang gi bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas// de ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te// 'jam dpal 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs// thugs kar ral gri yu ba la// haM gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya// oM a haM many+dzu shrI hUM phaT/ de yi 'od kyi nang gsal nas// ba s+phu las byung 'od zer lnga// thams cad 'jam dpa 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur byas te// bkug cing bu gar thim par bya// yang nas yang du bstan byas pas// ba spu dbang po gzhu mthong nas// 'byung po gtor byin chags byas nas// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur// yang ni 'jam dpal de bzhin bsgom// ral gri y+ra 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): bar bcug 'phen gnas// bzlas brjod byas la gong bzhin dpag/ de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya// oM AHSh+pe man+t+ra hUM swA hA/ de ni zlab byed na yang // 'od zer 'bar bar gyur pa yin// rdul phran rdorje 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): lus dag gi/ rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyu// snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu// longs spyod dang po rdzogs pa la// mtshan ma yis ni de 'dra 'grub// 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): tho ba dbyug paM pad+ma dang // rdo rje lcags kyu dbug gsal zhing // ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams// dngos byas 'khor lo gcig bsgom brjod// oM AHya mAn+ta bita mud ga ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHpradz+nyA na ta krita 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+ha na da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHpa d+hAn ta kri ta pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHbig+h+nA na ta krita badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHnI la DaN+DaM sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHma hA ba la tri shu la sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHtsa la khaD+ga sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHtsakra ba ra ti tsaH 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi d+h+waM/ oM AHsuM b+ha badz+re sad+d+hi hUM/ de yis khro bo'i tshogs bkug ste// bcug nas bstan par byas nas su// mngon bzhin gtor sogs kyis bsgrubs na// de 'dra zla ba byed na 'grub// yang na 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa 'od dpag med// mi bskyod pa yis mtshan ma rnams// bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas// zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// sngon du spyi yi cho ga 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs// rgyas par rab tu bshad 'gyur yang // bde blag tu ni rtogs bya'i phyir// yang ni thugs rjes bsdus te bstan// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dzab bzlas cho ga la sogs
38a7(rgyud 'grel): nas// lhas dbang bskur ba'i bar zhugs la// bde ba'i stan la 'dug par bya// bgegs bzlog cho ga nas brtsams te// brgyad kyis na mkha'i snying po bskyed// chos dbyings byin rlabs lus kun 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): la// gnas bzhi ma rtogs khaM gis mtshan// oM AHkhaM ga na kha gan+d+ha hUM/ de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// nam mkha'i snying po'i skur byas la// bkug ste khe kun la bstim la// nam mkha' 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du stong par bsam// bdag gi yan lag mi mthong sogs// 'byung po gtor ma yang byin te// chags byas yang du bsgrub 'gyur na// zla ba phyed na mi snang 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang // sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur// bzhi yis 'bras bu gzhan yin phyir// de bshad gsang ba'i 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): thig le las// rim pa 'di bzhin tshig 'grub pa// 'jig rten dbang po bsgrub pa bshad// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya// de lce hri las pad+ma ni// 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad mdun du rdo rje ni// oM AHhri lo ke bA ra b+ha d+ha na ar+tha sid+d+hi hU~M swA hA// bzlas pa thos pas sangs rgyas rnams// 'jig rten dbang ni bskur byas te// bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni// gnas brtan 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bar chags par bya// lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas// gtor ma byin te yid yang bsgom// thab byed na nges badz+ra// tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub// bden pa du ni smra ba dang // shags dang zhol bas/ 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byin dang // kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// de las yang ni bsgrub pa'i mchog/ mtshon cha rnams ni 'jig 'gyur ba// phyi mar gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir// de yi/ 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad// sngon gsungs rgyas par bshad pa yi// cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas la// grwa shing me tog mtshan pa yi// snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed// thugs kar mtshan ma la 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la// bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yi// tshogs kyis khams gsum dgang ba'o// oM AHme ma hA me d+ha ra sa ra Na hUM swA hA/ de yis sems can thams 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): cad la// byams pas dmigs byas snying rje sogs// khro dang bral bar rab bsams la// sems can de dag rab tu bsdu// brtan par rab tu chags byas la// ral gri so sogs 
39a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gtogs te// 'byung po gtor sbyin yang bsgoms na// zla byed mtshon chas mi tshugs so// 'phen dang mi 'phen la sogs pa// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur// btab 'gyur 'bor ram me 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): tog 'gyur// gang mthong byams sems dang ldan pa'o// sngon bzhin bya ba thams cad bya// 'jam dpal cho ga bzhin bsgoms la// thugs kar ral gri yu bar mo// bsam nas bzlas brjod 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// oM A oM mAN+Da shrI an sad+hi dzA AH/ 'od ci drug thos dang gsapa te// bstsu brag las blang bas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam dpal srung // byas te bklag nas pas+thA sa~M/ 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): brugar bcuganas stong pa nyid// bsam nas sngo ni bzhin rtogs gyur na// bar chad zhi bar byas nas su// bsgrubs na zla ba byed na 'grub// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dag 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): gis// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// grub pa'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nam yang mthong bar mi nus so// yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya// phyag rgya chen po 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung // cho ga bzhin du dang pos bsgrub// de yis bsgrub pa'i ri lu gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga 'am rtag shar sbyar// khyi sha 'am sha chen dag dang sbyar// ba lang sha'am bshang srin bu// ga bur tsan dan dang / 
39a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba 'am// 'gi haM a ka rur sbyar ba 'am// ga bur gur gum sbyar ba yi// ril bu skrod byed lnga sbyor tsam// nyi ma zla ba sreg byed kyi// nyi ma man cha bzhi dang ni// sreg byed gcig ste zla ba gnyis// 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): bkri ba tsana'i 'bru tsam du// oM 'am AH'am hUM las bskyed// khar bcug nas ni de dbus su// rang gi 'khor lo rab bsgoms la// de yis de yi sangs rgyas tshogs// bkug ste bcug nas bzlas 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya// oM AHgu la ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM// brtan pa'i ngo bor chags byas nas// 'bar sogs mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur// 'byung po gtor ma yang byin nas// bsgom na zla phyed mi snang 'gyur// 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sku dang rab 'dra zhing // nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra ste// dzam bu na da'i gser 'od kyi// byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dpal dang ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra ba 'gyur// dpag 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): tsha dbye ba gang gA yi// steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni// lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te// rang gi lha ni dang po dmigs// dkyil 'khor dbus su man 'ji'i steng // thod pa yis ni brgyan par bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni go rim bzhin// gong gi tshe
39b6(rgyud 'grel): gos dag byas na// oM AHhUM yig gsum po ni// brgya dang brgyad du bzlas par bya// de yi dro ba la sogs pa// mthong nas bar chad zhi bya ste// yang ni sbyor bas brtan byas na// zla phyed sangs rgyas kyis mi 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong // de bzhin bshad pa 'ba' zhig gam// khyi sha rta sha 'bras chen sha/ gong gi tshogs rab zos na// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // mi snang gyur pa kun las mchog/ stong khams dag ni snang 
39b8(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la 'brog pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// // mig sman bsgrub pa bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): la// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni// longs spyod dang pos rdzogs par bya// nya yi dus su brtsams na ni// dro sogs rgyal sa rab byung ba// brgyad kyis dus su shes byas la// bcu bzhi'i 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dus su bsgrub par bya// gong gi gnas su song nas kyang // thod pa nyid kyi steng 'dug nas// mdun du thod pa'i man 'ji la// skyes pa'i thod pa bzang po bzhag/ de yi nang du tshel chen la// khrag dang bdud 
40a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga yis dgang // pad+ma'i khong srog dur ras dkris// de la me mar 'bar bar bya// spyad mkhan thod pa sa steng bkab nas// de yi dud pas blangs nas su// 'ug pa'i mgo ni bsregs byas 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// pad+ma'i rak+ta bsre bar bya// srid kyi dus su btags nas su// bya rgod rje bangar nang bkang la// pad+ma'i zil pas brlan par bya// 'od med thu mas mig la sku// de yi tho rangs dus nas ni/ 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gtid rnams mthong ba dang // 'gro krin dbang dra 'gyur ba dang // gzi can can gyis mi mthong 'gyur// rigs 'dzin grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskal par gso bar gnas pa'i rgyu/ 
40a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi sman gyi cho ga mchog/ ji bzhin du ni bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yis// dkon mchog dpa' dang 'od dpag med// dbu rgyan la ni bsam byas la// gnyis su med 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ros zhu 'gyur// tshim pa'i cho ga bzhin drangs nas// rtsa rgyus thams cad khyab par byas// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni// khros par gyur kyang mi thub bo// skal dbang rnams la gsum po 
40a8(rgyud 'grel): yis// mos pa'i sems can bzung ba'i phyir// mthun pa'i cho ga la gnas nas// rang rang dam tshig gis gnas bya// thugs rjes non pa'i sngags pa yis// nyan thos gzugs kyis gnyis
40b1(rgyud 'grel): med spang // dge ba bcu la btsud nas ni// rang gi ro bor 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin rang sangs rgyas gzugs kyis// lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag med mdzad// btsud nas de don 'di la bkod// slar 
40b2(rgyud 'grel): yang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur// de bzhin skad cig oM las bskyed// tshangs pa chen po zhal bzhi pa// mtshan dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa// tshangs skud se ral cod pan la// rdo rje sems dpa' 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa yis// dang po dbyug pa rtse gsum gyis// mtshan pas zhi ba'i ku tsa bcing // gnyis na bgrang 'phreng 'gu De 'dzin// dang steng pad+ma zla bar gnas// gti mug lam gyis dman pa rnams// 
40b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa bskyed cing mos mthag/ rang gi lA yi sur 'gyur// ya las bskyed pa'i drag po ni// thal mdog zhal gcog spya gsum pa// bla sbed dang ldan cod pan la// rdo rje sems dpa 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'o// khar+g+haM mgal pa dril mtshan pa'i// phyag g.yas kyis ni phrag pa brten// bdud rtsi lngas gang thod pa ni// ga yon pas bstan shing 'khyud pa'o// u ma skra mdog ser po ste/ 
40b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog sna tshogs sku la dkris// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa// rdo rje rtse mo nang bltas bsnams// gnyis kyis de yi ku tsa 'dzin// stag lpags sha ma thabs glang steng na// pad+ma zla ba la gnas 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): nas// zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyan du mtshan// de yi gzugs kyis 'dod chags can// bud med dngos po gsum spyad na// btsud nas mos ma thag tu ni// rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o// hUM las bskyed 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyab 'jug gzugs// nag po rin chen dbu rgyan can// rdo rje sems dpa' ral pa mtshan// phyag bzhi 'khor lo rtse gsum dang // 'bud dung rin chen ldan pa'o// lha mo gser sku'i bdag nyid 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// thod du me tog sna tshogs dkris// mtshan ma bdaga' dra rgyan rnams brgyan// dang po gnyis kyis legs par 'khrud// khyung steng pad+ma nyi ma la// nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyab brten 
41a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// de yis gzugs khams gsum na gnas// sdang ba rnams ni bsad nas su// yal bar mi 'gyur brtson byas nas// slar yang rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin sha bza' zhing // gzhan 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bud med spyod pa yis// gnod sbyin po mo bsgrubs na ni// don byas yang ni grol bar 'gyur// 'o ma dang ni pha ma dang // 'dod yon lnga dang dri rnams kyis// klu yi bu mo bsten byas na// yang ni grol nas 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo gnas// lo zhing nga rgyal gnod sems ldan// spros dang me tog spyad pa yis// lha min bu mo mnyes byas la// grol nas rang gi skur 'gyur ro// thos rung sdug pa 'bru mar gyis// srin po rnams 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ni dga' bar bya// de bzhin 'byung po rnams kyang ngo // des kyang gtsang ba'i don chen byed// bdud rtsi lnga 'am khrag dag gam// chang la sogs pa 'thungs pa yis// go'u ri la sogs mnyes byas la// sdang ba
41a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bsad par bya// de bzhin brgya byin la sogs pa'i// ngo bo dam tshig la gnas nas// de 'dra'i sems can gdul bya'i phyir// gzugs kyis de tsam gnas pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): khams rnams dag na rnam par spyod// sems can kun la ban 'dod pas// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// gang dang gang gi bsam pa yis// 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs can de// thugs rjes 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): non pa de dang der// snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams kyis bstan// da ni mngon par shes pa lnga// bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho gnas// 
41b1(rgyud 'grel): ri mo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas// lha yis dbang bskur ba zhugs te// bgegs dgra sbyor ba nas brtsams te// chos kyi dbyings su phyin gyis brlab// gnyis kyis bsgrub pa rnam par bshad// 
41b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig la 'bras bu gnyis su shes// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis// dpral ba snying ga lte ba ru// sngon bzhin k+Shi sogs mtha' gnyis las// 'khor lo la sogs de yi mtshan// de las 
41b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po gcig gnyis bskyed// de rnams thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas rnam bkug zhugs byas pas// rdo rje sngar gyur bcud 'phen mtshan// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ig pa ny+tsa bI b+h+rid ar+tha sid+d+hi 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ re brjod 'od bar 'phros pa yis// sangs rgyas sa snying sogs byas pas// bkrag ste gnas bcug brtan byas nas// bar du chod pa'ang mthong la sogs// dngos grub par tshe dkar zhil 
41b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// 'byung po sogs la gtor byin nas// gong gi sbyor bas chags byas na// zla ba byed na 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin rtag pa rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// 'khor lo ran 
41b6(rgyud 'grel): chen pad+ma dang // ral gri gyur pa bcud 'phen mtshan// oM AHdzi na dzi ka pany+tsa a b+hi g+h+rid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+hika pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+rid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM sA hA// au A ro li ka pany+tsa a b+hi b+hid ar+tha sid+d+hi 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika pany+tsa a b+hi b+hid ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ brjod cing spros pas gong ma ltar// sa snying la sogs bcu byas te// mtshan mthong bar chad zhi byas nas// zla ba phyed na nges par 'grub// 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa// shing rtog lag tu bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na// rna ba'i drung na 'khod 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin// sgra grags pa ni ji snyed pa// mngon shes rnabs thos pa'o// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// skra dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan// / 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): gar mkhan la sogs rig par 'gyur// bskal pa gad+hA'i bye snyed du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi brtan tshigs brtags// zhag gsum 'das pa bzhin du dran// gang+gA'i bye snyed 
42a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i sku// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// sangs rgyas mngon shes rgyu yi phyir// phul du 'byung bar bshad pa ste// grangs
42a4(rgyud 'grel): dang tshad du rab ldan pa'i// mngon par shes pa rtogs par bya// gad+hA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje sgra dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun 
42a5(rgyud 'grel): bgrod par 'gyur// // da ni dgug pa'i cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gong gsungs gnas su ji lta bzhin// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri byas 
42a6(rgyud 'grel): nas// lha yis dbang bskur byas nas su// bka' yi 'khor lo sogs sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sngon 'gro ba'i// 'dod pa'i lha ru dmigs byas la// mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab// 
42a7(rgyud 'grel): lulcags kyu gnas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsum par rang rang sngags// rig pa dang bcas bzlas par bya// rdo rje gsum las 'phros pa yi// lcags 
42a8(rgyud 'grel): kus mtshan pa'i lha rnams spro// skyes pa bud med la sogs pa// sems can ma yin pa yang rung // rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog gnas pa// lugs kyus snying gar sbyar bar bya// rims bzhin 'ongs 
42b1(rgyud 'grel): te lam byung gis// phab te 'dun du zla gnas la// 'og 'byung tshogs mA ma kI// sman ma zhi dang bsrung bar bya// de ltar byas pas ji tsam du// 'dod pa'i las ni byed nus pas// cho ga'i mchog ni/ 
42b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid de// dgug pa kun la spyiraru sbyar// de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa bsgom// sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i// mi yi bu mo mchog rnams dgug 
42b3(rgyud 'grel): oM A big+h+nAn ta krita bu mo cheg mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ brgya rtsa lnga bcur brjod par bya// sngon bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po yang // rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ 
42b4(rgyud 'grel): namakha'i bre bo dgrag par bya// oM A~M Taker dzin ma'a'i bra me A kaR+Sha ya dza hAH/ sbyar ba de ltar gnang mdzes kyang // rdo rje gsam gyis mtshan bskams la// lha ma yin gyi bum mtshag 
42b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dkyil tri shu lcags kyus dgug/ oM A suM ba ra dza lha ma yin gyi bu mo a kaR+Sha ya dza hU dza/ sngon bzhin 'jam dpal rdo rje bskyed// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// gnod sbyin bu mo'i cod pan la// mnan phyir khro bo gshin rje gshed// bskal pa'i babregs pa ltar bsams la// lcags kyu zhags pas snying gar sbyar// mngag gzhug don du dgug 
42b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rang rang sngags kyis khyad par dang // phyag rgya'i khyad par thams cad kyis// dgug par rang rang thabs su gsungs// gzhan du byas na mi 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 
42b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po che// yang dang yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid lha rnams thams cad dang // rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'o// rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// mtshan ma thob pa'i 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas// ri mo'i cho ga sngon bstan bzhin// chu yi drung sogs bris nas kyang // lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs// bka' yi 'khor lo la sogs pa// rdo rje sems/ 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bskyed nas kyang // dri za 'jug pa la sogs pas// byang chub sems su zhu bar 'gyur ro// de las phyogs bzhi dbus lnga re chu// bru a dzi khaM hUM du gyur// de la mtshan ma de yis mtshan// 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): spro bsdu las ni rigs lngar gyur// mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod// de rnams kyi ni ye shes kyis// bskul sogs sngon 'gro dbang bskur bya// de yi dbu 
43a4(rgyud 'grel): la bdag nyid ni// rdo rje 'chang bar rig mar bcas// mi bskyod dbu gnas zhabs bzhi yis// sangs rgyas bani yi spro bang bsgom// oM AHsarba prad d+ha ma kra Ar+b+he te trUM/ dargyal de yis brtan par 
43a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// chu la sogs pa reg rung ste// 'byung po mnyes par byas nas su// chags byas zla ba phyed na 'grub// de nas rtag pa la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor ldan pas chu yi rdul// spyan la 
43a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsgoms byas nas// dus de nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pas// chu rnams rang gi gzugs su bsgom// gong bzhin brtan par rab byas nas// zla ba phyed na 
43a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur// grub nas rgya mtsho bzhi la sogs// thams cad kun tu 'chag 'gyur te// thang la bya ba ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa ni spyod par byed// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' 
43a8(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro ba'i// bi dang rdo rje ser po las// dpa' bo rdo rje bsgrubs par bya// cung zad ser la g.yas g.yon zhal// nag dang dkar po bsgom par bya// dang pos 'khyud cing lhag ma na// rdo rje ral gri nor bu 
43b1(rgyud 'grel): pad// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// mig dang lus rdzogs byin brlabs nas// bskul ba la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bsam// oM AHbi bi ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
43b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ bzlas pa sngon bzhin rab byas pas// sangs rgyas thams cad de ru byas// bkug ste bcug nas brtan byas pas// zla ba phyed na bka' nyan te// dgug dang dbang du bya ba sogs// smad dang 
43b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dngos grude rnams// sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod pa'o// de dag thams cad sbyin par byed// yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'o// hUM dang pad+ma dkar po 
43b4(rgyud 'grel): las// cu kyis mtshan pa bsam par bya// de yi 'od 'phros sangs rgyas kyis// phyogs bcu la gnas sangs rgyas sogs// skul byed pa yi gzugs byas nas// bkug ste de ru gzhug par bya// 
43b5(rgyud 'grel): de la sangs rgyas rdo rje ma// dgar mo g.yas g.yon nag dang dmar// dang po thabs la 'khyud pa dang // pad snod ral gre nor bu 'bar// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// mig dang lum sogs
43b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs la// bskal ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bya// de yi ye shes sems ma yis// thugs kar zla bcu bkod de// spro bsdu gzhug pa snga ma bzhin// sngags kyi bzlas 
43b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ba'o// oM a tsa li tsu le tsAn+da le swA hA hU swA hA/ di yis zla ba byed na ni// zhi ba la sogs gang yang rung // sgrub pa po yid la 'dod pa'i// dngos grub rnams ni ster bar 'gyur// khyad par/ 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): du ni bum bzang dang // yid bzhin nor dang dpog bsam shing // rnal 'byor pa ni gang 'dod pa// sgrub pa po la sbyin par byed// snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya// rdo rje sems las byung ba yi// 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): dzaM dang ral gri 'bras bu ni// dza gas mtshan pa bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// gnod gnas kyi ni bskur byas nas// bkug nas de la thim par bya// de la// 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin dbang po che// gsus che rkang pa thung ba ste// gser 'drag yas g.yon nag dang dkar// dang pos 'phags ma nor rgyun la brud// lhag mas pi dza pu ra dang // sre mo rin chen skrag byed dang // 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): rin che nor ral gri 'dzin pa'o// zhabs g.yas rdo rje mtshan pa yi// bum pa bzang la rab bzhag ste// g.yon pa btsan dkyil du gnas pa// zla steng de yi 'od kyis mtshan// nong rgyan de 'dra dang po na// 
44a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin 'bras kyi ste ldan pa// sku 'jam dbu la me tog gi/ sna tshogs thod bcings zhi ba'o// gzhan gyi spun zlum yid dga' ba'o// spyi bo snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du// 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nyi mar go rim bzhin// rtag pa mi 'khrug rin chen che// 'od dpag med dang don grub bsgom// sku sogs byin gyis brlab byas nas// bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi// mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bya// 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla bar dza bkod de// sngon bzhin nor gyi chang 'bebs pa// brtsom pa badrug ste bzlas brjod bya// oM A dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra yo trAM paT swA hA// de yis// 
44a7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba phyed na ni// nyin re gseng sang stong stong gi/ sgrub pa po la rab sbyin par// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// / yang ni rang 'dod sbyor ba yis// yan lag brgyad ni rdzogs byas te// rdo rje pad+ma 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyaskyer brtsams nas// bde gshegs rang gi zhal du gzhug/ zhwa nas rdo phyung pad nang du// byang chub sems ci bcu dgu'o// de las gtso bo gnod gnas kyis// 'brel pa'i 'khor lo brtan 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): par b+ha// de yi mig la sogs pa dang // sku gsang thugs ni byin gyis brlab// yang ni rang gis bon gyis// 'od kyis bde gshegs dgrag pa bya// zhal zhugs kyu gung rdo rjer byung // de yi lce la dza bkod nas 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis drangs nas sngags 'di yis// zhal du dbab par byas nas dbul// oM A dza dan de hi de hi hUM/ de yis tshim nas dbu rgyan la// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgom zhing // zla ba phyed du dus 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru// de 'dra'i chu rgyun byin nas 'grub// ji tsam 'dod pa'i nor ldan zhing // 'bru yi char ni 'bebs par mdzad// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ram// 'jam dpal rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub par bya// ci gsungs gzhal yas khang bsgoms la// 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): deyi sbyor bas dbus su gnas// mdun du gser mdog zla ba la// zla gam thig le rtse ldan pa// k+She bsgoms de las 'od zer spro// kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yis// spyan sogs lha 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): mo bkod pa la// phog pas gnod sbyin mo ru 'gyur// bkug ste de la thim gyur nas// de gzugs gnas grung gnod sbyin mo// rgyud gzhan las ni gsungs pa bzhin// bsgrub pa'i mdun du rnam par 
44b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam// gser mdog mdzes pa'i cha lugs can// bud med gzhon nu'i skra tshul ldan// dar gyi na bzas stod smad dkris// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pas gdugs 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): nidakar po thogs// g.yon pas dpag bsam shing la brten// cung zad 'dzum ni zhal mdzes shing // kha dog lnga pa'i me tog las// me tog phreng ba sogs kyis mdzes// byas pa'i 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): phyed krung thor tshugs can// rin po che ye ri phug ni// gnas par rab tu bsam pa'o// de yi gzugs la sogs pa lnga// shrI b+hud+hA ha b+ha lnga yis// lha mor bskyed nas gnas 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum du// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// bskul ba son du 'gro ba yi// dbang bskur byas pas dbu rgyan la// gshin rje gshed po rnams bsgoms te// de yi ngar 'dzin mnan par bya// 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang gi sa bon gyi// 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug/ thugs kar bcug te snyan tshig gis// bzhams te bsgo bas bsgrub par bya// de nas de yi ye shes sems// rang gi 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpar rab bcug pas// rang bzhin gcig tu gyur byas nas// sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sha dang khrag dang ni// til phye skur gdong la sogs pa'i// gtor mas 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byas nas su// zhi ba'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// yang ni de yis ma grub na// drag shul gyis ni bsgrub par bya// ye shes sems dpa' dor bcug la// rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam par/ 
45a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// gnod sbyin mo la 'khyud byas nas// rdo rje rtse lnga 'od zer 'bar// pad+ma rtsal nas sngags bzlas pas// nang dra 'od zer spro bar bya// oM A ya mAn+ta krita yak+Shi yak+Shi dza lo dz+wa la hUM phaT/ 
45a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba yis// ye shes sems dpa' gdung byas pas// tsha ste skrag nas sgrub po la// zla phyed 'phral du dngos grub ster// sgrub po'i mdun du thal sbyar nas// rje gcig bdag la bka'// 
45a8(rgyud 'grel): stsol zhes// 'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas bka' len te// sgrub pos de la bka' stsal pa// ma dang sring mo chung ma dang // g.yog mo bya ba gyis shes bya// de nas de yi rje zhig ge/ bka' ni spyi bos nod 
45b1(rgyud 'grel): ces len// gal te ma yi bya ba byed// tho rangs srod la 'ongs byas nas// gser srang bcu dang mu tig gi/ ha ra bdun ni bzhag nas 'gro// sring mo yi ni bya ba byed// nyi ma'i gung la drung 'ongs te/ 
45b2(rgyud 'grel): gser srang bdun dang har bdun// phul te ming po sang 'od zer// gal te chung ma'i bya byed na// yid kyis 'dod pa'i dus su ni// 'phral du drung du 'ong bar byed// cang mi smra bar 'dod pa spyad/ 
45b3(rgyud 'grel): gser srang lnga dang ha ra gcig/ bzhag ste rang gi gnas su 'gro// gal te gtam spras gyur na ni// phyin chad ci yang mi gter ro// g.yog mo bya ba byed pa yis// zas dang gos dang gser la sogs// 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhon pa la sogs ci 'dod pa// bka' tsam gyis ni sbyor bar byed// gzhan ni na chung yid du 'ong // bkug nas byin te rang gnas skyel// de sogs gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi// yon tan bsam 
45b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab thob// sngags kyi khyad par rnams kyi bsgrub pa khyad par bshad zin to// da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// spun gyis tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni brtag 
45b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// yang na mos pa'i rnam pa yis// rnal 'byor rab tu brtsam pa'o// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs rnams gang ba'i nad la sogs// zhi bar bya phyir bsam gtan mchog/ 
45b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// zhi ba'i sems kyis shar bltas te// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa mchog/ ta la bdun tsam nam mkha' la// phyogs te 'greng bur rnam par 
45b8(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de yi bum pa gzhal yas khang // gdan dang bcas pa rnam bsams te// de na rtag pa'i 'khor lo ni// dkar po sngon bzhin nyi shus bsgoms// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): / byas la// sngags kyi bzlas pa las byung ba'i// 'od zer rnam par spro bar bya// oM AHbruM dzi na/ dzig che ge mo'i nad dz+wa la dza hU~M swAhA swAhA/ de brjod lha dang rdo rje yi// 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): lus la 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis// zed dus me 'drar 'gro kun gyi// nad rnams rab tu bsreg 'gyur ro// shel ltar rab tu gnas pa la// mi ldog bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir// gsang sngags 'di ni 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yis// spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya// oM ru ru s+pha ru dz+wa la tiSh+Ta sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni nad shan+ti ku ru swAhA/ mkha' dbyings yongs su bkang byas nas// bdud rtsi lngas gar bum pa yis// 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): de rnams spyi bor bkra shis sgra// ldan par blangs nas dbang bskur stso la// oM ka ya badz+ra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// oM wag badz+ra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// oM tsit+ta badz+ra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de rnams 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas rdo rje gsum// ba spu bu ga las spros pas// sngon bzhin dbang bskur rab byin na// nges pa'i nad kyang zhag bdun 'jig/ rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs// de ni sbyin pa rab grub cing // yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// yang ni 'ga' zhig don gyi phyir// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rtag pa'i 'khor lo nyi shus bskyed// mchod/ 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i snying du ni// zhi bar 'dod pa bzhag par bya// de nas gong du gsungs pa yi// sman ma'i sngags ni rig 
46b1(rgyud 'grel): mar bcas// bzlas brjod byas pas bswa yi// bu ga las ni spyan tshogs spro// de rnams 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i// 'od zer tshul gyis nad pa la// zhi bar bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir// de la gzi brjid dbab
46b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// yang ni mi ldog bya ba'i phyir// gong gi dbyung ba 'am sa bon nam// yi ge gsum par rig par bcas// bzlas pas rtag pa'i tshogs spro bya// de rnams spyan dang bcas pa yis// bdud 
46b3(rgyud 'grel): cis gang ba'i bum pa bzung // dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bya// nad ni zhag bdun gyis zhi byed// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs// de ni de ma thag tu yang // 
46b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// spyan ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog/ cho ga nyi shus rdzogs byas la// mchod bstor bdud rtsi myang ba bya// de yi ye shes sems ma 
46b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// shi ba'i ro ni bzhag byas nas// sngags 'di rnam par brjod par bya// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni shi ba sos par gyur cig swA hA/ de yis de nas lam 'phros pa'i// 
46b6(rgyud 'grel): lulcags kyu'i gzugs su phyung byas te// de yis shi ba'i rnam par shes// bar ma don gnas pa 'am// yang na skye gnas chud kyang rung // dri med mar me'i tshul gnas pa'i// bkug ste ro yi snying ga ru// 
46b7(rgyud 'grel): bcug nas dbyung sngags de la dgod// de yi zer gyis ro bsregs te// rang ming thams spyan ma yi// gzugs su bskyed nas phung po dang // khams dang skye mched kyis dag bya// de lus gong ba'i 
46b8(rgyud 'grel): phreng sngags kyis// phyi nang bar mtshams med par gtam// sngags las sngon bzhin spyan ma spro// bsdus nas 'od zer spro bar bya// bskal pa'i bar du gnas bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas rtag pa'i 
47a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs spros pa'i// dbang bskur bus pa las skyes pa'i// shi ba'i zhag ni bdun nas 'tsho// 'tshon 'ang lnga bcu'am stong gi bar// 'di nyid du ni gnas par 'gyur// spyan gyi ye shes 
47a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis btab gyir// rim gyis sangs rgyas thob pa'o// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te// rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byong bas// lte ba rdo rje drug la sogs// mi bzad drug ni dbrog par bya// bdag ci g.yas 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): du/ ma / dab rlabs brnya pa// byungs / 'a da/ kyi gas na // da pa mi na blaganasas// bapas ma sa// ngag sa 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): dbrog pa'i tsha dang ni// sngags 'di brjod la 'od zer spro// oM A dzin / chege mo'i'adug ni ba mdzod cig dz+nyA nAn+de/ brjod pas 'di zer dkar ca na// spyi bo banags pas nag po dbyung // 'od zer de yis 
47a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' khams// phyogs bcu kun tu gtor bar bya// de yi shul du 'od zer ni// dkar zhing bsil ba pab byis pas// zhag bdun na ni na mkha' kun// gang ba'i drug kyang med par byed// yang ni sngon bzhin 
47a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bya// mi bskyod 'khor lo dang ldan pas// ha la ha la la sogs pa// sbyong ba 'di yis gso bar bya// bsgrub bya dran du rab bzhag la// de yi thugs kar hUM byung ba'i// rdo rje dkar po 
47a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po 'bar ba bsam// de yang zla 'od ltar bsil zhing // bsil bas lus kun khyab pa'i dug/ steng ga lkog ma dpral ba dang // mgo bo'i gnas su yang dag bsdu// de ltar 
47a8(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum par bsams la// thams cad snying ga'i dbus su bsdu// de nas 'di ni brjod pa yis// nag po sprug pa'i tshul du bsam// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i drag sos par gyur cig 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ de ltar byas pas zhag bdun na// nam mkha' khams kun gang ba yi// dug rnams kyang ni zad byed na// bsgrub bya'i lus ni smos ci dgos// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// 'od dpag med 
47b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor gyis// 'bras dang po la mig 'brum phran sogs// nye ba'i drug rnams dbyung bar bya// g.yas kyi bar mas a sa skyes pa'i// pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa'i// lte bar 'od zer lnga 
47b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i// a bsams nas ni byab par bya// bsgrub bu mdun du rab bzhag la// a yi 'od zer gyis bsdus nas// nag po mdog ni rnam pa ru// bsgrub bya'i lus las byung bar bsam// de yis 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rab spros pas// dug spangs kha dog dkar po bsam// de ltar dus bzhir gsang sngags 'di// bzlas pas zhag bdun drug rnams 'byung // oM A ro la ki che ge mo'i nye ba'i drag zhi bar gur cig/ 
47b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA// de yis las skyes snyir 'bar ba'i// dug rnams thams cad zad byed na// bsgrub bya'i lus gcig la gnas pa'i// nye ba'i drug rnams smos ci dgos// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// 
47b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin ni// kha dog dkar po rab bsgoms te// dug rnams thams cad bsal bar bya// bsgrub bya mdun du bzhag byas la// de yi snying gar zla ba la// hUM dkar 'od zer dkar po 'bar// 
47b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer de yis lus kun gyi// dug rnams rab tu sbar byas la// g.yas pa'i bar mar hUM dkar po// de bskyed pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// dkar po'i lte bar hUM bsam mo// rang ming yi ge dang po yis// 
47b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya rnam par bsams nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yis de yi ni// dug rnams kun tu bsal bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA yA wak+tsit+ta badz+rA tAM/ oM hUM hUM tU tu ru la bi ru la// sarba bi sha ga ta ya/ 
48a1(rgyud 'grel): dza li ta/ bi s+phu li ng+ga ta ta// ha sa ke sa ri sa ta to pa/ badz+ra khu ra niR+YA ta/ tsa li ta ba suta ta la ni shU sa ma ru tod k+Shi ba dA da ra ni dar/ bi sha na ta ha sa/ a pA ra mi tA/ pa la pa ra 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): tham/ Ar+yA beg ste b+hu ta ga na/ b+hUta b+h+r-i ta/ !ya thi ba kha ta khad/ pa ram+ba Nan tshin+dan+ta/ sid+d+hi me de ma med dbe sha/ A bai sha ya rak+Sha dza/ bi sha can na/ sarbab te shu b+ha/ pra ti ta tota b+ha ba badz+ra daM/ 
48a3(rgyud 'grel): tsa ma ra ya si/ i dan duSh+Ta/ gra ha na duSh+Ta/ sarba na/ dun dun/ ma tha ma tha/ ma ta ma taM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha ra ma saM ga nu/ dz+nyA na ta ka ra naM/ ku ru sri ban ha ya gri ba ya phaT/ badz+ra ya paDa/ badz+ra ga ta ya phaT/ 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra naM tra ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+NI ya phaT/ badz+ra khA ra ya phaT/ badz+rawar ni dag ta ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bA na sha na ye phaT/ traile ka ta pa yaM ka ra ya paT/ sar+b+ba karmab+hA pra titataya paT/ badz+ra ku la tAta sa na pa/ 
48a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ phaT pa Ta pha Da/ swA hA/ hUM la sa 'od zer dkar po yi// bdud rtsi babs pas bsgrub bya yi// lus las nag po'i dug blangs te// sa la sogs par spro bar bya// shul du bdud rtsi dkar po yis// 
48a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer babs par byas nas su// de bzhin thun bzhir byabs gyur na// zhag bduni nani ni nam ma'i dbyings// dug gis yongs su gang ba yi// rdo rje mi bzed pa yi dug/ sbyar ba tsam gyis sel bar 
48a7(rgyud 'grel): byed// sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la// yang ni dug rnams zad bya'i phyir// sbyor ba rnams la brgyad ldan par// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgom// gser 'dri g.yas gnag g.yon 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): dkar te// dang pos rang 'od rig ma 'khrud// g.yas par 'og 'byung 'khor lo 'dzin// lhag ma ral gri rin chen pad// 'di la rnam snang lta bur sbyar// bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni// 
48b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po br-i gyis mtshan pa bsam// bsgrub bya ming gi dang po bskyed// sgrub po'i mdun du rab bzhag la// sbyor ba gsum gyis spar bya'i phyir// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pas su// bruM las 'od 
48b2(rgyud 'grel): zer dkar po spro// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wak+tsit+ta/ badz+ra NAM/ oM A sarba le bu ti/ lo ka da ra shi/ yan+t+ra man+ta tan+t+ra/ tsAr+Na pra yo gi ti/ ma ma kri ti ye na ke na tsi ta bi ti/ tA ni sarban+tu/ tshin+na tshin+na/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha 
48b3(rgyud 'grel): tan ha na/ da ta da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kaM pa ya kaM paM ya/ bed+d+ha sa ya/ sha ta sA ha srA/ bi tsur+Na ya/ oM uSh+NI Sha badz+ra tsakra war ti/ d+hAr+thAn+tAM/ hUM hUM hU/ pha Ta swA hA/ de nas 'od zer sna tshogs smra sa 
48b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// spyi bo nas ni phul byas te// rkang pa'i mthil du phyur byas la// sa yi gting du gtan par bya// yang ni 'od zer de yis kyang // mdun du snun pas dug rnams kun// rgyab tu phyung bas sa 
48b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs// 'byung ba rnams su spro bar bya// de bzhin 'od zer gyis bsdus nas// phyung ste gtor nas de shul du// bdud rtsi dkar po rab 'bab pas// dug ni rnam par spang bar bya// dkar po dang ni ser 
48b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang // nag po bsam gtan 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi sprul pa yis// dug rnams kyang ni zhag bdun 'byin// yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad b+ha// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// kha dog
