48b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po bsam byas te// 'don pa'i sngags kyis nad rnams bsal// nad pa mdun du bzhag byas te// bdag nyid khros nas gsar sngags 'di// brjod pas 'od zer chags spros pas// bsgrub 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): bya'i lus la gzhug par bya// oM AHdzi na dzika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM// de yi nad rnams bskul bar bya// rlung mkhris bad kan las byung ba'i// spre'u yi gzugs brnyan lta bu'am// 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gyi ni rkang pa gsum// yi dgas gcer bu'i gzugs dag tu// bsgrub bya'i lus la phyung nas su// phyogs bcu dag tu rab chug cing // 'bros par gyur pas 
49a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam// oM AHdzi na dza ka che ge mo'i nad ma ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas thugs las 'phros pa yis// khro bo'i 'khor los mtshan ma yi// spro'u la sogs pa'i nad rnams kun// mtshan 
49a3(rgyud 'grel): mas phye mar brlag par byed// bkug ste 'ongs pa rang gnas kyi// mtshan mas phye mar brlag 'gyur te// bsgrub bya nad dang rnam bral bas// shel 'dra'i kha dog lta bur bsam// de nas bdag 
49a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'khor lo che// kha dog dkar po rnam bsams la// slob bzhin spyan ma'i sngags brjod pas// 'od zer 'bab pas lus dgang bya// oM AHdzi na dzaM ka nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swAhA/

49a6(rgyud 'grel): nad kun yang // rdorje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// matsam med par 'byung bar 'gyur// du bzhin ma bsrid don chen dpal// 'ad dpag med dang don ya krug/ yi ga'i tshig ni gang mos pa// dang 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): ba bskyed de nad rnams bsal// oM AHbadz+ra d+hika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hU~M/ oM AHrat+na d+hi/ che ge ma'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM A A ro lika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM A prAr+N+Na d+h+r-ika cheg 
49a8(rgyud 'grel): mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nad ma ra ya phaT hUM/ oM AHA ro lika che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT/ oM AHpra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika nad pa che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra 
49b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ oM AHrat+na d+hika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM swA hA/ oM AHa ro li ka nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ oM aHpradz+nyA d+h+rika nad pa che ge mo 
49b2(rgyud 'grel): la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ de yis nad rnams phyung byas te// rang rang mtshan mas sngon bzhi ni bsad// stobs dang dbang bskur sogs pa yi// snga ma bzhin du rab tu bya// sbyor bas zlos pas 
49b3(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun du// myong bar nges pa'i nad rnams kun// rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga des// phyi dang nang du bcas pa sel// / da ni rgyas pa'i las kyi lam gyi rim pa rgyas par bshad par bya'o// 
49b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas// dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te// rdo rje pad+ma can gyi ni// sbyor bas rgyas pa'i las brtsam mo// stobs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang // lhag 
49b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tsher 'gyur 'dod pa dang // mdzod po che ni rgyas bya'i phyir// rgyas pa'i sems kyis bya ba'o// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// sngon bzhin khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus// rdo rje sems 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' zlas pa yi// dbang chen dkyil 'khor ser po'i dbus// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// gser zhun lta bu'i 'od dpag med// 'khor lor bcas pa bsam byas la// mchod 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// 'dod pa rnam gsum gzhag nas ni// thams cad gsang sngags 'di ni zlos// oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka/ 
49b8(rgyud 'grel): TaM ka Te ka re ba re che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru hUM/ na bza' dgar mo la sogs tshogs// mngon par 'dod pa'i don char 'bebs// nam mkha' khams kun rab bkang nas// rjes su 'od zer bsdu bar bya// 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga// 'dod pa'i spyi bo mazin pa dang // thugs ka'i gnas ni gsum po ru// 'dod pa gsum gyi tshul du bzhag/ de rnams mi bzad bya ba'i 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): bIr// thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags 'di// brjod nas 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs// bum pa gang ba bzung bar bya// oM AHdzi A ro lika che ge mo buSh+Ti ku rA hUM/ bkra shis glu dbyangs
50a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig bcad kyi// dbang bskur ba ni stsol bar bsam// de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du// sbyor bas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis na// dgar dka' ba'ang rab
50a4(rgyud 'grel): tu'agengs// de ni sbyin pa rab bsgrub cing // yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur// yang na 'di ltar gos dkar ba'i// 'khor lo ldan pa'i sbyor ba bsgom// ye shes sems ma'i thugs 
50a5(rgyud 'grel): ka ru// 'dod pa dag ni gzhug par bya// oM ka De bi ka De ni ka De ka Te ka De ka ro ba re che ge mo puSh+Ti ku ru hUM/ brjod pas de mtha' dbus yig la// na mkha'i khams ni dkar mo sa gang // de nyid gzi 
50a6(rgyud 'grel): brjid tshul gyis su// rjes su 'od zer sngon bzhin dbab// gong gi sngags kyis 'od dpag med// spros nas dbang bskur stsal bar bsam// de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du// byas pas 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya rgyas par 'gyur// bsam gtan sngags kyi spor ba 'dis// rtag par chos kyis rgyas par mdzad// rtag tu mdzed po che dang ldan// nad rnams med cing tshe rgyas 'gyur// da ni dbang 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): gi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o// sangs rgyas 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams rnams ma lus pa// dbang du byed dam byed 'dod phyir// chags pa'i yid kyis bya ba'o// bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// khang pa brtsegs ma'i 
50b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zla gam la// ji bzhin sbyor bas ban du ka/ don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo che// bsgoms nas mchod pa bstod pa dang // 
50b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni// gong gi gnyis po bzhag nas ni// thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags brjod// oM AH 
50b4(rgyud 'grel): kha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika che ge mo ba shaM ra rA ga ya to// de brjod thams cad pa s+phA ya// sgo las sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su 
50b5(rgyud 'grel): dgang bar bsam// de rnams 'od zer rnam lnga yis// tshul gyis thams cad 'dus byas la// thugs kar 'dod pa de lus la// rjes su stobs ni dbab par bya// gong gi sngags brjod 
50b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin du// dbang bskur de la stsol bar bsam// de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru// bzlas pas zhag bdun 'grub par 'gyur// de ni da ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas kun gyis
50b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs su byon// 'jam de pa la dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// las thabs byed par de 'gyur ro// dga' bos myong ba'i dbang po dang // dgyes nas ci 'dod rab tu stsol// bskul ba chen 
50b8(rgyud 'grel): bo ma byas kyang // 'gro ba 'di kun dbang du 'gyur// yang ni de ltar sgrol ma yi// 'khor lo ldan pa ra ba bsgoms la// de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ 
51a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya ba bzhag nas ni// dbus su yi ge te dmar po// mtha' ma phreng sngags dmar po ni// gyen du 'greng bas bskor bar bsam// dmar ba'i mtshan ma 
51a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ni// taM las 'od zer dmar po'i tsho gas// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod nas su// bsgrub bya bskul phyir dbyung bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re che ge mo pa shaM ku ru ho/ skyes pa'i snying 
51a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mgrin par bskul// bud med gsang ba nas bskul bya// phreng ba'i sngags las 'od zer dmar// rang gi skye gnas nas phyung bya// gong gi sgo ru rab zhugs pas// bsgrub bya'i
51a4(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bkag 'dra ba// zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra bkug nas ni// rim pa gnyis su chud par bya// gal te lha mo mda' can ma// 'og nas 'byung bzhin byin brlabs la// bskul ba la sogs de 
51a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya// nges kyang dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du 'dod// de ni thugs kar rab bzhag la// dpa' bo gtang sogs cho ga yis// gzhan la stobs ni dbab par bya// de ltar// 
51a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas dus bzhi ru// zhog bdun par du rab byas na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde can dang // sems can khams rnams ma lus pa// de ma thag tu bran bzhin du// thams cad yod med dbang du byed// 
51a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// 'jam dpal rdo rje 'khor lo yis// dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o// sngags byed dang ni dal byed dang // 'dod byed dang ni/ 
51a8(rgyud 'grel): rmongs byed dang // dbang gi rang bzhin mda' lnga ni// cho ga 'di yi sa byin brlab bya// smyug ma a yis byin brlabs te// mde'u ni hUM gis byin brlabs la// g.yon gyis maM bskyed gzhu gzung
51b1(rgyud 'grel): nas// dbu rgyan rtse mor sbyar byas la// drangs te rna drung du bkang nas// sngags kyis rab tu gdab pa'o// oM AHmaM many+dzu shI che ge mo ba shaM ku ru ho// de yis spros pa sa bsgrub bya yi// 
51b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo dang snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du// khro bo'i tshig gis rab tu gdab// sngags kyi 'od zer dmar ba yi// rdo rje gnyis las phyung nas kyang // zla ba spyad ldan lta bu'i 
51b3(rgyud 'grel): sems// 'od zer gyis ni dgug par bya// bdag ni skye gnas nas bcug ste// ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin no// dngangs shing brgyal bar rab bsgoms te// sdong po bcad bzhin zhabs 
51b4(rgyud 'grel): 'og 'grel// sbyor ba de yis dras pa'i ru// zla ba byed du rab bsku pa na// byas pa'i tha ni grags chen pos// gsang ba'i bskul ba bsgom byas pas// rdo rje kun gyis rab gsang ba'i/ 
51b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje don ni chud par gsungs// de nas mngon spyod lam gyi rim pa bshad par bya'o// sngon bzhin bzlas pa la sogs pa'i// dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te// rdo rje khro bo rnal 'byor gyis//

51b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsam// gdug pa'i sta regatun shing gis// bsad par rab tu bsam pa'o// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yis// mkha' dbyings yongs su 
52a1(rgyud 'grel): gang bar bsam// sta re gtur shing gis bsad bar// ba sams nas dgra rnams myur du 'chi// de yi sa dran rnyed mtshon cha bor// skyabs med skrag cing 'jigs pas// 
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dkrugs// sdug bsngal dang ldan gzigs byas la// snying rje chen po'i khro ba bskyed// rang lha goms pa'i phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor byas nas gsum pa ru// ye shes sems dpa' 
52a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas tshogs spro bka' lung blang // khams bzhugs mgon po rnams kyis ni// bdag rtsom las 'di gzegs mdzad phyir// gro ba tsan dan dkar po sogs// las 
52a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ram bris pa snyan dugasol// pa na mdzad khyed cag rnams la ni// 'di yi thabs 'di ma brnams na// 'di ni ma dang med spyi g.ya' ba'i// bud shing du ni 'gyur bar nges// snying rjer ldan 
52a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor pa// khyod kyi bka' lung bdag cag byed// de bas las ni bgyid pa la// rdo rje can rnams bdag bka' stsol// bdag cag khyad par ma mthong bar// dad pa kho na dang

52b3(rgyud 'grel): la// me bskyod lta bu dang pos 'khyud// rdo rje lugs kyu ral gri zhags// 'dzin pa'i khro bo suM b+ha'i gzugs// de yi srungs ma dgug don bskyod// snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas//

52b5(rgyud 'grel): la g.yon du bzhag/ gnod mdzes de la bcug byas te// de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgo ba'i phyir// dpal ldan gnod mdzes mdun du gnas// rig pa'i tshogs kyis gsol

53a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas tho ba bzung byas nas// g.yon pas mgul pa brtan byas te// stong pa dran par bya ba'i phyir// sngags 'dis rab tu btab pa'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ye g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI 
53a3(rgyud 'grel): la ya kI la ya sarba duSh+TA na ye shes srungs ma phaT/ hUM hUM hAM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba duSh+TA na ye shes sems dpa'i kA ya wAkrIt+ta badz+ra kI la yaM hUM paDa/ de ya~M sa rang gi yai

53b4(rgyud 'grel): lugs kyi ma nAn dang // lugs kyi mche ba can gyis khyis// namakha'i khams klan gang bar spro// bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bor ba yis// gru gsum la gnas sngon bzhin du// gnas pa'i

55b2(rgyud 'grel): ku la pA ya kul pA ya/ ba ma tha ma/ b+ha ga ba na/ ba yu be ge na/ pra dan shi ga na/ da hAd tA/ ha ra har/ ba ta ba hA/ han ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tam ta/ ma ta pA ya ma ta pA ya/ sarba ka rman tshan+ta tshiH/ 
55b3(rgyud 'grel): bin+d+ha bin+ta/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ me ta maM sarba ru d+hi ra/ ma ma sa me da mar+d+ha ru ti pri ya/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba na sarba bi thAn/ mu la karma ni/ sarba mu la ga han/ han han/ bany+dza bak+tA/ mad mdza/ i daM me b+h+ya 
55b4(rgyud 'grel): s+ya daM yaM/ d+hA nI la ya nI la ya badz+ra/ d+han d+ha na/ dur+ra du ru/ bi g+ha na bi nA ya ka na sha ya/ hud+l-i hu drA/ d+hib+da d+ha d+ha ya/ sarba man+ta na sha truM nan/ tsi da ya ni/ pri da ya/ tshin+na tshin+na/ bid+yA nan/ tiSh+Tha a nusmA 
55b5(rgyud 'grel): ya sa ma yaM badz+ra da ra pa tsa nAn/ da ra ma ni ni krin+ta hUM/ ha na ha na/ de ha da ha/ du ru du ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phaT phaT+Ta/ hUM hU~M/ kr-i daMd+hA ya/ de ba ri'i bir+ya ka pa ya/ badz+ra dat+ten che ge mo ma ra ya 
55b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ g.yel med pa yis zhag bdun du// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas byas pas// de yi nyi ma kho na la// gdug pa rnams ni gsod par byed// de ru gal te ma grub na// nam 
55b7(rgyud 'grel): byed dus su dur khrod du// gang gi gzugs brnyan khyer nas ni// mi ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la// mngon spyod ho khung gzhung bzhin byas// nim pa'i me ni spar byas nas// zhal dang 
55b8(rgyud 'grel): spyan rnams 'gyur ba yi// dbyug sngon kha gdangs dbus bsams la// gzugs brnyan mtshon cha rnon po yis// g.yon pa'i rkang nas bcad gtubs nas// gong gi sngags 
56a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas sbyin sreg bya// de yi mtshan mo 'chi bar nges// yang ni khro bo gang rung gi/ bzlas pas sngags pa dag byas la// rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// 
56a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag tu ni rang sngags bzlas// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // ling+ga gcig pa shing gecig drung // mngon spyod las ni brtsam pa'o// dbyung 
56a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon can gsungs rdzas la ni// gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas nas// gan rkyal du ni bzhag byas te// dgug pa sngon 'gro kha sbyar dbye// de nas khro bo gang rung gi/ rnal 'byor/ 
56a4(rgyud 'grel): khros byas khrag chu yis// gsher ba'i gos ni gyon pa'am// bshang gces gsher ba'i gos gyon bya// gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan nas ni// mngon sum bzhin du bsams byas 
56a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla// de bzhin chu dron 'ba' zhig gam// bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// ngan pa rus pa dri snum pa// bgos te sngon bzhin 
56a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya// de bzhin thal ba'i skyo me yis// gsher ba'i gos gyon lus ngan 'khrugs// sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'jigs par 'gyur// 
56a7(rgyud 'grel): yang na gcer bur rab phyung ste// skra bshig thur du 'phyang byas te// mche gtsigs mig ni bsgyur byas las// rkang pas gzugs brnyan mnan nas ni// ldan bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
56a8(rgyud 'grel): te// lus ngag yid gsum khros byas nas// thun bzhir zhag bdun sogs sbyar bas// namakha'i dbyings kyang 'jigs par nus// yang na gong ma'i gnas de ru/ 
56b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor der gnas pur bras gdab// ro bsregs sol dang thal ba dang // chu ngogs sa dang phrag ma dang // rkang rjes dang ni bshang gcis brdzis// bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snying dag ru// 
56b2(rgyud 'grel): gi tshe drug dang lan cha dang // zungs mar nag chas dur ras la// khra ba rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i// lte bar sngags dang ming spel ba'i// rang rang sngags ldan mi dgug par// bris nas steng ga 
56b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa'o// kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i// dgug pas gzugs la pha be nas su// mi yi rus pa las byas pa'i// sor brgyad pa yi phur bu la// rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
56b4(rgyud 'grel): tu bzlas// gzugs brnyan snying gar btab nas ni// dgra yi khyim 'am sgo 'am ni// grong la sogs par sra bar bya// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi 
56b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rnams spangs pa// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi// skams sam yang na 'jigs par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis// mngon spyod la so la bgegs dgras
56b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'i las// ting 'dzin dag pas byed phyir ro// de yi rnal 'byor sngon bzhin bya// gzugs brnyan gong ma bzhin byas la// dgug pa 
56b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba yis// rtag pa'i sbyor bas las 'di bya// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la// sor brgyad rtse mor 'khor lo bsam// me tog sngon pos mchod cing ni// 'khyil 
56b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags ni rig bcas bzla// de yis spyi bor btab 'gyur na// rtag pa yang ni klad zer can// 'gyur na bdag sems ldan pa yi// dgra bo dag ni smos ci dgos// 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin seng ldeng rtse mo las// byas pa'i phur bus pad+ma Nad// byin gyis brlabs bzlas sngon bzhin mchod// snying gar btab nas ling gde// thod pa kha sbyar nang 
57a2(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste// dur khrod me la gdungs byas nas// cha ba'i nad kyis 'debs byed pas// dpag med rnal 'byor gyis bya'o// de bzhin mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas// gsod byed lugs byas phur bu 
57a3(rgyud 'grel): la// rdo rje rtse mor byin brlabs la// mchod cing sngags bzlas snying gar gdab// me 'bar nang du de bcas bsgyur// de yi mod la gang sbyar ba'i// sku gsum 'jig par byed pa ste// bdag 
57a4(rgyud 'grel): sems ldan pa smos ci dgos// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngon bzhin gzugs bad+yA nA rab b+hAs la// de mnan khro bo bka' nod pa sgo// de nas btang nas bkug ste gzhug/ 
57a5(rgyud 'grel): sngon ma'am yams nad 'tsho ba'am// yul du sna tshogs 'byung byed pa// gzugs brnyan de la phab nas ni// snying gnas ni rkang pa'i bar// de bzhin du ni spyi bo'i bar// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags 
57a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing // gdug dang sdig pa bsal byas nas// che ge lus ngag yid gsum la// rdo rje phur bus thob ces pa'i// sngags ni gong ma bzhin du brjod// thun gzhir g.yel med zhag bdun/ 
57a7(rgyud 'grel): du// phur bu'i rnam 'phrul 'di bya'o// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// phur bu btab na'ang myur du 'chi// de bzhin bdud/ 
57a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'khyil pa yi// rnal 'byor sngon bzhin rab byas te// kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i// sbyor ba bdun gyis bsgrub par bya// dur khrod thal ba la sogs la// sngon bzhin gzugs dang ming bcas 
57b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// dgug pa sngon 'gro dur khrod du// skra bshig gcer bung phyung byas te// mtshan ma mnan nas sngon ma yis// sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla// zhag ni bdun du thun bzhi ru// sbyor ba de yis 
57b2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'jigs// ro bsregs thal ba 'ba' zhig la// gzugs brnyan la sogs sngon bzhin byas// gong ltar stong rtse brgyad bzlas na// sbyor ba de yi mod la 'chi// chu 'gram 
57b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi sa sogs la// bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan rab byas te// ske tshe lan tsha 'bru mar dang // dug dang da dur snag char sbyar// dur khrod ras la de yi ming // sngags spel bris nas ming 
57b4(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste// gan rgyal mgo ni byeng du bstan// srang ko tsa dnga' byi rtse ka/ gzhan ma bcos pas de'i lus la// til 'bra tsam du btsags byas la// bskul ba'i tshig dang sngags bcas 
57b5(rgyud 'grel): pa// dgang zhing thun bzhir zhag bdun byas// sbyor ba de yis sangs rgyas kyang // 'jig par 'gyur na gnod sbyin kun// smos ci dgos te de lta yin// rus phye dug dang khrag rnams la// 
57b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas la// sol khror spangs pa'i gos gon la// khros nas rkang pas mnan te bzlas// che ge mo rak+Sha seng kra ha ya// bskul ba'i tshig bcad thun bzhi ru// 
57b7(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun bzlas pas dgra bo de// srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za// ske tshe mang dang bshang gcir sbyar// gzugs brnyan yog par blugs byas la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rkang pa mchog/ 
57b8(rgyud 'grel): mi yi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab// pra sha dza la che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ gong gi sngags spel thun bzhi ru// zhags dun g.yel med sems kyis bsgrubs// tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs 
58a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed // gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byod pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// phran chags rdo rje gsang ba yis// bsad pa'i las 'di bsgrub pa'o// rnga rgyus sam/ 
58a2(rgyud 'grel): dung khrod sol ba la// de nyid gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i// khaM ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// dur khrod ma la sbrul gzugs bri// nag pa mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// 'od 'bar sems 'khrugs mche phreng 
58a3(rgyud 'grel): gtams// lce gnyis mug ma mig bgrad pa// mjug ma brdebs pa'i tshul can no// de yi kha ru mi zad dug/ sreg byed lta bu dmar nag tu// gnas pa'i yi ge khaM bsam te// de yis sbrul 
58a4(rgyud 'grel): te gnas las bskyod// de yi lce yi rtse mo la// hri ljang gu yi lugs kyu yis// rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug/ ha la ha la la sogs kun// bklag ste bsdus nas khyer 'ongs nas// lho yi 
58a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse la gzhug par bya// de yi khams gsum dug blangs nas// de nyid drug gis gang bar bsam// oM kriSh+Ta sarba che ge mo'i dpral grih+Na na khaM hri phaT/ brjod pas de sod dpral bar bzung // 
58a6(rgyud 'grel): mche bas phug ste lus reg pas// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yang // dug gis 'chi nges dogs pa med// de kho na bzhin sdig pa dang // sre mong blta ba la e na pa// chu sbrul rlung sbrul la sogs 
58a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sa yi zas can sbal pa yis// bsgrub bya 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir// bri ba'i rdzas dang gzugs dang bskul// gdug pa kun nas spad btang bas// de yis me 'chi dogs pa/ 
58a8(rgyud 'grel): med// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom po'i phyir// sbyor ba bzhi yis bsgrub par bya// oM hriHSh+Ti wi bi tan na che ge 
58b1(rgyud 'grel): mo pa ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis dur khrod sol ba la// stong du brgyad ni btab nas kyang // ro sregs shul gyi sa la yang // bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris bkug ste gzhug/ bkas pa'i bsam pas sol 
58b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de// gong gi sngags bzlas spu gri ltar// bsams te mgul pa 'am spyi ba nas// de ltar thun bzhir zhag bdud sbyar// spyi bo 'gas sam mgo chad par// 'gyur ba 'di la som ni med// de bzhin 
58b3(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid lag pa g.yas par 'gyur// mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la// sngags 'di nyid kyis bsnun zhing rgyab// oM tshiHSh+NI wi kri tA na na che ge mo mud ka ra a ta 
58b4(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du// bsnan zhing brdungs pas bsgrub bya ste// g.yang du lhung nas 'chi bar nges// yang ni de yi rnal 'byor gyis// g.yas par hUM las byung ba'i// rdo rje 
58b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse lngas bsgrub bya yi// lus la bstan zhing rab brjod do// oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi gri ta na na cheg mo badz+ra a ke Ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du// kha phye bsnun pas bsgrub byad// srin po la 
58b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'jigs par byed// de ltar de yi rnal 'byor gyis// sngan bzhin sngags btab rdo rgyus sam// sol bas dur khrod sa gzhi la// bsgrub bya pho mo'i gzugs bris la// hUM bskyed sta re lag 
58b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// khros te mgul par sngags bzlas nas// med pa bcad par bsam pa ni// sbyor ba thun bzhir zhag bdun du// oM hriHSh+Ti wi kri tA nA na che ge maM bAka ti pa ta hUM phaT/ brjod cing 
58b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yel ba med pa yis// bzlas pas bsgrub bya mgul 'gags nas// kha zas mi thar nad kyis 'dzin// de bzhin bgegs dgra'i sbyor ba yis// ro bsregs thal ba rus la sogs// 
59a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bzhi shu 'am de byed kyis// me thab dkyil 'khong grags ma bya// yang chen dud pas kha dog bsgyur// kha b+he ro rje rtse gsum pas// dbus su la khyed gsus byas te// tshor 
59a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i me ni khros nas spar// bshad pa'i tshigs ma lba bskyed// gong gsungs rdzas byas gzugs brnyan btub// de yi zhal du lan gsum du// gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya// de yi ye shes sems 
59a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ru// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa// hUM ljags mche ba rnon po can// khro dang ldan pa sngon bzhin bsam// srog song steng ngam sra ba 'am// yang na ci yang med pa ru// rkang pas 
59a4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa mnan nas su// sos ni so yang 'cha' bar byed// be lang sha dang khyi yi sha/ zangs phud can sogs sha rnams ni// bsgrub bya'i yan lag tu bsam la// gong ma'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya// 
59a5(rgyud 'grel): sha chen 'ba' zhig kho na la// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// de yi zhal du sbyin sreg byas// rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad// sngon bzhin dgra yi gzugs brnyan la// bshang gci 'bru mar 
59a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas byugs nas// sngon gsungs sngags dang bskul bar bsam// tsher ma'i mo la khros te bsreg/ thun bzhir zhag bdun brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i// las kyang 
59a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig na dgra bo yi// sbyar ba'i las ni smos ci dgos// bsad pas de dag thams cad kun// thugs rjes gzung phyir rnal 'byor ches// gnyis bral 'das pa'i de ma thog/ 'jug pa'i las 
59a8(rgyud 'grel): 'di brtsam pa'o// de dag rnams kyis dngos po rnams// ma skyes par ni gzhigs nas kyang // 'bras bu myong bar nges pa'i dus// ye shes rang rig chen po mchog/ sa bon 'od
59b1(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis bkug nas// zhal du zhugs nas zhu 'gyur te// rdo rje lam byung pa d+mar gnas// ye shes bdud rtsi'i gzugs gyur la// spyan sogs lha mos bskul ba la// hUM las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan// 
59b2(rgyud 'grel): spros bsdus mi bskyod rdo rjer bskyod// chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab// rang las dgu gnyis drug phyung nas// gnyis dang gsum du rdzogs byas la// dang po rtog pa yongs dag phyir// sngags 
59b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis phur bu dbyung bar bya// oM AHbadz+ra ki lo ta kI la ya hUM/ phyung nas de yi gnas su yang // rang gi ye shes 'khor lo can// gnas bcas bsams nas 'od zer gyis// sngon bzhin rang dgra 
59b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas su// bskyed dang des bskyed lha mo'i cho gas// bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis// dbang bskur de dang bla mar bcas// zhugs pas rdo rje sems dpar bskyed// oM badz+ra d+hika 
59b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis phyung ste// mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng // 'khor lo bcas pa mos byas la// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya// a ho yaM ges bsngags brjod pas// rlung gi bteg 
59b6(rgyud 'grel): nas mngon dga' ru// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags 'phangs pas// de bdag sras su skye bar nges// rang rang lha yi sbyor ba 'am// de yi gnas pa gang rung du// blo gros ldan pa'i rnal 
59b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas// sbyor ba de kho na yis bya// gnyis po ring zhugs de ma thag/ de yi ye shes rang lha 'am// zhe sdang dag pa'i sbyor kho nas// gong ma bzhin du rab tu brtsam// bdag med sems med bems 
59b8(rgyud 'grel): po ni// lan gsum gyi ni gzhig byas pas// gong gi sbyor bas 'bras bu che// 'jug tu brtsam mi dgos par 'byung // de ltar thabs dang sngags ldan pas// 'khor ba'i 'og ma'i rgyu ldan pa// 
60a1(rgyud 'grel): bsad pas rang dang gzhan dag pas// ma 'khrul pa ru gsungs pa'o// sred pa zhe sdang gis bslad pa'i// sems kyis gsod pa'i gti mug can// thabs med ye
60a2(rgyud 'grel): shes dang bral bas// thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro// da ni gnas nas spo ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// gnyis kyis rab tu bsgrub 
60a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa// gsum pa las 'di brtsam pa'o// thod pa srabs ni gang ba dag/ pho dang ma yi bskrar pa la// de yi rigs pas btsal byas la// gnod byed yul gzhan dbyung bar bya// oM 
60a4(rgyud 'grel): lo ma'i khu ba dang // rkang pa g.yan pa'i srin lag khrag/ snag tshar byas te bya rgad kyi// sgro rtsa'i smyu gus bri bar bya// 'gar ba'i dur khrod ras ma la// gzhu 'dra rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng // ral gri 
60a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ni mtshan pa bri// de steng bsgrub bya'i gzugs gzhan la// gong gi ras la de yi ming // sngags kyi bar bcug che ge ma'i// uts+tsha Ta ya phaT bris la// de yi snying gar gzhug par bya// 
60a6(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste bcug nas de dkris la// thod pa ru ni bcug byas te// khro bo'i tshig gis rang rang sngags// rig dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad// thun bzhir zhag bdun bzlas byas nas// khyim mam 
60a7(rgyud 'grel): grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas te bzhag na dus de ru// sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod par 'gyur// de bzhin tA la'i lo ma la// gro ga'am shog shog ras la sogs// snod med tshogs gong 
60a8(rgyud 'grel): ma ltar// stong rtsa brgyad ni rig bcas bzlas// dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu// sbas te bzhag na myur ba ru// dkon mchog 'joms pa'i dgra bo che// skams sam 'chi 'am skrod par 
60b1(rgyud 'grel): des// las de bdud rje 'khyil pa yi// sbyar ba yis kyang rab tu bsgrub// thams cad snga ma bzhin bya sa la// chag 'di ni rab tu brtsam// rgyal mtshanangs na chag gang la// gru bzhi snyam pa 
60b2(rgyud 'grel): kha ti dang // a ri sha yi lo ma dang // rab sregs spro byed sal ba dang // mra zi'i drag dang rkang g.yon gyi// ming med khrag la snag char byas// khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yi// rlung gi dkyil 
60b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khar gzhu 'dral// phyogs bzhi mtshams rtse bston pa'i// ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor la la// de dbus bsgrub bya'i gzugs zas la// de yi snying gar phreng sngags ni// gong gi rig 
60b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa// dgrag mer bris nas ste gar dz+nyAn// bklag ste bcug nas rkang g.yan gyis// mnan brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// na maHsa maH/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra na/ nam 
60b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daM shwo Ta/ ka Ta b+he ra ba yaM/ a saM mu sa la pa ra shra/ bA sha ha ta ya/ oM a pri ta kraN+Da li kha kha kha hi kha hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+d+ha b+har+d+ha/ hi na ha ne/ btsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ 
60b6(rgyud 'grel): bai swa Ta yai baM s+pho Ta ye/ sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya ka naM/ che ge mo usmA Ta ya phaT/ de yang phyag 'tshal 'jug tr-i yang // bskal pa 'di ni bye ba dang // phyag 'tshal bskal dang bod pa dang / 
60b7(rgyud 'grel): las brgyad de dag tu shes bya// de ltar bsngags nas ras ma do// ma mo la sogs gnas su sba// sangs rgyas dpung yang sked byed na/ bgegs kyi gnod pa smos ci dgos// 
60b8(rgyud 'grel): da ni bsgrub bya srin po la sogs pas// 'dzin du gzhug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// gzhan gyi mi thub rnal 'byor gyis// gsum pa'i dus su 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas ldan par// cho ga 'di yi sa las 'di byed// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun dang // shi ba'i thod pa gnyis btsal la// dur khrod kyi na sol ba la// khro bo'i sngags 
61a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rigs bcas bzlas// de yi thod par srin po'i gzugs/ 'jigs rur gyen brdzes mche gtsigs pa// sha rlon za zhing khrag 'dzag pa// g.yas g.yon rol ngas gri dang ni// sdigs mdzub bye ba hUM/ 
61a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bri// de yi snying gar rus phye dang // dug dang mthe'u chung khrag gis ni// che ge mo ni zung zhig bri// yang ni thod pa gnyis pa la// bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni// ro bsregs sa dang thal ba 
61a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // sol ba gcin gyis spras byas la// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su// dug dang rus phye mdzub mo khrag/ ming dang sngags bcas ta le bres// de yi snying gar gzhug par bya// gnyi ga bkug ste 
61a5(rgyud 'grel): bcug byas nas// de ni 'og bzhag gong ma ster// srin po de yis bsgrub bya rnams// bzung bar bsams nas khros byas te// nag po gnyis las dur khrod du// nam phyed song nas bsgreng byas te/ 
61a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas srin pos 'dzin par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta nan/ kA ya wa ka tsit+ta ba dzA NAM/ oM hUM dzi na ri ta che ge mo rak+Sha g+hi hA hUM phaT/ de bzhin sbrul dang saing+ge dang // 'byung po sdig la sogs pa rnams/ 
61a7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gong bzhin gnyis par bri// gong gi sngags de rig bcas bzla// g.yeng med gnyis kyi mtshan dus su// khros nas bsgreng zhing bzlas byis pas// gal te mi bskyod yin na yang // de dag rnams 
61a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag thar bar byed 'dod pas// 'dzin byed de dag thams cad kun// bsgrub bya'i lus la bsdus byas la// rkang pa gnyis kyis mnye bar bya// lag gnyis 'bar ba'i rdo rjer 
61b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// de yis byugs pas bdug par bya// rdo rje 'bar bas brdung ba dang // sngon gyi sngags bzlas bcug mas gdab// che ge mo rak+Sha sa 'di phyi mo tsa ya// srin mo ma rungs gtum po dang // 'jigs pa 
61b2(rgyud 'grel): chen pos 'khrugs pa la// sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar na// cho ga bzhin du grol bar byed// / da ni dgug pa'i cha ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// lha yis dbang bskur yan 
61b3(rgyud 'grel): chad ni// thams cad gong ma bzhin byas la// bsam gtan 'khor los dgug par bsgrub// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo chen po rnam par bsam// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas 
61b4(rgyud 'grel): la// lcags kyu gnas ni bsgom par bya// oM AHdzi na dzi ka che ge ma sems can nam sems can ma yin pa A kaR+Sha yaM dza brjod pas de las rab 'phros pas// lcags kyu zhags pas mtshan pa yi// 
61b5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi skra ni mang po dag/ bsgrub bya 'gugs phyir spro bar bya// dgug bya meng gi yi gas bskyed// ye byung rlung dkyil la bzhag ste// lcags kyus snying btab zhags pas bcings// rlung gis btegs nas 'od 'bar
61b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo sogs// mtshan ma'i lha rnams spros byas nas// de yis btab pas de bzhin du// dgug par the tshom med pa'o// laM gis phab ste mdun bzhag nas// sngon bzhin lha mo gnyis 
61b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// 'tshe ba bzlog nas bka' nod bsam// de ltar sbyor bas zhag bdun du// thun bzhir rab tu sbyar byas nas// dgug las mi 'da' kun gyis kyang // sgrub po la sa thabs byed par 'gyur// de bzhin mi 
61b8(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rdo rje dang // rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpag med// 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// lcags kyu gnas bsam rang sngags brjod// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+rika che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza/ oM AHA ro lika 
62a1(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza/ gzhan kun sngon bzhin dpag byas la// thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar ba yis// rdo rje gsum gyi nus pa yang // 'gugs 'gyur ba sgrub bya smos ci dgos// 
62a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi spyod pa gzhan bral bas// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis// dgug pa dag ni thabs su gsungs// dga' dang dga' ba bar ma yin// bskyed 
62a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gang du mngon byas la// bsgrub bya ye shes re be ru// byas te gnyis par chud byas te// ma 'bros rtse gcig pa yis bzung // ye shes gsum gyis sku gsum mchog/ de yi rgyud la 'gugs 'gyur 
62a4(rgyud 'grel): na// sngags chud la sogs bsgrub bya ni// smas ci dgas te de mchog yin// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// las rnams kun 'di bsten pa yis// lus sogs med pa'ang dgug sogs 'gyur// 
62a5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rang gi sngags kyis reg pa mchag/ grangs mer bzlas pa rab tu bya// de nas lung rtsal thob pa yis// 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas 
62a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bya// ri mo'i dkyil 'khar bris byas la// lha yaMs dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs// bud med gzhon nu'i thod pa ni// ma chags cing ni mags pa// pad+ma ltar mdzes yid du'ang // dum bu gcig pa 
62a7(rgyud 'grel): blangs byas nas// gi wa la ni sngags bzlas nas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris te// lte bar dgug par bya ba ni// gur gum gau ro tsa nas bri// gro gshog shog la sogs 
62a8(rgyud 'grel): la// phreng sngags 'di ni mi dgug par// swA hA btan ti dza bcug nas// bskul ba dang bcas bris nas ni// de yi snying gar glan par bya// thod pa de yang kha sbub nas// gshin rje gshed kyi zhabs 
62b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang // g.yan pa bskum pas mnan byas la// wa dang bcas pas gsang sngags 'di// da jigs ma dang bcas bsams par// lan gsum drag tu brjed par bya// namaHsa man+ta ka ya wAg 
62b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA tra/ oM la kha hrI / sarba duSh+Tanas twa da ma ka/ a sa~M sra sal pa shra bA ga taSh+TA ya/ tud+hA tsata pral// ga sha tsa rA ya/ A gats+tsha swA gar+b+ha/ sa rba da? na p+tA Sh+Ta a pa riNi/ ma hA bag+h+nAn pa n+d+ha sa / 
62b3(rgyud 'grel): bekr-i d+han na sarba b+hu ta b+hA ya kar ya/ A gat+ta ha sa dad ni/ b+hUg+h+na tsar ma Ni ba san/ ku ru kA raM/ sarba karma rbi d+ha tsan+tu/ sarba man traM/ b+hinA b+hin+ta/ pa ra muH/ bram chag A kaR+Sha ya A ka ya/ sarba buMta/ namaH 
62b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha sa/ sarba duSh+Than/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ba baM ba~M ba swAt+ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka pr-i ya/ ku ru kra ru/ ma ma ka~Mr+ya/ daH hi/ patsaM pa tsaM/ ma bi la ba ma bi la ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sA ra d+hu d+hU phaT phaT/ swaT+Ta 
62b5(rgyud 'grel): s+pha Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya sha ni suM ka ra ka ra/ he he b+ha ga ban/ ki d+hi ra ya saM ma ma ar+tha sA d+ha ya dz+nyA/ de las 'bros pa'i gshin rje gshed// lcags su thags pa mang po yis// sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i// 
62b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya bud med dgug par byed// skrag pas 'cha ba bzlog pa'i phyir// spyan ma'i sngags kyis sngon bzhin du// ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir// mA ma kI ni sbyar bas srung // de bzhin skyes pa'i thod pa la// g.yan 
62b7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang g.yas bskum pas mnan te// cho ga sngon bzhin rab byas te// skyes pa rnams kyang dgug par byed// bsam gtan sngags rgyud sbyor ba yis// zhag bdun thun bzhir rab brtsams nas// gshin rje gshed kyi 
62b8(rgyud 'grel): yon tan yang // dgugs 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// 'dad pa'i rgyal po khro ba che// 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshogs bskam/ khro mo rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/ gshin rje gshed 
63a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyud gsungs pa'i// tshogs bsgrub bya bkug bcug nas// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gyis mnan na// sngags 'dis rigs bcas pazlas brjod bya// na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ 
63a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA NA/ ta ki bu ma che ge ma swA A kaR+Sha ya dza// brjod pas sngags byung khro bo yis// lugs kyu sngon bzhin bkug byas nas// zhi bsrung ba'i cho ga yis// lha rnams la sogs 'grags par byed// sngon bzhin thams cad rab 
63a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la// rdo rje las byung me g.yo ni// 'og nas 'byung bzhin rab bsgoms la// lha chen chung mar bcas pa dgug/ skyes pa'i thod pa mags pa// mdzes shing srubs med mags pa// 'thab tshe g.yul du shi 
63a4(rgyud 'grel): pab yaM// skyon med pa de btsal bar bya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i song mo'i khrag/ lan tsha yungs kar ske tshol// sdug cha byas nas bya rgod rkang // lha chen chung mar bcas pa kun// bod pa de la bri bar bya// de yi snying 
63a5(rgyud 'grel): gang gong ma ltar// rig bcas sngags ni dgug par bya// bris nas snying gar klan par bya// bkug ste bcug nas khas sbubs la// g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang bas mnan na// sngags 'di thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ 
63a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang bcas bzlas dgug bya// na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wa krIt+ta badz+rA NAM// a tsa la ga na tseta/ da TA na TA/ mo Ta mo Ta/ so ta so ti/ da had ha/ mo ha mo ha/ sa ha sa ha/ ha na hA na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha a bi sha/ ma hA ma da ta pa la ka/ 
63a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hud+han d+ha na/ shi ni ti ni/ kha da kha da/ big+h+nA na mar ma ra duSh+TAn na/ b+hak+Sha b+ha Sha/ sarba ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi sha badz+ra s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya// hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba li baM ga na ta ya/ a haM a taM/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pha ta ya s+tha 
63a8(rgyud 'grel): te ye/ hU hUM/ a sa man+ti ka/ tra ta ma hA ba la/ sa~M ma ya man+tan/ ha ma shuta bu lo ka du sh+ya du/ badz+ra na mo sta pri ti ha ta ba la bya// dza la ya tra ta a sa tan nam/ lha chen po bud med dang bcas pa A kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA/ 
63b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags las byung ba'i khro bo che// lugs kyu thogs pas 'gugs bsams nas// sngon bzhin rab mchod bsrung ba yis// g.yog dang chung ma'i bya ba byed// de bzhin lha min la sogs kyang // sbyor ba de 
63b2(rgyud 'grel): yis rab bsgrubs na// skrag cing 'jigs pa gong mas bsrung // kha sbyar lus su bcas pa 'grub// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis// gnod mdzes rgyal po bsgom 
63b3(rgyud 'grel): byas te// bu mo rnams ni dgug par bya// mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa// rgyal mtshan gyur pa'i thod pa la// rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag/ snag tsha byas nas ne tso sgros// bsgrub bya'i bu 
63b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i gzugs bris la// de'i snying gang gong ma ltar// rig bcas sngags bre glan byas la// de yaM b+ha gar gnod mdzes kyi/ rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan// thun bzhir zhag bdun gsang sngags 'di// 
63b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul dang bcas pas khros byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o// oM su b+ha ni suM b+ha bu mo che ge mo hUM/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na bu mo che ge mo hUM/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya/ bu mo che ge mo hUM/ A na ya hoHb+ha ga ban bi d+ya 
63b6(rgyud 'grel): rA dza bu mo che ge mo hUM phaT dz+dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// gnod mdzes gyur pa lugs kyu zhags// thogs pa 'phros pas rlung dkyil la// gnas pa'i bu mo snying ga phug/ zhags pas ske nas 
63b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas ni// 'ongs po'i tshen bzlog pa'i phyir// zhing dang bsrung bas brtan byas pas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed// gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'thor pas// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 
63b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// kha ti la sogs bsgrub byas la// skyes pa bud med dgug pa bsgrub// zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe// btsag gam rdo chus la sogs pa// rang gi kha ru bcug nas kyang // de nyid gsum bskyed lha ru 
64a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de bar rang sngags bcug nas ni// s+pha ra Na yis spro byas pas// de las byung ba'i lha rnams ni// lcags kyus mtshan pas na mkha' dgang // bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus 
64a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// rdzas kyis lha la bstim par bya// brtan pa'i ngo bos yang dang yang // zla ba grol gyi bar du gzung // de nas brtsams te thun bzhi ru// zhag bdun goms byas de bton la// tshangs pa drag po laM sog 
64a3(rgyud 'grel): lha// gang gi ming rnams bris 'gyur na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// skrag cing 'jigs nas 'ongs 'gyur na// tha mal skyes pa bud med sogs// smos ci dgos par 'ong bar 'gyur// sngon bzhin 
64a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la sogs nas// dbang bskur yan chad zhugs byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// thor tshugs gcig ma bsgom par bya// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbu ma sngo// dang pos rang gi thabs 
64a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'khrud// g.yas gnyis gra dang rol gri dang // g.yon gnyis thod pa nor bu bsnams// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa// rnam par smin sogs mos pa yis// rnga sgra dang ni ldan byas nas// cung 
64a6(rgyud 'grel): zad mche gtsigs dmigs par bya// mtshams thung mi smar gyur pa yi// thod pa klu shing me tog dang // rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag/ bsres te 'o mar sbyar byas la// de yi skra yi par gyis na// 
64a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// nor rgyas la sogs bu mo bri// de yi snying gar rig sngags ni// bskul ba dang bcas bris te glan// bkug ste bcug nas g.yos brkyang ste// g.yon bskam pa yis/ 
64a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas byas la// sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM A badz+ra shu li ni klu'i bu mo che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dz+dza/ brjod pas gsum las byung ba yi// ma dud can ma ni lcags kyus mtshan// rlung dkyil 
64b1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas bsgrub bya ni// bcug ste sngon bzhin 'tshe ba zlog/ de ltar zhag bdun thun bzhir// sngags rgyud de yis rab sbyar nas// klu yi bu mo mag bzang dag/ bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya// thams 
64b2(rgyud 'grel): cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// khro gnyer ma yi sbyor ba yis// na mkha'i rigs 'dzin bu mo dgug/ dmar sku g.yas sde g.yon dkar ba// dang po rang gi thabs la 'khyud// 
64b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis pad+ma ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen 'khor lo 'dzin// gsum po mos pas dpag med mtshan// se ral thod pa'i phreng ba brgyan// rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' klubs// 
64b4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa bsgom// rgyal po 'dra ba'i bu \u0f7f ye// thod par rigs 'dzin bu mo'i gzugs// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gang gi rdzas kyis bri bar bya// snying gar sngon bzhin med bras 
64b5(rgyud 'grel): nus/ bku ste bcug nas g.yas brgyad dang // gsan bsrum pa las san/ sa la// 'dzin da cag ban+d+ha/ pa yan ka niHsa rba b+hin d+ha mAtra sa la/ btIb taM/ ba tu 
64b6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo che ge mo A ka rA ya dz+nyA/ brjod pas sngags las byung ba'i// khro gnyer lcags kyus mtshan pa yis// rlung gi dkyil 'khar la gnas pa'i// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ gser gyi 
64b7(rgyud 'grel): rna rgyan 'phyang ba rnams// bkug ste 'ongs pa rgyas btab po// lhan gyis grub pa gnyis ma dgos// thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar na 'grub// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byar pas// sngon bzhin thams cad 
64b8(rgyud 'grel): rab byas la// mar ngo bcu bzhi tshes brgyad la// ro bsregs sol ba blangs nas ni// sngags 'di brgyartsabargyad du ni// bzlas nas srin po la sogs pa// ming bcas gro ga la sogs la// bris nas de yi 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): dgug par byed// oM hrIHSh+NI wi kri tA na na srin po la sogs pa che ge mo skyes pa 'am bud med 'di bdag la byin zhig staM pa ya hUM phaT dz+dza/ brjod cing de mnan thun bzhi ru// bdun spyar/ 
65a2(rgyud 'grel): srin po la sogs pas// rang gis bka' stsal gang yang rung // khrid nas nges par 'bul bar byed// 'das ma thag pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya
65a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ bsgrub phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya// dur khrod thal ba sol ba la// hom khung gru gsum khrud pa// zabs su khru gang kho khyer ni// so ra ma brgyad pa'i tshad du bya// rdo rje rtse gsum sor bcu gnyis// 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse dbus lugs kyi ltar byas nas// dbus dang kha khyer la bkod de// dmar nag kha khyer rams kyis byug/ ji skad gsungs pa'i gshin rje gshed// hUM bskyed rdo rje lce ldan pa'i// zhal du nges par bsgyur byas la// 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): po so cha sogs me sbar ro// rug ni khrag dang rab tu sbyar// lan cha ska cha de bzhin sbyar// du du a ye 'bras bu yi// zhag du bsreg cing lus dang rig/ khro zhing bsgrub bya'i ming bcas pa'i// sngags 'di// 
65a6(rgyud 'grel): stong dang rtsa brgyad du// bla dang ldan pas g.yel medo pas// zla zhing sbyin sreg brtsam pa'o// oM hrISh+Ti we kr-i tA na na bum tshig mo ste ba ya na sha ya hUM hUM phaTadz+dza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed/

65a8(rgyud 'grel): des// nyi ma gsum dang drug tu bya// 'ongs pas 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir// sngon bzhin zhi dang bsrung ba bya// bskal pa grangs med gsum du'ang // de yis rtag tu 'dul bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): sam ni chos 'dzin nam// rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni// de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// / da ni klu skams pas char bcad par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// sngon bzhin byas pa'i
65b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid// kha dog ser po bsgoms byas la// char mi bcad pa 'gog pa bya// yul yul kun nas phyogs gcig ste// hUM bskyed sna tshogs rdo rje ni// rab 'bar me stag 'phro 
65b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// 'dod pa'i phyogs ni g.yogs par bsam// de yi lte bar hUM bskyed pa'i// rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu ni// ta la'i tshad tsam me 'bar ba'i// bum par rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru gong gi sbyor ba ni// 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang bcas de bzhin bsgom// bdag ci 'dra bar 'khor rnams kyang // brjod pas bsams te sngags 'di bzlas// oM AHhUM ma hA ba ra sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de rnams ba spu bug las// 'phros pa'i 'od 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): zer ser po yis// 'dod pa'i phyogs ni khyab bsams pas// sna tshogs rdo rje me yis ni// sa gzhi thams cad bsregs nas ni// klu skams gyur zhing 'bras bsams na// rang 'dod gnas las phyi rol 
65b6(rgyud 'grel): tu// 'bab bam 'on te mi 'bab 'gyur// yang na sbyor ba des gnas la// ske tshe lan tsha 'bru mar dang // dug dang da du ra dag gis// dur khrod ras la 'khrul 'khor bri// dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// klu brgyad nam 
65b7(rgyud 'grel): gi sa bon nam// rang rang snying po bri ba'o// phu pheM phe pho pho phi pheM// snying po phaT gnyis bar du ni// chu yi snying po bA bris la// de rnams bkrag ste sa bon la// bcug ste gsal bar bsgom par bya// yang ni ras ma gnyis pa 
65b8(rgyud 'grel): la// las kyi rdo rje ser po ni// 'od zer 'bar ba bri byas la// lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// hUM gis mtshan pa bri bar bya// gong gi sbyor bas byin brlabs la// dang po ras ma bkan te bzhag/ ras ma gnyis pa khas sbub nas// rdol 
66a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mnan byas pas// gong ma'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya// klu rgyal 'bum ni khros gyur yang // char pa 'gog pa'i mchog yin no// // da ni pha rol gyi rag dang dpung gnon pa'i cho ga 
66a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya'o// snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas// ting 'dzin 'di yis zhag bdun du// thun bzhir gzugs brnyan gcig sbyar bya// 'phral du mngon du phyis byed 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ldan pas// gcer bu la 
66a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyir rgol rnams// ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed// spobs pa mnan phyir de yi mgor// laM la dbang chen ser po la// grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bsam// de steng haM byung las rdo rje// de steng paM bskyed pad+ma la// 
66a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang pa ji bzhin bsam// de dbus khro ba 'khor lo che// kha dog ser po bsgom byas nas// de ni gnon par rnam par bsam// rkan gyi dbus su haM bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi yis// gsum pos 
66a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo rna ba yis// lkog mar phrag bsam sngags bzla'o// de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags// che ge ba sha pa ya hUM// brjod cing bltas pas bsgrub bya re// mig mi lta zhing spra mi nus// gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 
66a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'di yang sngon bzhin rab sbyar nas// gang che dpung tshogs mthong ba yi// de tshe las la yang dag sbyar// dpung rnams kun gyi spyi bo ru// sa sogs rten ni sngon bzhin bskyed// 'khor lo thams cad khrob che// pad+ma/ 
66a7(rgyud 'grel): ser po mdog ltar bsgom// ri yi rgyal po tsam bsams te// de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags// bcu pa ya hUM zhes brjod// dpung rnams sa 'og 'bying par 'gyur// khro bo rnams ni par bltas bsam// ba hu 
66a8(rgyud 'grel): rahUM zhes brjod// de dag phyir ni mi ldog par// 'bros par rab tu gyur pa'o// gal te khro bo rang mdun bltas// ba t+ya grih+Na hUM zhes brjod// de ni 'azos par byed 'dod kyang // mdung bzhin du ni rengs par 'gyur// 
66b1(rgyud 'grel): tshu rol pham par byed 'dod pas// gnyi ga mdun gyi phyogs byas pas// ba hu e hi hUM brjod pas// pha rol rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// de ltar sbyor ba'i rnam pa yis// g.yel ba med par sbyar 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dpung 
66b2(rgyud 'grel): yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni dogs pa med// yang ni sngon bzhin rab byas la// gang che dbung tshogs mthong 'gyur nas// de rmongs bya phyir phur bu yi// bsam gtan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// hUM las bskyed pa'i bur 
66b3(rgyud 'grel): bu ni// steng ni rtse lnga 'og rtse gcig/ sor brgyad tshad tsam rab bsams la// ded dpon dang pos dpung rnams bskyed// thams cad snying ni phyogs bsams nas// de ni rdo rje tho bo yis// khros shing thams cad phog 
66b4(rgyud 'grel): bsams la// sngags 'dis rab tu gdab pa'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ dpung thams cad phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ dpung thams cad phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ro yadz+nyA pa ya ti/ dpung thams/ 
66b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ khros pas bzla zhing btab 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dag gi dpung dag kyang // ting 'dzin de yis 'jig 'gyur na// mi yaM dbang po smos ci dgos// // da ni char dbab pa'i cho ga 
66b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bshad par bya'o// 'og byung ba yi rim pa yis// stobs po che yi rnal 'byor pas// grangs med bzlas pas bka' lung thob// 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya// thams cad dmar por rab bsams 
66b7(rgyud 'grel): la// rdza por so ni ma btang la// ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po bri// de la rams kyi khu ba yis// rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma yi// sngags kyi snying po 'di bri'o// oM shu li ni naM swA hA bri// 
66b8(rgyud 'grel): de dang 'dra ba'i kham phor bzhag/ kha sbyar skud pa sngon dmar dkri// de dang des 'dul rab bkug ste// 'khor lo 'di la gnas par bsam// de ni ji bzhin gzhan thal sbyar// mchod pa tshogs kyis mchod byas 
67a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// klu gnas mtsho dang rdzi dbu sogs// gzhan la gsangs nas gzhug pa'o// bdag nyid gnas dgon dben pa ru// sa sogs cho ga sngo 'gro bas// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng// 
67a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bri// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po de// phyogs dang mtshams ni ma 'khrul bar// sbrul brgyad phyi rol sgrol mar bri// dbus su chu dag dkar po che// sbrul mag 
67a3(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa zhabs klu gcig/ skyes bu'i gdong can sbrul zhags bsnams// lto 'phye mkha' 'gro zhon pa bri// shar gyi 'dab mar mtha' yas ldang // ut+pal thogs pa bri bar bya// lho yi 'dab mar nor rgyas 
67a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar// rin chen bum thogs bri bar bya// nub kyi 'dab mar 'jog po dmar// dgra sta thogs pa bri bar bya// byang drakarkoHnag po// sbrul gsheg thogs pa bri bar bya// nub phyogs 'dab mar pa d+ma dkar// 
67a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma thogs pa bri bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar pad chen dkar// pad dkar thogs pa ze bar bya// rlung mtshams 'dab mar dung skyong ser// dung por thogs pa bri bar bya// dbang ldan rigs ldan sna tshogs pa/ 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// de dag kun kyang sbrul mgo gdengs// zhabs kyang sbrul 'khyil sprin gyis ni// gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya// g.yo ba drag po la sogs pa// rang rang phyogs su brgyad pa ni// zung 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sgo ru gnyis 'khril nas// sgo zur gnyis su mgo mdzag bsnol// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// bum pa'o mas gang ba dgu// phyogs mtshams rnams su bzhag nas ni// rgyan rnams kyis kyang mdzes 
67a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de yi rtog pa las bshad pa'i// tsho gas klu rnams nam gis bskyed// srog dang bcas pa bzhin du ni// gong ma lta bu bsgom par bya// de rnams dza na dza zhes brjod// de nas bkug la gtsang gtor sogs// 
67b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas de la zhugs par bsam// de nas gtor ma 'o mar bcas// bu dam la sogs lha bshos che// phul nas rang rang sngags 'di ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dga' bar bya// oM be ba ru na ya ga tI pad ye nA ga na 
67b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+mA ya hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM aM a nan+ta ya hUM ne hUM swA hA/ oM ba ba su ke hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM taM tak+Sha hUM naM hUM swAhA/ oM kaM karko Ta hUM na hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma hUM na hUM swA hA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma hU~M naM hU~M swA hA/ oM saM sa kha ba la 
67b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM na hUM swA hA/ oM a na pa ta ha hUM naM hUM swA hA/ de nas pog snod bzung byas te// gtor ma sogs kyis mnyes byas la// stobs chen sbyor ba de nyid kyis// bzhag ste tshig gis gsol ba gdab// klu chen po ni khyed
67b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis// bdag la yang dag dga' ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yis ni// char gyi rgyun ni dbab tu gsol// lan gsum brjod pas klu rnams kyis// dga' bas char pa 'bebs bsams nas// 
67b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sbyor ba ma nyams par// ji bzhin rang gi sngags bzla'o// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA Sh+TiH badz+rA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaH/ oM u gral shul ba ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM dze tI ni nad Sh+TeSh+Ta d+hU phaT phaT pa 
67b6(rgyud 'grel): oM oM oM ma hA pa la ya swA hA/ de yi dbang du rab byas nas// sa gzhi thams cad cher gyis ni// rgyun gyis ngoms par byas nas ni// thams cad bde la gnas par byed// de yis phebs par mi gyur na// stobs
67b7(rgyud 'grel): po che yi rnal 'byor pas// thams cad dkar pos bsams byas te// zhi ba'i sbyin sregs gis ni bsgrub// haM khung zlum po khru gang par// khru phyed zabs su kha khyer la// sor bzhi tshad tsam de tsam 'phags// 
67b8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab mas bskor bar bri// 'khor lo 'khor lo phreng bskor la// rdo rgyus sogs kyis byugs byas te// ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis// me lha la sogs mchod par bya// de yi dbus su stobs pa 
68a1(rgyud 'grel): / 'go nas 'byung ba bzhin du byas// phyogs dang mtshams su klu brgyad kyang // de yi zhal ltas thal sbyar bsam// gong gi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// gsang gtor zhabs bsil la 
68a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// byas nas de la thim par bsam// de rnams lce yi dbus su ni// yi gau nam ni bsam byas te// blugs gzong dgang gzar cho ga bzhin// byas nas bsang gtor la sogs pa// yang ni byas 
68a3(rgyud 'grel): nas sbyin sreg dbul// 'o ma dang ni 'bras chan dang / bu ram sbrang rtsi le kha ra// dbang po la sogs sman rnams ni// dang por gsum gsum dbul bar bya// gong gi sngags la zhi ba yi// rig pa dang 
68a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas bzlas na ni// klu rnams kun la ci 'dod pa'i// gong gi rdzas ni sbyin sreg bya// tshim par byas nas rang gi sngags// gong ma bzhin du rab brjod pas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyogs rnams su/

68a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis saM dang ni// grog mkhar sa dang bshang gci bsres// klu yi gzugs brnyan mtho gsum pa'i// snying gar 'khor lo 'di ni gzhug/ dur khrod kyi ni ras ma la// ske tshe lin tshwa yungs mar dang // 
68a7(rgyud 'grel): khrag drug rams kyi snag cha yis// ral gri rtse brgyad 'khar la bri// de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// phu sogs brgyad ni bri ba dang // snyeng bar yi ge bA bris la// sngon bzhin bsams te dgug gzhug b+ha/ 
68a8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan yan lag thams cad kun// tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang // da dur dang yungs mar dang // byugs nas me la gdung bya zhing // gong gi sngags ni brjod bya zhing // klu rnams gzugs ni rab 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): tsha bas// bye ma pa yis 'jigs pa yis// 'jigs nas char rgyan 'jam pa yis// mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs ni 'bebs// de yis chad ni mi 'bebs na// sngon bzhin klu yi dkyil 'khar zi// ste 
68b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs ser po smad g.yogs dmar// ze'u kha sngon po bcings nas ni// gos ni dmar po bgo ba 'am// yang na gcer bur byung byas la// skra bshig so ni gtsigs byas nas// rkang par nyi ma'i dkyil 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la// rdo rje 'bar bar byin brlabs la// klu ni gan rgyal gnas par bsam// g.yon pas de yi dkyil 'khor mnan// skrag ste gdengs ka g.yo bar bsam// gyen bltas kha la sa b+hus 'debs 
68b4(rgyud 'grel): shig/ de yi khrag gis mkha' khyab nas// rgyab che lta bur gyur bsam nas// sngags 'di g.yeng ba med par bzla// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM naM d+hun hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM/ oM u 
68b5(rgyud 'grel): gra la shU la pa nin// hUMn d+hA na/ phaTan phaTan phaT/ a dze ti ni ra nad/ dUn tA ra hUM/ paT na paT naM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la naM phaT/ de yis klu rnams stobs chen la// skrag nas sa gzhi rgyas pa ru/ 
68b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dbang gis de dag gis// char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// des kyang cha re ni mi 'bab na// sngon bzhin mngon spyod ho khung du// po so cha yi tshe rams dgang // sme sha can gyi me sbar bya// me lha sngon 
68b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod byas nas// de dbus stobs po che bsams nas// zhal gdangs rdo rje rtse ldan pa// mche ba gtsigs pa bsams par bya// sngon gzugs klu yis gzugs brnyan ni// drug dang lan 
68b8(rgyud 'grel): da du ra// ske tshe sogs pa rab byas la// pus bskyed dkug cing gzhug par bya// de ni bshang dang gci bas byugs// gdug pa'i dgra yi se g.yon pa yis// de yi mjug ma'i rtse mo nas/ 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): gdub cing gang ma'i sngags zlo zhing // klu rnams ma ra ya phaT zhes// brjod cing sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// byin pas klu rnams thams cad kyang // cha ste skrag nas char 'bebs 
69a2(rgyud 'grel): byed// gal te de ltar byed pa la// char ni 'bebs par mi byed na// stobs po che yi 'gal ba'i phyir// de gnon pa yi cho ga bya// chu ngogs sa la sogs pa yi// sngon gsungs rdzas la khro bo che// 
69a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan zhal gsum phyag drug pa// byas te gan rgyal bzhag par bya// bdag nyid dpal ldan gsum pa yi// rnal 'byor 'og nas 'byung bzhin bskyed// de ni bkug nas gzugs brnyan bcug/ g.yon 
69a4(rgyud 'grel): pas mnan ta sngags zla'o// oM suMmaM b+ha ni sram b+ha naM/ ma hA ba la ba ra Sha shweb+hUm hUM phaT/ gr-i ha gri snyam thab la bar Sha shIsh+tsa dz+nyA phaT/ grih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya/ ma hA ba la ba Sha shIk+Sh+Na hUM phaT/ An ya Na b+ha ga pa na'i 
69a5(rgyud 'grel): d+had+yar dza ma hA ba la bar Sha shIg+h+ra~M hU~M phaT/ de'am ji bzhin khri phrag gnyis// bzlas brjod byas nas gang ma ye// ta ma khung dbus su gnod mdzes che// zhal gdangs hUM kaM lce can bsam// bskul ba'i tshig dang

69a7(rgyud 'grel): legs 'bru rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khrul 'khor rgyud ni kun la grags// de nas zhi ba'i ho khung ni// sngon bzhin du ni rab byas nas// spyan ma dkar mo bsams nas ni// de yi sngags dang de'i cho gas// mar
69a8(rgyud 'grel): dang 'o ma 'bras chan sogs// de yi zhal du dbab byas nas// sreg blugs khri phrag gcig dbul bas// klu dang khro bo stobs pa che// char bcad de yis zhi bar byed// des na de yis dga' 'gyur te/ 
69b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du sbyar ba tsam gyis ni// mod la char gri rgyun 'bebs byed// las kyi tshogs ni de dag gam// gzhan la sgrub po bsrung ba 'am// yang na bdag gis gzhan bsrang phyir// sbyor ba 'di ni bdum pa'o// rdo rje 
69b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa las byung ba'i// mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam// ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru// bsgrub bya bzhag nas sngags 'di bzla// a AHshang ka ri shan+tiM ka re g+huT To g+haT+Ta Ta g+huT DI ni g+huT Te ni g+hAta ya 
69b3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA che ge mo dak+Sha ra~Mk+Sha d+d+haM/ brjod pas sngon bzhin stobs dbab dang // dbang bskur byas nas bsgrub bya ste// rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yang // srang na gzhan sbyar smras ci dgas// gal te khyig ces la sogs

69b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin sngan bzhin bsam// de yi ye shes lha mo ni// thugs kar maM la bzlas pa'i sngags// yang 'greng rig bcas bskor bar bsam// de nyid bzlas pas 'od zer 'phros// de yis spyi bo nas brtsams

69b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos rnams kyis// don dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams// dag pa'i khro ba rnams kyi ni// bsgom pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bzhin rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // dang po mgan pa bskyed 
70a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// sems can skye rim bzhi spangs nas// bar ma'i sems kyis dang por 'gyur// bskul bas hUM lnga bruM ru byung // hUM lnga lugs kyu dbug tho dang // rtse gsum ral 
70a2(rgyud 'grel): gri rdo rjer 'gyur// b+h+rUM ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'gyur// de yang de dag rnams kyis mtshan// 'od kyi khams bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// rang dang 'dra ba'i skur byas te// bcug ste sa bon nang du thim// 
70a3(rgyud 'grel): Ta ki rgyal po khro bo che// sku dang dbu zhal mthing ga la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// dbyug sngon can ni khro bo che//

70b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dkyil 'khor nang // 'khor lo 'bar bas gtsug tor bskor// mi bskyod cod pan mtshan ma bsgom// de dag dran pa gcig pa ste// las kyi khyad par sgrub byed pas// 'di ni 'khor lor ldan pa yi// 
70b2(rgyud 'grel): zhar la de yi bsgrub pa gsungs// dgrag dang dbang gi dang ba dang // chos tshe byas mdzad mang bzhi// ma yin las kyi khyang par rnams// dang po gnyis pas yang bya ste// dus kyi bre brag nges med pas/

70b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // tshul dang mi g.yo rgyu nyid dang // 'bras bur dag ste de rnams kyi// spyi yi mtshan nyid rnam dag pa// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi// bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// gang phyir ri 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i brtul zhugs kyis// gzhung dra nges par gsungs pas na// las kyi rim pa bkang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i thig le rgyud las gsungs// dpyid sgrub thabs rim pa ni// rdzogs par bya phyir ba

70b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon dming phyag drug pa// dang pas rang gi rig ma 'khyud// g.yas gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon gnyis pad+ma zhag pa bsnams// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste// rin chen sna 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rgyan dang ldan// dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes// gtum pa'i hUM ge ngararo sgrogs// stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa// drag po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gis// lha chen chung mar bcas 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// ldan g.yon sa pa'i rnam mnan// cod pan me bskyod mtshan pa bsgom// de ltar bsgoms nas de yi sngags// hUM bzhi 'am de gsungs bcu bdun po// rtse gcigasas 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas ni// sngar bcas chog bzhin du bzlas// oM A gr-i ts+yai d+hA ka ran tan pa tha ban+da chu ban+ta/ rtsa ba'i reg pa'o// oM thaMd ya dz+dza/ swA dga'/ sa~M kA pA la hU~M phaT/ mchags ma la'o// oM A 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): ka ra ke ka be ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug tu'o// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la li ta bA kra he hU phaT/ go cha la'i// oM be bas sa tan ta ka hU~M phaT/ mtshon tsha la 'o// sbyor ba de yis ba dan dang // thal ba sAg tsha bcag sor 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gtub// skrod byed dag gi las rnams dag/ ji bzhin du ni bsgrub par bya// dur khrad ngas la ba dan ne// kha dag mtheng ga ser bcu drag/ sug ma'i yu ba~M khwa gang la// btags te dur khrod gnas su bsgrub// 
71a5(rgyud 'grel): deni lag tu gzung byas nas// zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na// de thogs dgra dpung la g.yabs pas// the tshom med par gnon par 'gyur// mtshon thogs bdag la gnod byed gzhan// bsgrub 
71a6(rgyud 'grel): ba po ni mtheng tsam gyis// de dag marung bzhin rengs par 'gyur// de bzhin glang rgyal myos pa dang // shing rta rta dang srog chags rngam// rkang thang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa// mthong ba tsam gyis rengs 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// mtshan mo mi ro bsregs pa yi// gnas song skra bshes gcer bur byung // bzlas pa bskor zhing rab byas nas// nam langs thal ba spar gang blang // lag pa g.yon pas 
71a8(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas ni// rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya// yang na lha khang stong par 'gro// phyir ni bltas par mi bya'o// de nas der yang thal ba de// zhag bdun sngags bzlas bsrung bar bya// snod 
71b1(rgyud 'grel): sar nang du rab bzhag ste// sa la bzhag par mi bya'o// de yis gong gi dpung gi tshogs// mthong na lan cig gtor tsam gyis// rengs par 'dod na rengs par 'gyur// rlung phyogs dag tu sbyar 
71b2(rgyud 'grel): ba na// ldog par 'dod na ldog par 'gyur// mdun du bsnyen te gtor byas na// myos par gyur de mtshon cha rngam// de kho na bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur// tshi la chen snum la mar me ni// thog pa bzod 
71b3(rgyud 'grel): por sbar bar bya// steng gi thod par du ba bsgo// snag tshar byas te de blangs la// zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na// du ba'i snag cha mig la bsku// de yis gang mthong thams cad
71b4(rgyud 'grel): kun// ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nyan 'gyur// yug snam bcag ni dge ba dag/ bsreg pa'i gnas 'gro khar bcug la// de phyed tshig pa'i dus su ni// grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang // 
71b5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi khang stong du khyer nas// gong gi sngags ni zhag bdun bzla// de che bgegs kyang sna tshogs 'ong // mi 'jigs 'dug cing de la bzla// de nas nam langs gyur pa na// ras ni dmar// 
71b6(rgyud 'grel): pos dkri byas la// mchod cing bsrungs nas bzhag par bya// de yis sems dang ldan pa'am// mi ldan gang gi ming bris pas// bskal nas dogs pa med pa yang // rdo rje 'chang ba'i
71b7(rgyud 'grel): bka' bzhin du// 'ongs nas la sa rnams thams cad byed// srog song dur khrod khyer ba na// gser gyi sor gdub de yi khar// bcugaM nas bdag nyid gcig pu ni// khro bo'i sngags ni/ 
71b8(rgyud 'grel): zlos shing 'dug/ ro de me yi sa tshig 'gyur na// kha yi sor gdub sgrub pa po'i// lag pa g.yon pas blangs byas la// zhag bdun bar du bzla bar bya// de nas sor gdub bzang po 
72a1(rgyud 'grel): de// lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la// bcug ste lag pa de yis ni// gang dang gang la reg 'gyur ba// de dang de yis las kun byed// phyi bzhin du'ang rtag 
72a2(rgyud 'grel): tu 'brang // rten 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab pas// 'di la dpyad par yod mi bya// sing ta'i shing la gab tshe yang // bzang po sor ni brgud pa bya// de yi nang du skrod byed kyang // dngos 
72a3(rgyud 'grel): grub sbyin par byed par blag/ zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i che// ma grol bar du de la bzla// de nas sngon bzhin 'khor lo bri// 'byung po gtor ma sbyin byas la// gab che nang gi skrod byed 
72a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // sgra 'byung yang nags kyi bar// de srid zhag bdun de la ni// khro bo'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya// de tshe skrod byed grub ma thag/ blangs nas gang yang rung ba ru// cho ga bzhin du sbyar na ni// de yis 
72a5(rgyud 'grel): mi nus gcig kyang med// sa yang 'gas byed chu yang skems// rin chen phye ma bzhin du rlog/ ri rtser sbyar na brnyil bar byed// khrag dang sol ba'i sol 'bebs byed// gnam ldugs dag ni 'thor ba 
72a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // sa g.yon sprin ni gtor ba dag/ rnal 'byor pa yis rab sbyar na// glo bur du ni thogs med 'grub// mcho g.yo klu rnams skrag pa dang // shing rnams 'bras bu glo bur 'byin// gzhan yang 
72a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po ci bsams pa'i// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'di ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sngags chud ldan pa'i las rnams de// gzhan yang de las gsungs pa yi// las rnams mkhas 
72a8(rgyud 'grel): pas shes par bya// da ni thun mong gi dngos grub kyi mjug tu mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// rdo rjes bzlas gnas rnal 'byor pas// rang gis dgos pa rdzogs bya'i phyir/ 
72b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi rigs kyi khro bo mchog/ mngag gzhug pa ru bsgrub par bya// 'dod pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor pa'i// thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// bri ni 'od zer lnga 'bar ba// na mkha'i dbus su bsam par bya// 
72b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings bde gshegs byang chub sems// rig pa'i lha dang khra bo'i tshogs// gang bar bsams nas sngags 'di yis// sku gsung thugs la gnas la gdab// oM A waM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi nan b+hak+Sha 
72b3(rgyud 'grel): A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ phab pas gnas de rigs kyi rim// mi bskyod pa ya a gyur te// tshe dpag med pa'i khaM du gyur// rnam par snang mdzad ding gyur to// cho ga de la skad cig gis// cho ga gnyis pa bsgrub 
72b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// oM de bdud rtsi 'khyil par gyur// thal sbyar gzhon la sngon bzhin bsam// khaM de pad+ma mthar byed gyur// de ni gshin rje gshed gyur to// de dag sngon bzhin ni ma la// gnas te dang po thal 
72b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bsam// lha mo spangs pa'i phyag mtshan yang // g.yas kyi tha mar dpa' bo dang // lcags kyus bkang ba'i snod gzung nas// sgrub pa po la stobs byed bsgom// de dag gnas gsum
72b6(rgyud 'grel): gong ma yi// a khaM de ni bkod byas nas// de nas bskul ba la sogs pas// don yod grub pas dbu brgyan te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pi'i thugs ka ru// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ 
72b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma mthar byed thugs ka ru// de gnas che dpag med par bsgom// gshin rje gshed kyi thugs ka ru// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rnam par snang
72b8(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rab tu bsgom// de nas rigs gsum phyag gnas pa'i// mdung rtse gsum dang kyo ba dang // rdo rje dang ni gtun shing gis// gsang ba'i gnas la gdab cing bskul// oM mi bskyod pa ni 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mchog/ khyed kyis rigs kyi khro bo che// nga yi re ba rdzogs bya'i phyir// khyed kyis mngag gzhug pa ru bskul// tshe dpag med dang snang mdzad kyang // de bzhin du ni bskul/ 
73a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te// nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// bsam gtan 'din zla phyed bsgom// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gis// rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed dang // 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 
73a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// des khrid sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro// zab cing rgya che'i chos thob 'gyur// de ni gnyid sogs dang bral yang // bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs nas// gnyid 'od de ru gong gsungs pa'i//

73a6(rgyud 'grel): shes gyur// 'don po'i dang po'i gnas bzhin du// thams cad brjod pas lung rdo thags// de bas dad pa sngon 'gro bas// gzhung gidon la brtan par bya// da ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i

73b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtha' la snang // dgas pa 'grub pa des bzla baH// ceg srung margyan ma mthong 'gyur nas// rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya mchag/ gong du bstan pa'i tshig yis// bzag ste bdag gir bya ba'o// 
73b3(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig yid 'ong mgon// rang nyid ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni// mi phyed gnas su zla drug tu// gsang ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa bya// brgyad pa'i man ngag las gsungs pa'i// lus ngag yid kyi spyod
73b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dag phyir nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug brtson par bya// de yis zla ba gcig gis ni// skal ldan gyur pa'i the tshom med// de dang lnga yi bar du ni// rjes mthun shis pa'i zas 
73b5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod// rang gi khams na rang gnas pa'i// bde gshegs rnams kyis thugs gdungs nas// de ru byon nas sgrub po la// 'phral du bka' stsal ster bar gyur// de nas bka' stsa la thog ma thag/

74a1(rgyud 'grel): sh+yabya// nyid 'dug/ ri dgas lte ba'i dri bro ste// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// sna ma dang mig stong gdan bzhin no// tsher mang chu mig grog ral mang // mi sdug gnas su bdag rgya bas//
