118a6(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa'i// skabs dang ldan par bsam pa la// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'o// bsgoms pas byang chub des byed phyir// 'jig rten byeb me byed pa'i// mtshan nyid gang snyoms chen po ste// de rnams nges 
118a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam par bya'o// 'jam dpal nyid du bsgrub pa yang // bsod nams med par mi 'grub pas// sbyin pa la sogs 'grub pa'i chu// dbul phyir bdag gis mi nus pas// snying gang yid sbyin nor bu / 
118a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don kun 'grub byed pa'i// ma nyid rab cu dran byas te// da 'ad las zung nam mkha' la// bla ma dam paM sangs rgyas rnams// sras deng bcas pa dgas ma byas nas// ni me 'od zeng las byung gi// sman mo 
118b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i lha mo bcus// dngos su gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // gzhan yang phye yi mchod pa'i sprin// rin chen bdun dang mchod pa lnga// dri yi phye ma sna tshogs gos// sna tshogs rgyan dang phreng ba dang // gdugs dang
118b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // rnga yab sbrang yab bsil yab dang // rta dang glang po bud med tshogs// sang+ge gdan dang bla re sogs// ji snyed brtan pa'i sems kyis su// mchod pa byas nas phyag kyang bya// thog ma med pa'i 
118b3(rgyud 'grel): srid rgyun man chad blo gros rnam rtogs las byung ma lus tshang sdig gang // thugs rje cher ldan pa lus bdun du chog de bzhin de rnams bdag gis bshags par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'phags dang gzhan rnams kyis ni dge ba gang mdzad pa// de rnams lhag med rjes su yi rang bla med byang chub chen por yang dag bdag gis bsngo// spro byed dri med thugs ni zla ba lta bu mtha' yas thugs rje dam 
118b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs rnams la// bde bar gshegs pa kun la bdag nyid nang 'khor spyod bzhin rtag tu rab tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa ji snyed ma lus grol ba lhag med dam pa'i sems can phun sum tshogs pa'i rten// ji 
118b6(rgyud 'grel): snyed thams cad ro gcig dngos po chos la bdag nyid kyis ni rab tu skyabs su mchi// yang dag bcings pa ma lus grol ba'i thugs mchog dang ldan kun gyi dpal nyid yang dag bstod// rab dga' la sogs/ 
118b7(rgyud 'grel): sa bcur bzhugs rnams rab tu byung bdag tshogs la yang dag skyabs su mchi// bsam pa'i ngo bo rnam smin dag phyir sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yang dag shin tu bcom// yongs su grol ba'i sems
118b8(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam brgyan bla med byang chub la ni yang dag bskyed par bya// sras ldan bde bar gshegs dang lam gcig tu ni sbyin sogs yon tan dkar po dngos po ste/ ma lus yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin blo yis 
119a1(rgyud 'grel): da ltar bdag gis brten par gyi// 'jig rten ma lus 'di rnams lta ba'i dra bas bcings pa la ni snying rje chen po bskyed// bla med byang chub sems ni dri med rin chen bdag gis yang dag yongs su 
119a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// rang bzhin dang bral stong pa nyid// rgyu med pas ni mtshan ma med// so sor rtog ge kun bral bas// ji snyed smon pa ma lus bral// de skad lan gsum brjod par bya// bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs byas 
119a3(rgyud 'grel): nam// ye shes tshogs kyi don du ni// stong pa nyid ni bsam par bya// oM shUn+yan+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ sngags 'di bzlas pa byas nas su// 'gro ba kun gyi lus ngag yid// de rnams bdag gis ngo bo gcig/ 
119a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med phyir lus ngag yid// de rnams rang bzhin brtags pa tsam// gang phyir brtags par rang 'dod de// de phyir rang bzhin lus ngag yid// oM AHhUM yig gsum byas la// hog nyis par na rab gnas pa// zlaba'i 
119a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor steng du ni// mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya// byang chub sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bsal phyir// mdun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// nag po hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje 'od zer 'bar ba 
119a6(rgyud 'grel): can// de yi 'od zer rab 'phros pas// mtshams kyi phyi rol dag tu ni// bgegs rnams phur bus gdab par bya// phyogs dang mtshams su 'phros pa yis// rdo rje'i rab rab brtsigs te// steng du 'phros pas rdo rje 
119a7(rgyud 'grel): gzeb// 'og tu 'gro ba rnams lus su// rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsam par bya// bdud dang bral ba'i sems kyis su// de yi dbus su rdo rje sems// 'og nas 'byung ba lta bur bsam// de las chos 'byung phyag rgya dkar// grub 
119a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid phra mo mar bltas nas// gyen du 'greng ba rab gnas pas// nang nyid nam mkha' lta bu yi// dbus su ser po baM las byung // sna tshogs pad+ma rnams bsams te// de steng khaM ni ljang gu las// sna tshogs rdo rje bsam 
119b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de steng zla ba'i dbus su ni// dkar po bruM las byung ba yi// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo'i lte ba la// bruM gis mtshan pa rnam par bsam// de las snang mdzad rig mar bcas// de las byung ba'i gzhal med khang // gru bzhi 
119b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la sgo bzhi pa// tA ra Na bzhis brgyan pa ste// ha ra ha ra phyed pas brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu'i steng // nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun rnams dang // zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa// de lta bu ni rnam par bsam// de yi dbus kyi 
119b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la// yi ge gsum la gnas pa'i sems// rab tu goms par bsam byas te// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i// bde gshegs 'gro ba ma lus rnams// byang chub rgya la nges byed pas// de yi dus 
119b4(rgyud 'grel): su gzigs par bya// de rnams mngon dga'i 'jig rten du// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// sgra yig bcu drug gnyis 'gyur dang // gnas kyi yi ge sum cu bzhi// ya ra la wa Da D+har lhag/ bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur 
119b5(rgyud 'grel): du byas pa'i// yi ge brgyad cu gzugs su 'gyur// de nas gzhal med khang pa yi// steng gi mkha' la 'byor gyur nas// de rnams ye shes kyis bskul te// sems nyid drangs nas gcig tu 'gyur// de nas nang 
119b6(rgyud 'grel): gi zla ba la// yi ge 'phreng ba rim pa gnyis// 'og dang steng du gnas pa las// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dang // smon dang 'dzag pa'i sems dang ni// mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin gyi// zla ba gnyis su
119b7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par byed// de gnyis dri med 'od gsal phyir// me long ye shes mngon gyur pa'o// de gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni// mnyam nyid gcig tu mthong ba'o// de las dkar po hUM du gyur// de las rdo rje dmar po 
119b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid// hUM gis mtshan pa bsam bya ste// oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM zhes// bdag la de yi nga rgyal bya// de nyid kun rtog ye shes so// de nas hUM las byung ba yi// bde gshegs rnams kyis ji snyed pa'i// 
120a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid byas nas// hUM gi nang du thim byas te// oM ya ta sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM zhes// bdag la de yi nga rgyal bya// nan tan ye shes mthong ba'o// hUM gi 'od zer gyis 
120a2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas// nam mkhar gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams// hUM nyid la ni thim par bya// de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las// dbus zhal sku ni chu shel mdog/ g.yas dang g.yas min gnog dang dmar// 
120a3(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan mi bskyod pas gnon pa// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas shing // zla ba'i gdan dang rgyab rten ldan// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag gnyis bdag 'od rig ma 'khyud// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): gri ste// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma 'dzin// de 'dra'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// de nyid shin tu rnam dag pa'i// chos dbyings ye shes rab rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'dod 
120a5(rgyud 'grel): chags chen po yis// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong 'gyur nas// bde ba'i sgra yis rgyal ba'i tsho gas// bskul nas byon par gyur pa rnams// ba spu'i bu gar thim gyur nas// mi snang bar ni rgyas gyur 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): te// rang gi rig ma dga' bar byas// de nas thim pa'i rgyal ba'i tsho gas// rang rang rigs dang yongs 'brel pa'i// spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs// reg gi rdo rje ma yi bar// rang gi ba spu'i bu ga 
120a7(rgyud 'grel): nas// spros te yum gyi ba spu yi// bu gar thim pas thabs nyid mnyes// de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi// sa bon 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams// bkug nas zhal du lam zhugs nas// skul
120a8(rgyud 'grel): thim nas zhu byas te// rdo rjer lam byung pad+mar gnas// de las rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// gtsor byas lha ni bcu dag yi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rab tu bsam// de nang blo yis sems can rnams// / 
120b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi'i lam nas zhugs par bsam// de nas ye shes sems dpa' ni// 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug nas// zhal gyi lam zhugs zhu byas te// rdo rjer lam byung dbang yang bskur/ 
120b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi mthu yis sems can rnams// bde dang yid bde thob par 'gyur// ji ltar rim par dbye ba yi// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang yid dag dang // gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// sa 
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dang chu dang me dang rlung // gzugs dang tsho rab 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes rnam dag pas// de las k+Shi tra~M khaMgaM skaM sa// dza hUM ba hoHbai raM laM maM paM taM// bruM aM badz+ri khaM hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams 
120b4(rgyud 'grel): su b+hur// de la sa 'khor lo rdo rje dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // ral gri dang ni rdo rje dang // me long pa wang dri yi cang // ro yi snod dang sna tshogs gos// chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag rgya dang // 
120b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ut+pal dmar po dang // pad+ma dmar dang ut+pal ser// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri rdo rje phyag mtshan rnams// rang rang sa bon mtshan par gnas// sa bon phyag mtshan de nyid las// sa 
120b6(rgyud 'grel): snying phyag na rdo rje dang // nam snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang // sgrib pa rnam sel kun tu bzang // gzugs snga dro ro reg dang ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // spyan yangs ma dang mA ma kI// gos dkar 
120b7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang sgrol ma dang // rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung // snang mtha' yas dang don yod grub// mi bskyod pa rnams rab tu grub// de nas pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas// zla yi phyi rol dbyung byas te// 
120b8(rgyud 'grel): de rnams phan par shes nas su// bcom ldan phyag 'tshal bstod byas nas// bcom ldan sems can don du ni// mkha' la phyogs bcur spros pa rabasam// 'gro ba'i dbang bskur rdzogs 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// rang gi zhal gyi lam du ni// yi ge gsum nyid zhugs byas te// zhugs nas rdo rje'i lam nas su// pad+ma dbus su babs par bya// de yi 'od zer dmar 'phros pas// 
121a2(rgyud 'grel): reg pas yab yum gnyi ga yang // 'dod chags chen po'i me yis ni// yongs su zhu bar gyur par bsam// de nas khu ba de nyid las// mA ma kI ni dbyung byas nas// lho nub mtshams kyi grwar bzhag 
121a3(rgyud 'grel): ste// dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsgom byas te// rdo rje thugs khyod sems can dbyings kyi khams kyi dbang phyug ste// dga' ba'i rnam pa yid 'ong mkhyen pa bdag la thar pa mdzad du gsol// sems 
121a4(rgyud 'grel): can skyed byed gnyen mchog 'dod pa'i don chen rnams kyis ni// mgon po bdag ni gson par mchis pazhes dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ tshig bcad 'di yis bskul ma thag/ khu ba nyid la thim par 
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// rim bzhin lha mo gsum po yang // khu ba nyid las phyung nas ni// me dang rlung dang dbang ldan grwar// gnas nas bskul bar byed par bsam// rdo rje sku khyod sems can kun gyi dga' bar mkhyen 
121a6(rgyud 'grel): pa po// sangs rgyas 'khor lo don du don dam byang chub bstan pa can// mgon po chen po bdag nyid lags par gson par mchis bzhes nas// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags dam tshig bdag la dgyes pa 
121a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// rdo rje gsung khyod thams cad kyi ni thugs rje dang ldan pa// 'jig rten don gyi dgos pa'i don kun dam pa'i spyod pa can// mgon po chen po bdag nyid gal te gson par mchis bzhed na// kun tu 
121a8(rgyud 'grel): bzang po bde bar spyod pa bdag la dgyes par mdzod// rdo rje 'dod pa khyod ni dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung dngos mnyam pa'i thugs rje can// mgon po chen po bdag nyid 
121b1(rgyud 'grel): gal te gson par mchis bzhed na/ yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter bzhin bdag la dgyes par mdzod// rim bzhin dbyangs kyis bskul ma thag/ rim pa bzhin du thim par byas// lha mos bskul ba'i dbang gis su// 
121b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems byungs bon mo// gur gum mdog 'drar rnams bsams te// de las ral gri'i yub la// zla ba'i steng du ma gis mtshan// de yi 'od kyi mkha' dbyings na// gnas pa'i bde bar gshegs pa 
121b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// 'jam pa'i rdo rje skur byas te// bkug nas mAl zhugs par bya// de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las// dbus zhal su ni gur gum mdog/ g.yas dang g.yas min gnag dang dkar// phyag gnyis 
121b4(rgyud 'grel): rang 'od rig ma 'khyud// g.yas gnyis ral gri mda' 'dzin pa// g.yon gnyis gzhu dang ut+pa la sngo// rin chen dbu rgyan dang ldan pa// rdo rje skyil krung shin tu brtan// rgyan rnams so sor brgyan byas pa'i// 'jam 
121b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyungs dpal dang ldan pa bsam/ oM \u0f7fAn tra mA na nA At+ma// chos kyi dbyings su byed gyis brlag// gnyen po'i bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang // 'dra bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'o// de nas rang gi mig 
121b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi// dbus su zla ba re rel// TI dker ba las b+hu ba la// 'khor lo dkar btso bas brgyad pa'i// ba ra TI gis mtshan pa bsam// de lams yi snying po nyid// g.yas gnag g.yon ni dmar pa 
121b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis 'khor pa la khri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis nor bu pad+ma 'dzin// rna ba'i brag gnyis pa la// zlaba'i dgas smanas poH// dmas hUM gas mtshan// de las b+hag da rje da// glums 
121b8(rgyud 'grel): mdan/ da pang bganas// g.yas gnyis rdzi ma 'dzin// gas da gnas na dbu brji ldan// sna la thug gnyis pa 'o// zla 'i dbus su khasar po// de las ri chen sdang rkun// sa 
122a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa las byung ba'i// nam mkha'i snying po bsam par bya// g.yas sngo g.yon ni dkar ba'i zhal// g.yas gnyis nor bu ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis 'khor lo pad+ma badzin// lte dbus 
122a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po ge las byung ba yi// pad+mag gis mtshan pa bsam// de las 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid// g.yas gnag g.yon ni dkar ba'i zhal// g.yas gnyis pad+ma ral gri 'dzin// g.yon 
122a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nor bu 'khor lo 'dzin// dpral ba'i dbus su zla ba la// kaM nyid ljang gu las thung ba'i// ral gri yub kaM gis mtshan// de las sgrib pa rnams sel nyid// g.yas sngo g.yon ni dkar ba'i zhal// g.yas 
122a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis nor bu pad+ma 'dzin// lte ba'i dbus su zla ba la// dkar po saM las byung ba yi// rdo rje bum pa saM gis mtshan// de las kun tu bzang po nyid// g.yas gnag g.yon 
122a5(rgyud 'grel): ni dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis nor bu pad+ma 'dzin// rang rang sa bon ji lta bar// dbus kyi zhal dang mtshan ma dang // sku rnams kun yang de bzhin te// rdo rje skyil krung rab brtan
122a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing // phyag gnyis rang 'od rig ma 'khyud// rin chen dbu rgyan ldan pa'o// bsnyen pa'i grub pa'i yan lag dang // rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o// de nas snying ga'i zla ba la// nag po hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje 
122a7(rgyud 'grel): bum pa hUM gis mtshan// de nas rdo rje bum pa la// hUM gis mtshan pa bsgom byas te// nang gi hUM dang rdo rje las// phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi// thugs kyi rdo rje bsam byas te// de yi thugs kar zla ba la// hUM gis mtshan pa 
122a8(rgyud 'grel): bsam paraH// lce rtsa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po a las byung ba yi// pad+ma'i dbus na aHyis mtshan// de las pad+ma aHmtshan pa// nang gi aHdang pad ma las/ 
122b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu yi// dag gi rdo rje bsam byas te// de yi thugs kar zla ba la// aHlas pad+ma dbus su yang // aHyig mtshan pa bsam par bya// mgo dbus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// oM las
122b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lte ba la// oM gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya// de las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan// nang gi oM dang 'khor lo las// sa yi snying po lta bu yi// sku yi rdo rje bsam par bya// de yi thugs kar zla ba
122b3(rgyud 'grel): la// oM las 'khor lo lte ba la// oM gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya// de nas thugs sogs rdo rje yi// thugs las 'od zer rab spros nas// spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis// mkha' la gnas 
122b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde gshegs rnams// so so thugs ka la sogs la// gnas pa'i thugs sogs rdo rje la// mchod nas zhu ba gsol bar bya// dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// 
122b5(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol// de ni rang gis bsgoms pa la'o// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms kun// de ring bdag 
122b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol// de ni lhun gyis grub pa yi// thugs ka na ni gnas pa la'o// de nas lhun gyis grub pa yi// thugs kyi rdo rje ma lus rnams// rang gi nyid la zhugs byas 
122b7(rgyud 'grel): la// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab// chos kyi ngag lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag dbang byin gyis 
122b8(rgyud 'grel): brlabs// rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms kun// de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol// 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gsung gi rdo rje ji snyed rnams// rang gi nyid la zhugs byas la// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): brlab// dpal ldan sku ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi 
123a3(rgyud 'grel): phyed gsum bsgoms kun// de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol// de yis de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sku yi rdo rje rje snyed rnams// rang gi nyid la zhugs byas la// oM sar+b+ba ta thA 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): gta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab// bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag dang // skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o// de nas nu ma'i bar du ni// zla ba'i dbus su ma las 
123a5(rgyud 'grel): byung // ral gri'i yu ba ma gas mtshan// de nas ngal gri'i yu ba la'ang // migs mtshan par rab bsams te// nang gi de gnyis las byung ba'i// dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra ba yi// ye shes sems 
123a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gnas dang bcas// de yi thugs kar zla ba la// me las ral gri yu ba la'ang // zla ba'i steng du maM bsams te// de yi 'od zer gyis bskul nas// nam mkhar gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams// so sor 
123a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer las byung ba'i// spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis// bum pa'i ye shes chu rgyun gyis// dri ma med byas dbang bskur nas// chu dang lha mo skur thim ste// mi bskyod dbu rgyan rab tu grub// bsnyen 
123a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag dang // dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o// de nas mdun du zla ba bsam// mi ge gsum la gnas byed pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi sems nyid ni// bag chags dngos po gang yin de// 
123b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dbus su gnas byas la// sngon bzhin 'gro ba'i byang chub rgyur// 'thad pa'i bde gshegs ma lus kyis// zla ba gnyis pa grub la sogs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lngas// rdo rje sems dpa' rab
123b2(rgyud 'grel): tubasgom// gnyi ga'i dga' ba dag dang ni// 'gro ba'i dbang bsrung ma byas par// snga ma bzhin du yi ge gsum// zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas nas// zhu nas rdo rje lam nas su// phyung nas pad+ma'i nang du 
123b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de yi 'od zer 'bros pa yis// 'od rigs bcas par zhu bar gyur// lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul ba las// khu ba las byung mags mdog/ gung gum lta bu las byung ba'i// ral gri'i 
123b4(rgyud 'grel): bar rna ba la'ang // migs mtshan pa bsam byas te// na ma 'od kyis mdza'i dbyings na// gnas pa'i bdag shegs dri snyed rnams// 'jam pa'i daja ma byas te// bkug nas de la zhugs par bya// nA dang 
123b5(rgyud 'grel): gri de b+ha rabs// 'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bu yi// 'jam dbyangs ma ni bdag nyid kyi// 'od kyi thabs la 'dzud pa bsgom// oM d+har+m+ma d+hAr+thaswa thA wa ad+g+ha ko&haM/ zhes bdag nyid da rgyal bskyed par bya// bar gyi 
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i yan lab dang // 'dra bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'o// de nas sngon du bstan pa bzhin// mig mi sogs pa byin gyis badz+ra'o// bar gyi nye ba'i bsgrub pa dang // rnam par smin po'i 'bras bu'o// ston 
123b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi thugs sogs rdo rje rnams// grub par gyur par rab bsgoms te// sngar kyis byin gyis brlabs pa tsam// bar gyi thub pa'i yan lag dang // skyem babyed pa'i 'bras bu'o// de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i// 
123b8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi// 'od kyis bde gshegs ma lus rnams// bskul ba'i 'od zer las thung ba'i// spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas// mi bskyod dbargyan ldan par bya// bar gyi sgrub pa 
124a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang // dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o// de nas skra yi lam nang gi/ zla ba'i dbus su oM dkar po// sku yi rigs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi oM ni phra mo yis// nu ma yan chad khyab par 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// snying gar nyi ma steng du ni// nag po hUM ni bsam bya ba// thugs kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi hUM ni phra mo yis// lte ba yan chad khyab par bsam// lte ba'i 'og tu nyi ma la// swA nyi ser po rin chen 
124a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs// de yi sA ni phra mo yis// rked pa yan chad khyab par bsam// gsang ba'i dbus su nyi ma la// A nyid dmar po 'dod chags rigs// de las 'phros pa'i a rnams kyis// rked pa ma lus 
124a4(rgyud 'grel): khyab par bsam// brla gnyis dbus na nyi ma la// nyid sdang gu las kyi rigs// de yi ha ni phra mo rnams// rkang mthil yan chad khyab par bsam// rigs lnga'i tshogs dang ldan byas te// hUM gis rang gi rdo rje nyid// bum par 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa bsam byas nas// oM gyis bug grub par bya// de yi nang du phaT ser po// rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma'o// nag po hUM nyid phra mo yis// khyab par rab tu bsam byas nas// AHyig snying po 'grub bya zhing // bu gar 
124a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT kyang bsam par bya// gnas skabs lnga dang ldan gyur pa'i// shes rab ma nyid grub byas la// rang gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas// rang gi rig ma nyid la thim// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ 
124a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes sngags nyid rab tu bzlas par bya// dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// // de nas rang gi sa bon gyi// 'od kyi bde gshegs rnams bkug ste// zhal du zhugs te zhu gyur nas// pad+ma'i nang du 'bab par bya// 
124a8(rgyud 'grel): de las gyur pa'i sa bon ma// de las gtso bo mi bskyod pa// 'khor lor bcas pa bsgom byas te// 'phro ba'i sngags kyis rim bzhin spro// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ka zhes pas su// phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi// mi bskyod pa ni 'phro byas te/ 
124b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bya ba kun mdzad nas// 'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bya// dzi na dzi kaka ces pas su// sa yi snying po lta bu yi// gong ma lta bu rnam snang mdzad// 'phros te 'dus nas rang mdun du// shar gyi zla bar gnas 
124b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// rat+na d+h+r-i/ kazhes pas sa// nam mtsha' snying po 'dra ba yi// ri chen 'byung ldan 'bros byas nas// b+ha mo'i yang gnas par bsam// A ro l-i ga zhes pas su// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'drab yaM/ 
124b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med pa 'phros byas nas// nub kyi nyi mar gnas par bya// prar+d+ha d+h+r-ika ka ces pas su// sbrid pa rnam sel 'dra ba yi// don yod grub pa 'phro byas nas// byang gi nyi mar gnas par bsam// kun kyang ral pa'i 
124b4(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan can// gsum po nyi ma'i 'od dang ni// snang mdzad zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i// dkyil 'khor rgyab rten ldan pa'o// mo ha ra ti zhes pas su// sa yi snying po lta bu yi// spyan ma shar lho mtshams su bsam// dwe Shar ti 
124b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas su// phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi// mA ma kI ni lho nub mtshams// rA ga ra ti zhes pas su// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra ba yi// gos dkar mo ni nub byang mtshams// badz+ra rA ti zhes bya bas// nam mkha'i snying po/ 
124b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba yi// sgrol ma byang shar mtshams su bsam// de rnams rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni// 'khor lo ut+pal pad+ma dmar// ut+pal ser por shes par bya// 'khor lo phyi rol grwa bzhi dang // shar gyi g.yas g.yon phyogs 
124b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la// de nyid gsum gyi gong ma ltar// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma// sa snying la sogs 'dra ba'i rnams// me long pi wang dri yi dung // ro yi snod dang sna tshogs gos// 
124b8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag rgya rnams// rim bzhin rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ldan// ya mAn+ta kr-ita ces pas su// mi bskyod lta bu'i gshin rje gshed// gong ma lta bu shar sgor bsam// pradz+nyAn tA kr-ita ces pas su// 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad lta bu yi// shes rab mthar byed nyi ma'i gdan// nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bye brag byas pa lho sgor bsam// pad+mA na ta kr-ita ces pas su// 'od dpag med pa lta bu 
125a2(rgyud 'grel): yi// pad+ma mthar byed nub sgor bsam// bi g+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ces pas su// gshin rje mthar 'byin lta bu yi// bgegs mthar 'byin pa byang gi sgor// de rnams rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje tho ba rdo rje dbyug/ pad+ma rdo rje kha bye ba'o// 
125a3(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs// zhal ni rgod dang gdangs pa dang // khro dang mche ba gtsigs par ldan// ljags 'dril spyan zlum 'dril ba dang // nyi ma gsar shar lta bu dang // zhal ni khro gnyer dang ldan pa// gsus 
125a4(rgyud 'grel): pa che zhing yangs pa dang // sra zhing phye ba phyang bar ldan// brla dang brang yang de bzhin te// lus dang yan lag nying lag kun// thung zhing rab tu sbom pa dang // smar dmar ser 'od dang ldan// sra yang dmar ser 'od dang ldan// 
125a5(rgyud 'grel): gyen du 'khyil zhing 'bar ba ste// 'od zer 'bar bar ldan pa rnams// rang 'od rig ma sma ra med// dang po phyag gi 'khyud pa dang // stag pags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa// bum pa nag po lta bu yi// mtha' yas dbu yi thod du 
125a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings// mdog dmar drag po lta bu yi// 'jog po yi ni snyan cha dang // pad+ma chen po dkar po yis// do shal rgyan ni byas pa ste// stobs rgya ljang gu se ral kha// dung skyong ser pos phyag gdub byas// kha dog sna tshogs lta bu yi// 
125a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs ldan gyis ni dpung rgyan dang // nor rgyas mdog dkar ska rags byas// pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu yi// pad+mas rkang gdub byas pa yis// de rnams rab tu bsam par byas// de nas rang gi sa bon gyi// 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra 
125a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis// khro bo bzhi yi thugs bskul nas// gshin rje gshed kyis dza zhes brjod// de yi thugs las 'phros pa yi// khro bo rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi// bgegs rnams med par bsrung byas te// lcags kyus
125b1(rgyud 'grel): dgug par byas nas su// rdo rje rab bshig byas te// zhags te rang gi mdun du ni// sna tshogs pad+mar gnas par bas ma// de nas snying las 'phros pa yi// khro bo rnams kyi ra ba nyid// bshig pa brtsigs par byas 
125b2(rgyud 'grel): nas su// phyir yang snying la zhugs par bya// de nas rang gi mdun du ni// man 'ji gsum la dung phor gsum// me tog dkar po dang ldan pa// tsan dan chu yis gang bar byas// de mdun man 'ji gnyis steng du// 
125b3(rgyud 'grel): gser dang rin chen las byas pa'i// gsol ba'i snod gnyis bzhag par bya// g.yas phyogs drang gi gsum pa la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshogs su// byin brlabs bdud rtsi lnga drug bya// yi ge gsum gyi bar byas 
125b4(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha yi sngags bzlas la// ku sha'i bam po dang po yi// dung gi chu yis gsol ba'i sdod// dang po lan gsum bzung gtor bya// gnyis pa'i chu dang me tog bcas// bzung sted yi snod nyid 
125b5(rgyud 'grel): la// lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya// gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas// gnyis pa mchod yon chu yang sbyin// de nas me tog bzung byas te// zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan par// de yi snod la zhabs bsil 
125b6(rgyud 'grel): ste// de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis// shes rab mthar byed bskul byas nas// de yi hUM brjod snying las sra// byung ba'i 'od zer dkar ba yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bteg byas nas// rang gi dkyil 'a 
125b7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par bya// de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis// pad+ma mthar byeng bskul byas nas// de yis ba brjod thugs las su// 'od zer ser pa 'phros pa yis// dkyil 'khor khyab par byas nas bcing // denas 
125b8(rgyud 'grel): rang snying 'od zer byas// bgegs mthar phyin pa bskul byas nas// de las ta brjod de skang las// 'od zer dmar po 'bras pa yis// khyab par rab tu dga' bar bsam// yang dag bsnyen pa'i yo 
126a1(rgyud 'grel): lag dang // 'dra bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'o// kun gyi mig la sogs pa rnams// sa yi snying po la sogs par// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs// yang dag sgrub pa'i yan lag dang // 
126a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o// de rnams kun la gnas gsum du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te// rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom par bya// yang dag sgrub pa yan lag dang // 
126a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o// rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis// bskul nas nam mkhar gnas pa yis// bde gshegs rnams kyi 'od zer las// spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis// dbang bskur byas nas dbu rgyan
126a4(rgyud 'grel): la// rang rang bdag po grub bya ba// bde gshegs lnga dang mA ma kI// sgra dang chos dbyings rdo rje dang // shes rab mthar phyin bgegs mthar phyin// de rnams bdag po mi bskyod pa// spyan ma gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // 
126a5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar phyin rnam snang mdzad// dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'byung // ro yi rdo rje gos dkar mo// pad+ma mthar phyin 'od dpag med// sgrol ma reg gi rdo rje ma'i// dbu rgyan bdag po don yod grub// mi bskyod dbu rgyan rdo rje sem/ 
126a6(rgyud 'grel): na pa nga// dum med pa // dan pa gas nas rnams na // lta gas ng+yas rnas pa// badz+ra shAs su ba bya// 'ab la 
126a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yi// dzaHhUM ba hos khaM raM zhes// dang po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa// de steng me laM paM taM zhes// gzhan gyi steng du gnas par bya// rang gis sa bon 'od zer gyis// gzugs sogs rdo rje dgug byas la// rang rangs/ 
126a8(rgyud 'grel): bon la ni thim// de yi sa bon rgyas par 'gyur// rig ma'i ba spu'i bu gnas// sa bon rnams las 'od 'phros te// dkyil 'khor las byung mthong bar bya// de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs// dkyil 'khor la ni 'phro 
126b1(rgyud 'grel): byas la// rang rang rigs dang 'brel rnams kyis// rang gi 'khor lo rab tu mchod// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes/ sngags kyang rab tu brjod par bya// de nas rab tu bstod par bya// mi bskyod 
126b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// dbyings kyi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dag chen po// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal 
126b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi mchog/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po shin tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje skul phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// mi rtog 
126b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i rdo rje 'chang // 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob// 'od gsal rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje don grub rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs su grub// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung // 
126b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas sa bon yaM gi mdog/ du ba lta bu las byung ba'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu// g.yas g.yon pa dan gyis mtshan pa// yaM ges mtshan pa bsam par bya// de ste 
126b6(rgyud 'grel): rarini dmar po las// byung ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum 'bar bar gyis mtshan// de stong a dkar byung ba yi// pad+ma'i snod ni a yis mtshan// de nang dbus kyi phyogs dang ni// shar lho nub byang 
126b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi ru// rim bzhin dri chu dri chen dang // rak+ta dang ni byang chub sems// ma hA mas bzhag par bya// de steng shar du zla ba dang // lhag ma bzhi ni nyi ma'i gdan// de steng hUM bruM oM dzi la// sa bon rnam lnga mthong 
126b8(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi// 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug ste// rang rang sa bon nyid du thim// de nas rlung gis me bskyod nas// me yi thod pa btsos pa yi// rlangs pa las byung 
127a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi tshogs// dkar po las byung rdo rje tshogs// bum pa hUM gis mtshan pa bsam// de rnams phreng ba lta bu'i rgyun// zhu nas snod la zhugs par bya// de bzhin lan gnyis gsum bzhi'i bar/ 
127a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams te rlung me la sogs pa// de rnams ma lus gyur pa las// me tog pad+ma dkar po nang // bdud rtsis gang bar gyur pa bsam// bsil bar bya phyir de steng du// dkar po aM ni bsam byas te// zhu nas nang du 
127a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par bya// de nas 'od zer 'bar 'gyur te// phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya// rang gi lce yi dkyil du yang // hU~M las rdo rje rtse gsum pa// bum par hUM gis byin brlabs bsam// de nyid gsum gyi gsang
127a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzlas byas te// bdud rtsis bkang ba'i pad+ma la// ye shes sems dpa' sa bon las// 'od zer byung bas bskul byas nas// pad+ma bcu dgur 'phros gyur te// lha rnams so so'i 
127a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnas nas// yab yum dus gcig mthun par ru// bdud rtsi'i ro mchog myong bar bsam// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// // de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi// sa bon 
127a6(rgyud 'grel): las ni 'od zer tshogs// gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu// kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yi// rtse las bde gshegs byung rnams kyis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas par byas nas// sa bon nyid la thim gyur te// de yis yang 
127a7(rgyud 'grel): dag rgyas par 'gyur// 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab phyir// maM de nyid ni thig ler gyur// de yi 'od zer rim pa yis// dang po ral gri snang bar byas// de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi// nang dang phyi yi lus dang ni// 
127a8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// gnas pa'i ral gri dag dang ni// dam tshig sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// rdo rje tshun chad snang byas nas// de nas rang sems yi ge maM// thig le lta bur zhugs par bya// 
127b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa de ma thag/ ting 'dzin gsum gyis yongs su grub// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam byas nas// dam tshig sems dang 'brel pa yi// rdo rje thugs sogs yan chad gsal// bzhag pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis ni/ 
127b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sems dpa'i phyi yi sku// de yi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// gzhal med khang nas phyi rol tu// byung nas 'gro rnams gsal byas nas// yang ni de bzhin zhugs par bya// de lta'i rim pa rab 'phro zhing // ji tsam 
127b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod par 'phro 'du bya// 'di ltar thig le rnal 'byor bsgom// las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// // thig le rnal 'byor bsdu byas nas// phra mo rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// ye shes sems 
127b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i sa bon gyi// 'od kyi bde gshegs rnams bkug nas// zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas nas// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mar gnas// de nas las kyi tshad tsam gyi// ral gri yu bar gzhal med khang // rdo rje sems dpa'i

127b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam de de yi lcags kyu yis// dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ldan pa'i ral gri phra mo nyid// phyi rol tu ni phyung byas te// pad+ma'i sna rtser gnas par bya// 'di yi thig le rnal 'byor la// dam tshig sems 
127b7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'brel pa yi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje la// snang bar byas pa yan chad kyi// 'od kyis dam tshig sems dpa' yi// phyi yi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams rab tu gsal byas nas// gzhal med khang nas 
127b8(rgyud 'grel): phyi byung ba'i// 'od kyis nam mkha' khyab byas te// phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya// de bzhin yang dang yang ni bsam// mtshan ma mthung bar du ni// 'od zer tsam gyi 'phro 'dra nyid// ji tsam 'dod pa rab tu bya/ 
128a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mthong nas// lha dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa// yang nas yang du 'phro 'du bya// phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// // phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsdus ma thag/ sku yi rdo rje la 
128a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i// thugs kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i// phyag mtshan dkyil na gnas pa yi// oM sogs bzlas pa'i dus su ni// sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang // lha mo bde gshegs bcas pa rnams// pad+ma'i dkyil na gnas pa yi// lha 
128a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sa bon dz+wa la sogs// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i lha mor ldan pa rnams// rim par bye brag so so nas// bzlas ma thag tu 'phro byas te// bzlas pa zin pa'i skad cig la// rang rang sa bon 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par bya// 'di ltar rim pa'i bzlas brjod rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i bzlas brjod phyogs su ni// re re brjod pa'i skad cig la// rang rang sa bon rnams las ni// sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang // lha mo de bzhin 
128a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs dang bcas// oM la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams// bzlas pa zin pa'i skad cig la// rang rang sa bon rnams la ni// sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang // lha mo dang bcas bde gshegs kun// mchod pa dang ldan zhugs 
128a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de ltar rdzogs pa'i bzlas brjod bsgom// bzlas pas ngal bar gyur na yang // spyan sogs lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// dbyangs kyis blang zhing bskul nas ni// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// spyi bor 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): mthog tsam du ni// mtho gang tsam gyi zla ba bsam// de steng zla ba nyi ma la// bruM aM dz+riM khaM hUM rnam lnga// dri chen rdzas sogs steng du bsam// de rnams dbus su oM dkar po// de nas rang rang sa bon gyi// 'od kyis bde gshegs 
128a8(rgyud 'grel): bkug byas nas// zhugs te gcig tu gyur byas la// de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi// sa bon 'od kyis bskul byas nas// zhu ste oM gyis reg byas la// de rgyun mgo la 'bab byas te// gzi byin ldan par shes 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de nas skad cig ngal bsos te// gong ma lta bu'i cho ga yis// gsang sngags bzlas brjod yang bya'o// gal te gshegs su gsol 'dod na// sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi bya ba'i bar 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te// de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags kyis// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// phyi rol dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya// de nas sdug bsngal ldan pa yi// sems can mthong bar byas nas su// 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du smon lam byas pa nyid// mngon sum nyid du bsam byas te// 'jam pa'i rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// rang sems dag byas langs par bya// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya rnams// rang gi sems tsam yin pa'i phyir// 
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang // maM bskrad pa dang rin chen 'byung // snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub// yang na 'jab pa'i rdo rje nyid// yang na rdo rje sems dpar bsam// b+ha ba ma lus byed do cog/ lha yi de nyid 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ldan bya// de yi thugs kyi zla ba la// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sems kyi bsam par byas nas su// bza' btung bdud rtsir rab byas te// gong ma lta bu'i cho ga yis// yi ge gsum gyi sngags 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod la// lce la rdo rje hUM dkar po// de las rdo rje rtse gsum pa// bum par hUM gis mtshan byas te// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ma lus par// tshim pa'i ba sam byas myang bar bya// khyim nas 'byung dang 'jug la sog/ 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yi dkyi las rnams kun// sems can don la sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas mchod par rnam dag bsam// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba'i phyir// sna tshogs pad+mar zla ba la// don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor 
128b8(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'gro rnams rang bzhin dag bsams te// rang gi snying gar zla ba la// khe las sna tshogs rdo rje ste// de dkyil zla bar khaM yang bsam// de las 'od zer rnams spros pas// bde gshegs ma lus bskub/ 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te// de rnams las byung 'od zer las// spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis// rang la dbang bskur byas par bsam// bla ma brnyas sogs skyon byung na// yon dang ldan pa'i mchod 
129a2(rgyud 'grel): stod dag/ bla ma la ni dbul byas te// dbang bskur cho gas khrus kyang bya// de nas tho rangs dus dang ni// nyi ma phyed dang nub pa dang // nam phyed dus dang rtse gcig par// de bzhin thams cad bsgom par bya// bya bas
129a3(rgyud 'grel): skal pa'i rnal 'byor pa// tho rangs dus na ting 'dzin gsum// ma lus par ni bsgom par bya// de las gzhan pa'i dus na ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te// yid dam lha yi snying ga ru// mtshan ma la sogs 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam byas la// de nyid gsum gyis gsang sngags kyis// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las// dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spro// de bzhin dbang bskur mchod pa dang // bstod dang bdud rtsi 
129a5(rgyud 'grel): myang la sogs// byas nas sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya// langs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang // bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar byas te// yi ge gsum gyis phyi rol gyi// 
129a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa' yi// 'khor lo nyid la zhugs par bya// gong ma lta bur bya ba rnams// ma lus rab tu spyod byed cing // nam phyed dus su rnal 'byor pas// yoM AHhUM muHzhes sngags 
129a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis// mchod pa la sogs rab byas te// ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs par bya// de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa' yi// 'khor lo la ni zhugs par bya// nyal ba'i 
129a8(rgyud 'grel): dus na thabs nyid ni// shes rab ma dang bcas par nyal// tho rangs langs pa'i dus na ni// lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul nas langs// kha dog sna tshogs bsgyur byas la// rang gi snying gar zla ba la// sa bon/ 
129b1(rgyud 'grel): ma tsam bsams byas la// tha mal pa yi lus nyid ni// gong ma lta bus tho rangs kyi// dus la sogs par bsgom par bya// sgrub thabs 'di ni byas pa yis// bsod nams tshogs ni gang thob des// 'gro ba thams
129b2(rgyud 'grel): cad bcom ldan 'das// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer grub gyur cig/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs 
129b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mkhas pa chen po// dpal kun tu bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // bod yul du bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan gyis yon bdag byas 
129b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kan+ti sa bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o// / @// dpal gas pa 'dus pa'i mang rtags zhes bya ba'i sgrub zabs slob dpon pa med snyams pas pa dpag/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI samA/ 
129b5(rgyud 'grel): dzA b+hi sa ma ya nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// nang par dang por bsam gtan gyi khang pa yid dang 
129b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su mthun pa shin tu dben par stan 'jam po la 'dug ste/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can thams cad la blos bltas la byams pa'i sems bskyed de bdag gir byas nas/ de rnams phol mig la sogs pa'i sdug/ 
129b7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal dang ldan pa dang / de'i rgyu mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yin par shes par byas te/ de nas snying rje'i sems bskyed pas gdungs pa'i blos gnod pa de bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid 'jam pa'i 
129b8(rgyud 'grel): rdorjer gyur nas sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya'o zhes smon lam bya'o// de nas bsgom pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste rang gi snying gar yi ge a yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
130a1(rgyud 'grel): la yi ge maM mdog ser po bsams nas/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas lnga rnams dang / rang gi 'dod pa'i lha rnams dang / slob dpon mdun du nam mkha' la bsams te/ 
130a2(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i 'od kyi sgo las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lan gsum brjod par bya'o// de la tshigs// 
130a3(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pa ni 'di yin te/ gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// de nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la// oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma 
130a4(rgyud 'grel): ko&haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas sems gcig pu nyid ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ oM AHhUM zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o// so sor

130a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad skra mdog dkar po zhal g.yas gnag pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri dang / g.yon 
130b1(rgyud 'grel): narin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i cod pan can bsams la/ de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis 
130b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul nas bcug la/ de yongs su gyur pa las khang pa brtsegs pa zurang bzhi pa la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa bsams la/ de'i dbus ma'i zla ba'i dkyil 
130b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo a la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba de rnams kyis mtshan pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o// de'i steng du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ka

130b8(rgyud 'grel): krung gis bzhugs pa'i skur bdag nyid bsams la/ sems can rnams 'dod chags chen pos 'dral bar shes nas dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras sangs rgyas rnams bdag nyid la bcug la/ de la spyan la sog/

131b1(rgyud 'grel): nag po g.yon dkar po phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na ral gri dam pa dang / mda' g.yon na ut+pa la dang gzhu bsnams pa/ zla ba'i 'od dang rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i

134b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang / parma mthar byed kyi cod pan la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje'i tsod pan la ni don yod grub pa'o// dri rdo rje'i cod pan la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no// 
134b8(rgyud 'grel): 'di dgan su'i sgrub pa chen pa ma yan lags/ dbang gi 'bras bu chen po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i gsum pa'o// sbed pa'a'ad zar rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams bskul la khar btsugs/

140a8(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i chu des kha bkru bar bya'o// yang de 'dug pa la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas dang stan gyi phyir byin la/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i bsrung skud kyis slob 
140b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ dpung pa g.yas par bcing bar bya'o// de yang sgyu 'phral dra ba'i rgyud las// srad bus g.yas par bcing bya zhing // ku sha dag ni lag par ro// zhes gsungs pa 
140b2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// de nas/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dram pa ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya la na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 
140b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 
140b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba// mthong bas 'byung bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa smos ci 'tshal// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni// go 'phang bla na med
140b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa 
140b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyi ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// 
140b7(rgyud 'grel): sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po ched 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams 'dir ni dong bas ni// rang 'byung skal pa chen po pa// 'jig rten thams cad 
140b8(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// zhes chos bshad pa bsgrag par bya'o// slob dpon nyid don du gnyer ba'i slob ma ni// bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyi sngags kyis bsrungs te 
141a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa/ khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go// me ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba// sbal ba'i mgon po bdag la gsungs// 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang // slob

141a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thig gnyis pa mi yo ba dang / de'i rjes la khru gang la sogs pa'i tshad kyi zur bzhi pa'i thig mi g.yo ba dang / de'i 'og tu mtshams kyi thig gnyis pa gdab po// 'khor lo zur bzhi pa'i

141b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor babri ba'am 'drir gzhug go/ phyi rol tu rta babs sgo'i cha'i sum 'gyur du byas la/ de'i phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshad kyi lcags ri ji ltar mdzes par bri'o//

143a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis blangs la/ dbang ldan gyis phyogs nas brtsams te/ phyi rol nas dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang ljang gu dang / nag po phan tshun ma reg ma yo bar slob dpon gyis dgye bar bya'o//

145b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gas la la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes// bden pa 'di yis dkyil 
145b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal ba slob ma ni// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ ces bden pa sgrags par bya'o// slob ma re re zhing yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la gos dmar po 
145b3(rgyud 'grel): bskon pa dang / yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dar dmar pos gdong g.yogs shing // mgo la me tog gi phreng ba dkris pa lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa yol ba'i bar du bzhag la 
145b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chus bsang gtor byas nas/ slob ma la sdug pa khyod su yin zhes dri bar bya'o// slob mas kyang sdug pa bdag ni bskal pa bzang po'o zhes 
145b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// de nas slob ma de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas 'og nas bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ sid+d+hi/ 
145b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ya ta su khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs 
145b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig/ dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams yang ma yin no// zhes brjod par bya'o// dzaHhUM zhes brjod pa 'dis kyang slob dpon gyis slob ma dgug pa dang gzhug 
145b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing / A khaM pi ra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o// dam tshig gi mchog 'dzin tu gzhug par bya ba'i phyir slob ma de dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i mdun du bzhag la/ 
146a1(rgyud 'grel): deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/ dngos grub 
146a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod la slob ma'i/ 
146a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag bzhugs par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de na thag tu dral nas gshegs// zhes brjod nas bdud 
146a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga pad+ma'i snod du bzhag ste/ yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na bsreg par 'gyur// dam tshig bsrungs
146a5(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub ste// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung zhig/ oM badz+ra u da ka tha tha tha zhes brjod de/ slob ma 'thung du gzhug go/ slob dpon gyis slob ma la dam bca' ba brtan par gyur pa'i phyir/ 'og 
146a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bshad pa 'di yang brjod do// deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ 
146a7(rgyud 'grel): mi bde ba ma spangs par khrod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems/ 
146a8(rgyud 'grel): dpa' 'bab par gyur cig ces smos shi ga ces bsgo la/ slob ma'i snying gar laM las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dbus 
146b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM gnas pa bsgom mo// lkog mar yang baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa la/ dbus na yi ge a gnas pa bsgom mo// spyi bor yi ge yaM lngas
146b2(rgyud 'grel): bung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can kha dog sngon po ba dan gyis mtshan pa la dbus su yi ge ha gnas par bsam mo// slob ma'i rkang pa'i 'og tu yang yi ge dz+haiM 'od zer 'bar ba dang bcas 
146b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsams la de'i yang 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po bsams nas/ dril bu dkrol zhing / A be sha ya staM b+ha ya/ rar 
146b4(rgyud 'grel): rar/ tsA la ya/ tsA la ya/ hU~M ha a dz+nyi zhes brjod par bya'o// slob ma de'i lce la yi ge \u0f7fdmar po bsams la/ de 'od dpag tu med pa'i skur bsams nas/ bab par gyur pa dang / 
146b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags rdo rjer de gnas pa la/ rdo rje dge ba dang mi dge ba smos shig/ ces dris nas/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes bya ba 'dis smos ma de brtan par bya'o// de nas pra dIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes brjod de/ me tog 
146b6(rgyud 'grel): gi phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor la/ de blangs nas pra ti grih+Na tA mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma'i mgo bo la bcings nas/ de'i mig gnyis su yi ge e 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam 
146b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod la// 
146b8(rgyud 'grel): gdong g.yogs dkrol nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdad go nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi bar du bstan par bya'o// de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma 'am/ mtshan ma dang nye bar me tog gi phreng ba gang du babs 
147a1(rgyud 'grel): pa de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o// yang na slob ma gang la dad pa de'i sbyor ba sbyin par bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o// da ni dbang bskur ba yin te/ de'i rim pa ni 'di 
147a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// sngar bshad pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la bzhag pa'i snod la gnas pa'i chus slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms pa'i spyi bor/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes zlos shing dbang bskur
147a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'o// gser la sogs pa khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am/ 'bur du brkos pa 'am/ ri mo bris pa'i cod pan nam de ma 'byor na ras las byas pa de'i spyi bor bzhag 
147a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ lag pas 'dzin tu bcug nas spyi bo der mi bskyod pa bum pa bsnams pa bsam zhing / rig pa du mas kyang slob ma la dbang bskur ba bsam par bya ba ni cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'o// de'i snying
147a5(rgyud 'grel): gar rdo rje bzhag la de yang lag pas 'dzin du bcug nas de'i spyi bor mi bskyod pa bum pa bsnams pa bsams nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar gyur// sangs rgyas

147a8(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi she kAta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ rang gi dngos kun gang gang snang // gtso bo de ni rnam rgyal rang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos dag pas// sangs rgyas ye shes gang yin de'o//

147b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o// rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi

147b4(rgyud 'grel): nas rig pa'i khams dang / rigs rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa yin no// de'i rjes la gal te phyir mi ldog

147b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam byed na/ de'i tshe de'i rjes la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kho na tsam sbyin par bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su ni 'di la lung bstan sbyin par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs/

147b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob ma 'dzin tu bcug la sngags 'di brjod du gzhug ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// 
148a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces brjod cing 'dis rdo rje 'dzin tu gzhug go/ de'i rjes la 
148a2(rgyud 'grel): rdorje dril bu 'dzin tu bcug la/ 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// ces bya ba 'dra/

148a4(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so// de la khu tshur g.yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste/ snying gar bzhag la lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas nas//

148b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'chi ba yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// srid
148b2(rgyud 'grel): pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// dam pa/ 
148b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'i bka' yin no// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du dag med pa'i// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o// dam pa'i chos ni mi 
148b4(rgyud 'grel): spang zhing // nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis// tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o// bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su// bka' thub kyis ni ma gdungs shing //

150a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan par bzhag la/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer las/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa

151b7(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi// sku gsum rnam par gnas gyur pa// 'jam 
151b8(rgyud 'grel): dpal yang dag phyag 'tshal nas// de yi sgrub thabs rim bshad bya// dpal ldan gsang 'dus la brten nas// phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa// bla mas ji ltar bstan pa yi// 
152a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes zhabs kyi lam brten pas// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi// shes sgrub ldan pa'i sems dag la// phal cher gsal ba'i sgra yi don// bdag mnyam blo/ 
152a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan la phan par// bla ma rnyed dka' 'jig rten na// dal 'byor shin tu g.yo ba ste// snod la shes rab thabs 'di ni// de phyir sems kyis bya bar rigs// byams dang snying rje mnyam ldan pa// 
152a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni byang chub bskyed byas pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab zab pa'i// tshul la lhag par mos pa'i yid// sbyin dang khrims sogs phun sum tshogs// srid dang longs spyod la phyir 
152a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// sems kyi sdug bsngal yang skyo med// lha rnams bsnyen pa byed gyur pa// chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // bdag po ming dang slob dpon gsang // shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs 
152a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// bsod nams ye shes cher 'char ba'i// dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs par dbang bskur ba// bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis// dbang bskur 
152a6(rgyud 'grel): rdorje sems brten pa// rnal 'byor spyod nus rnal 'byor pas// ri bo la sogs yid 'ong bar// gnas byas mgon po bsgrub par bya// bsam gtan sogs pa la brtson pa// mtshan/ 
152a7(rgyud 'grel): mo phyed kyis lhag ma la// cho ga bzhin du langs byas la// snying blar de nyid maM 'od ldan// gdong la sogs pa dag par bya// de nas chu bzang sman dang ni// me tog ga pu ra tsan+dan gyis// bsam 
152a8(rgyud 'grel): gtan gnas ni yang dag byas// bsams pas kyang ni yid 'ong bya// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// legs brten rdo rje'i skyil mo krung // de ru yang na bder gnas pas// 
152b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan rab tu bsam par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // kun tu bla mar bcas pa yi// dus gsum gshegs pas yongs gang ba// nam mkhar mngon sum bzhin 
152b2(rgyud 'grel): bltas la// sa bon me byung gzugs sogs pas// de bzhin rin chen phung po yis// mchod sogs rtogs pa spang byas nas// rab tu 'bad par de rnams mchod// de rnams spyan sngar gnas 
152b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la// pus mo gtsugs te thal sbyar nas// dmigs pa med par byas nas ni// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu rlung du// ma lus kun rtog gis 
152b4(rgyud 'grel): bsags sgrog pa rnams// thugs rje cher ldan spyan sngar de dag ni// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa 
152b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa// de dag kun la yang dag yi ngar zhing // byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi// yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs// snying rje dam pa mtha' yas/ 
152b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi thabs// rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing // sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun chogs 
152b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi// dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid// dam pa'i chos la rtag par skyabs su mchi// 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing // snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang / 
152b8(rgyud 'grel): ldan// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab bzhugs pa// brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi// bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur cing // sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang 
153a1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'byin// lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// sems ni byang chub dam par bskyed par bgyi// bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu// 
153a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshu la// rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos// yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten mthar 'byin bsam pa dang // log/ 
153a3(rgyud 'grel): par lta ba'i sgom pa dang // tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin pa'i// nyes pas 'gro ba 'di bskyed pas// snying rje thams cad dmigs byas te// don dam pa ni ji lta bar// byang 
153a4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems mchog bsgom par bya// tshigs bcad don 'di bsam bya ste// ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste// de phyir rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med// rtogs pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po// / 
153a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol// de ltar stong pa dang ldan par// 'gro ba 'di kun blta byas nas// ji srid sems ni brtan 'dod pas// sngags 'di nye bar brjod par bya// 
153a6(rgyud 'grel): oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA At+ma ko haM/ stong nyid ro gcig gang sems dpa'// byang chub mchog tu mi 'gyur ro// gnas dang gzhal yas bdag nyid de// rang gi sems kyis 'di ltar bya// 
153a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing du nam yang ni// ma dag pa yis 'chang mi rgya// de yis dang por zhing dag phyir// rang sems nyi mar bsgom par bya// de ru hUM skyes rdo rje ni// kha gyes sngon po 'od 'bar ba// 
153a8(rgyud 'grel): de yis dbus gnas hUM yig las// rdo rje phra mo rnam spro bya// 'og dang steng dang phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje rab gur dang ni// rdo rje rang bzhin sa gzhi bya// bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya// 
153b1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes pa dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam dang ni// zad dang mi skye chos dang ni// de bzhin rjes dang kun rdzob dang // sngon gyi gnas 'gro shes pa dang // ji ltar thos pa rnams rab 
153b2(rgyud 'grel): shes// chos dbyings tha dad med pa rnams// shes pa 'di rnams su 'gyur ro// 'di ltar shes la bcu gcig ni// legs par rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin te// rtsibs bcu la ni khro bo bcu// lte bar 
153b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni bcu gcig pa// shar sogs phyogs ni de rnams su// go rim bzhin du de rnams la// gshin rje shes rab mthar byed bsgom// pad+ma bgegs ni mthar byed kyang // me la sogs pa'i mtshams 
153b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams su// 'dod sngon stobs dang mi g.yo rnams// steng du gtsug tor rgyal por 'gyur// 'og tu gnod mdzes 'dren pa'o// lte bar rdo rje hUM mdzad dpal// rtag pa la sogs par yang 'gyur// rang 
153b5(rgyud 'grel): gi lhag pa'i lha yang 'dir// rnal 'byor pa ni kha cig 'dod// thob lcags kyu dbyug pa dang // dbyug pa pad+ma rtse gsum dang // rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rdo rje g.yas na 'dzin// phyag g.yas 
153b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ral gri ste// g.yon na rin chen pad+ma'o// spyan g.yon rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// mi g.yo byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan rdo rje ste// g.yas nyid na ni yang dag gnas// 
153b7(rgyud 'grel): gang gi g.yas na pad+ma yod// de yig yon du 'khor lo'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yon du// zhags pa lcags kyu'i phyag 'bar ba// u ma dang bcas bde byed ni// zhabs kyis mnan nas yang 
153b8(rgyud 'grel): dag gnas// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar por 'gyur// pad+ma mthar byed dmar po ste// gtsug tor kha dog ser por 'gyur// lhag ma rdo rje 'dzin nag po// dmar dang ser dang lus dkar rnams// 
154a1(rgyud 'grel): / g.yas pa'i gdong ni nag po mdzes// dkar dang dkar min dmar ba ni// de rnams kyi ni g.yon du bsgrags// khro bo nag po rnams kyi ni// dbye bas kha dog shes par bya// nas kyi 
154a2(rgyud 'grel): myu gu dang 'dra ba// g.yon pa dmar po'i rnam pa ste// g.yas pa dkar por 'dod pa yin// bden bral dang ni rlung gi mtshams// gang zhig phyogs su gnas pa rnams// thams cad mi sdug thung 
154a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ste// gdong 'jigs gsum pa chen po ste// smar smin ma skra ser ba// gad brgyangs bzhad par byed pa'o// stag gi pags pas gos mdzad khro// sbrul gyi rgyan ni 'dzin pa'o// mgul dang 
154a4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa rna ba la// rigs ldan dung dang 'jog po rnams// dmar ser mdangs ldan nor rgyas ni// skra rigs su ni rnam par gnas// rkang pa dpung par dkar ba yi// pad+ma pad+ma chen po garba// 
154a5(rgyud 'grel): kar ko Ta dang mtha' yas dag/ ljang sngos ral mgo la'o// mche bas cung zad mchu mnan te// zhal ni rnam par brgyan pa'o// zhi ba'i rgyan dang gos bzang ste// gzugs mdzes gzhan ni mtshan 
154a6(rgyud 'grel): thung ba// snga ma sku ni gyen 'greng tshogs// gzhan ni rin chen dbu brgyan no// thams cad smin ma khro gnyer 'khyog/ zhal ni gnyer mas mtshan pa ste// sna tshogs chu skyes zhi ma la// g.yon brkyang zha tha 
154a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis yang dag gnas// phyogs su khro ba'i rigs spro ba// sdang tshogs thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thog ma bar dang mthar bral ba// skye dang 'jig pa rnam par spang // thams cad ye shes
154a8(rgyud 'grel): tsam la brten// chos kyi de nyid go 'phang gnas// 'di ni shes pa ji ltar thos// grub nas yongs su gnas pa'o// 'khor lor chos 'byung phyag rgya ni// gru gsum dkar po steng gnas pa/ 
154b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas sna tshogs pad rdo rje// nang gi nam mkha'i rang bzhin du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 'phror ldan// phyogs ni mtha' yas gsal blta dang // sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas bsgom// zla bar 
154b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ni yang dga' bar// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa// ma rig la sogs yan lag dag/ sa bon bcas pa de gyur nas// rtag pa rig mar bcas la byung // byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams 
154b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi// rnam dag 'khor lo bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// mnyam phyir gru bzhir gnas pa'o// de yi rnam dag rnam bstan phyir// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams las// 
154b4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa dag pa shar phyogs sgo// gang phyir dran pa sngon 'gro bas// dge la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams ni// bskyed dang mi bskyed pa yi phyir// rtso ma dang yongs su
154b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyong yin te// so sor rtog dang bya lhur len// 'di ni brtson 'grus rnam dag pas// des na lho yi sgo du 'gyur// 'dun pa brtson 'grus de bzhin sems// dpyod pa zhes bya 'di dag pra// 
154b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yin te// de bas nub phyogs sgo ru 'gyur// dad pa brtson 'grus dran pa nyid// ting 'dzin shes rab dang bcas pa// dbang po lnga po de dag pas// byang phyogs sgor
154b7(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di 'gyur ro// rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // bde dang ting nge 'dzin rnams ni// bsam gtan dang po yan lag lnga// gnyis pa yan lag bzhi yin te// rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa
154b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // nang ni rab tu dang ba dang // bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag mthas// de yis gang ni ldan gyur pa'o// btang snyoms dran pa dang 'brel ba// shes bzhin dang ni bde ba'i rten// de ni 
155a1(rgyud 'grel): sems rtse gcig par ldan// yan lag lnga ldan gsum pa yin// btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag/ bde sdug min pa'i tshor ba dang // sems rtse gcig dang ldan 
155a2(rgyud 'grel): pas na// yan lag bzhi ldan bzhi pa yin// go rims ji bzhin bsam gtan ni// bzhi po yongs su dag pa yis// 'di dag sgo sgor gyur pa yi// rta babs gzugs kyis mdzes par
155a3(rgyud 'grel): byas// dpa' 'gro nam mkha' mdzod du grags// dri med seng+ge rnam rol pa'i// ting 'dzin 'di rnams rnam dag pa// khyams ni bskor bar gyur pa'o// a kA ro mu khaM zhes sogs// bzod
155a4(rgyud 'grel): dang chos dang don sngags kyi// gzugs rnams dag cing dag pa yis// mchod bzang gis ni lag sbrel ba'i// de dag khyams rten lha mo yis// kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// sems/ 
155a5(rgyud 'grel): can 'dod pa rdzogs byed pas// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// mdo dang dbyangs dang lung bstan dang // tshogs bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi dang // de lta bur byung shin tu rgyas// skyes
155a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rabs rnams sgra spogs pa// ston pa'i bstan pa yan lag dgu// phyogs bcur rab tu bskor bar byed// 'di ni rlung gis bskyod pa'o// ba dan dril bu'i sgra sgrogs ldan// dran 
155a7(rgyud 'grel): pa shes rab ting nge 'dzin// shin tu sbyangs dang dga' btang snyoms// brtson 'grus zhes pa 'di bdun pa// byang chub yan lag rnam dag pas// dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang // phreng bzang me long 
155a8(rgyud 'grel): rngams mdzes// ji ltar gnas su bkod pa yi// 'di rnams kyis ni mdzes byas pa'o// stong nyid la sogs rnam pa dang // gzugs can gzugs rnams lta byed pa// zil gyis mnan nas 
155b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu shes// de ni rnamathar dang po yin// nang ni gzugs med 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs la sngar bzhin du// mthong ba zhes pa gnyis pa ste// rnam par thar par yang dag brjod// sdug/ 
155b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam thar lus kyis ni// gzugs dang ldan pa nyid brjod pas// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs byas te// nam mkha' dang ni rnam shes dang // ni yang med pa gzhan yin te// 'du shes 
155b3(rgyud 'grel): med min 'du shes med// skye mched bdun gyi dbye ba yis// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni// brgyad par nye bar brjod pa ste// yid ni rnam par grol ba yis// rnam par thar par
155b4(rgyud 'grel): nges 'dod do// 'di ltar rnam thar brgyad rnams kyi// go rim ji bzhin rnam dag pas// 'khor lo rin chen mtsho skyes dang // ral gri ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan// kun tu bar chad med pa yi// / 
155b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje theg pa rab bskor bas// ka ba'i steng du gnas gyur pa// rdo rje phreng ba zlum pos bskor// gzugs la sogs pa phyin ci log/ rab tu zhi bas bla med pa'i// tshad med pa dang yang dag spangs// 
155b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di// shin tu rnam dag las grub pa// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par brgyan// mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis dgyes// cho ga ji bzhin rnam par gsol// 'gro ba kun dang tha
155b7(rgyud 'grel): mi dang // nyes pas gang la mgos pa// gnas 'di dag ni bcu dgu ru// sna tshogs pad+mas brgyan byas pa'o// rmongs dang rab rib gzhir gyur pa// 'dam ni rnam par skems pas na// byang chub
155b8(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi myu gu dag/ smin pa'i don du yang 'di yin// snying rje'i rang bzhin nyid bzang po// bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa'o// dbus kyi stan dang mdun spangs te// phyogs dang sgo na rnam par
156a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang // nyon mongs gdung ba zhi ba'i phyir// shes rab bdag nyid mngon khyab pa// lhag ma nub mo byed pa yin// tshogs gnyis// 
156a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs 'gyur bas// grub par bstan pa'i don gyi phyir// snying rjes brlan pas yang dag gang // bum pa gang bas 'di brgyan byas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// de bzhin
156a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen lnga yi gzugs// gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa ni// rang gi sems ni rnam dag pa'o// de dbus gdan gyi zla ba la// nyis 'gyur dbyangs yig bcu drug ste// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa/ 
156a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis tshegs// bskyed par nus pas bsgom par bya// lugs dang mthun dang mi mthun pa'i// phreng gnyis dag ni dgod par bya// dag pa'i zla ba shel 'dra bas// 'od zer phreng ba spro bar
156a5(rgyud 'grel): byed// 'di ltar gzhan yang bsgom bya ste// dbyangs yig bcu drug las byung ba// stong pa nyid kyi 'phangs pas na// gang phyir sems ni 'di ltar 'gyur// des na shes rab rang bzhin 'di// 
156a6(rgyud 'grel): ri bong can du yang dag mtshon// shes rab yang ni gnyis med shes// bcu drug stong pa nyid gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor tshogs ni dag chen po// nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// gnas ngan/ 
156a7(rgyud 'grel): len ni kun las grol// rtog pa spangs pa'i mchog yin no// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag/ zla ba mthong ba sngon 'gro ba// 'dir ni sangs rgyas yon tan kun// a la sogs pa'i

156b1(rgyud 'grel): po gsal ba ru// ye shes zhabs ni nyid kyis su// der gnas cho ga bzhin du sgra// dbyangs yig bcu drug smra ba yis// ji ltar brjod pa'i dbyangs yig gis// bsil ba'i 'od zer rab bsgrub 
156b2(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'di rnams 'di ltar grub pa ni// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yin no// sku ni byin gyis brlabs 'gyur ba// gang phyir 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// d+ha da ya la wa bsnan bya// ka sogs nyis 
156b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur byas pa las// de steng ri bong can blta ste// dpe byad sgrub par byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin pas// snying rje rtsa ba'i rang bzhin grags// bsod nams tshogs ni yang dag
156b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// yid las byung yang rnyog pa bral// 'jig rten rab grags grangs kyis ni// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi lus// 'dir ni ka la sogs pas//

156b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa'o// 'dir yang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// ka sogs gzugs kyis yang dag 'jug/ gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor bas so// zhes so// kun gzhi rnam shes 
156b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las// 'di ni zla ba gnyis su grags// me long ye shes su bzod pa// rnam pa dang po nyid yin no// nyon mongs can yid gyur pa las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid// der yang hUM byung

157a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das te// chos nyid rab tu rtogs pas na// de ni rtogs par gyur pa las// so sor kun tu rtog par bsgom// de las de bzhin gshegs spros pas// 'gro ba kun 
157a2(rgyud 'grel): la phan byas nas// sangs rgyas gang de 'dir bsdus pa// de ni bya ba nan tan no// byang chub spyod gang dag pa ni// bla med sangs rgyas ye shes so// de rnams dag ni rang yid gzugs// brtan
157a3(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// 'di ltar yid kyis bsgom byas na// rang gzugs tha dad med pa'i dngos// rdo rje ji ltar bstan mthong nas// de la bdag tu nga rgyal bya// de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi 
157a4(rgyud 'grel): spra 'di ni// snang ba med cing gnas med pa// maskyes ma byas dgu pa ste// rang bzhin la sogs rnam par spangs// mchod mi byed theg tu med// lhag ma med pa chos kyi sku/

157a7(rgyud 'grel): ka ro me/ oM tsa d+hi tsit+taM ut+pA da yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM pa ra badz+ra/ oM sa ha ra badz+ra/ At+ma ko&haM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ zhes pa'o// de la zla sogs yongs gyur pas/ 
157a8(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ye shes sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang por bdag nyid ni// rgyal ba rnams bskyed rgyal ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mgon// rnam thar sgo gsum gyi ni zhal// sngon po dkar po 
157b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ldan// g.yas dang dbus dang g.yon rnams so// shes rang thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// dza rje ram gronar bu pad// gnas kyis shes rab la 'khrud pa// rdo rje skyil ma krung gis gas/ 
157b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa yis sde bor brgyan// ral pa'i thor chags kyis brgyan pa'o// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// zhi dang sgeg pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa// phun tshogs kun byed mgon po ste// ma 
157b3(rgyud 'grel): mo byed pa'i 'od byed pa// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pa'i// rang bzhin du ni bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po 'dral ba yi// sems can khams la kun tu ni// sdong ldan la ni bltas na 
157b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// gsang ba 'dus pa'i don bstan phyir// dag pa'i sgyu ma'i sgra rnams kyis// lus la sangs rgyas rnams bcug ste// bde ba rdzogs pa yang dag grub// thams cad sangs rgyas gcig gzum 
157b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur// spyan dang gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// gzugs su stsol nas phyung ba rnams// de rnams rang gi rig ma la// ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gzhug/ de bzhin 'khor lo'i sangs rgyas rnams// bcugs 
157b6(rgyud 'grel): zhu bar gyur pa rnams// lha mo'i pad+mar spro byas la// rdo rje can gyis gnas par blta// de dag yongs su gyur pa sems// rten dang brten bcas dkyil 'khor te// mi bskyod gtso bo bsgom byas
